          </fileNamePattern>
        </rollingPolicy>
        <encoder class="org.onap.aai.logging.EcompEncoder">
          <pattern>${eelfLogPattern}</pattern>
        </encoder>
      </appender>
      <logger name="org.onap.aai" level="DEBUG" additivity="false">
        <appender-ref ref="asyncDEBUG" />
        <appender-ref ref="asyncERROR" />
        <appender-ref ref="asyncMETRIC" />
        <appender-ref ref="asyncSANE" />
        <appender-ref ref="STDOUT" />
      </logger>
  
      <!-- Spring related loggers -->
      <logger name="org.springframework" level="WARN" />
      <logger name="org.springframework.beans" level="WARN" />
      <logger name="org.springframework.web" level="WARN" />
      <logger name="com.blog.spring.jms" level="WARN" />
      <logger name="com.jayway.jsonpath" level="WARN" />
  
      <logger name="ch.qos.logback.classic" level="WARN" />
      <logger name="ch.qos.logback.core" level="WARN" />
      <logger name="org.eclipse.jetty" level="WARN" />
  
      <logger name="org.onap.aai.interceptors.post" level="DEBUG"
          additivity="false">
        <appender-ref ref="asynctranslog" />
      </logger>
      <logger name="org.onap.aai.interceptors.pre.SetLoggingContext" level="DEBUG">
        <appender-ref ref="asyncAUDIT"/>
      </logger>
      <logger name="org.onap.aai.interceptors.post.ResetLoggingContext" level="DEBUG">
        <appender-ref ref="asyncAUDIT"/>
      </logger>
      <logger name="org.onap.aai.dmaap" level="DEBUG" additivity="false">
        <appender-ref ref="dmaapAAIEventConsumer" />
        <appender-ref ref="dmaapAAIEventConsumerDebug" />
        <appender-ref ref="dmaapAAIEventConsumerMetric" />
      </logger>
      <logger name="org.apache" level="OFF" />
      <logger name="org.zookeeper" level="OFF" />
      <logger name="com.thinkaurelius" level="WARN" />
      <logger name="com.att.aft.dme2" level="WARN" />
      <!-- ============================================================================ -->
      <!-- General EELF logger -->
      <!-- ============================================================================ -->
      <logger name="com.att.eelf" level="WARN" additivity="false">
        <appender-ref ref="asyncDEBUG" />
        <appender-ref ref="asyncERROR" />
        <appender-ref ref="asyncMETRIC" />
      </logger>
      <root level="DEBUG">
        <appender-ref ref="external" />
        
      </root>
    </configuration>
  
  localhost-access-logback.xml: "<!--\r\n\r\n    ============LICENSE_START=======================================================\r\n
    \   org.onap.aai\r\n    ================================================================================\r\n
    \   Copyright  2017 AT&T Intellectual Property. All rights reserved.\r\n    Modifications
    Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada\r\n    ================================================================================\r\n
    \   Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\r\n    you
    may not use this file except in compliance with the License.\r\n    You may obtain
    a copy of the License at\r\n\r\n       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\r\n\r\n
    \   Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\r\n    distributed
    under the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\r\n    WITHOUT WARRANTIES
    OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\r\n    See the License for
    the specific language governing permissions and\r\n    limitations under the License.\r\n
    \   ============LICENSE_END=========================================================\r\n\r\n
    \   ECOMP is a trademark and service mark of AT&T Intellectual Property.\r\n\r\n-->\r\n<configuration>\r\n\t<property
    name=\"AJSC_HOME\" value=\"${AJSC_HOME:-.}\" />\r\n\t<appender name=\"ACCESS\"\r\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\r\n\t\t<file>${AJSC_HOME}/logs/ajsc-jetty/localhost_access.log</file>\r\n\t\t<rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n\t\t\t<fileNamePattern>${AJSC_HOME}/logs/ajsc-jetty/localhost_access.log.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}\r\n\t\t\t</fileNamePattern>\r\n\t\t</rollingPolicy>\r\n\t\t<encoder
    class=\"org.onap.aai.logging.CustomLogPatternLayoutEncoder\">\r\n\t\t\t<Pattern>%a
    %u %z [%t] \"%m %U%q\" %s %b %y %i{X-TransactionId} %i{X-FromAppId} %i{X-Forwarded-For}
    %i{X-AAI-SSL-Client-CN} %i{X-AAI-SSL-Client-OU} %i{X-AAI-SSL-Client-O} %i{X-AAI-SSL-Client-L}
    %i{X-AAI-SSL-Client-ST} %i{X-AAI-SSL-Client-C} %i{X-AAI-SSL-Client-NotBefore} %i{X-AAI-SSL-Client-NotAfter}
    %i{X-AAI-SSL-Client-DN} %D</Pattern>\r\n\t\t</encoder>\r\n\t</appender>\r\n\t<appender-ref
    ref=\"ACCESS\" />\r\n</configuration>\r\n\r\n<!-- \r\n%a - Remote IP address\r\n%A
    - Local IP address\r\n%b - Bytes sent, excluding HTTP headers, or '-' if no bytes
    were sent\r\n%B - Bytes sent, excluding HTTP headers\r\n%h - Remote host name\r\n%H
    - Request protocol\r\n%l - Remote logical username from identd (always returns '-')\r\n%m
    - Request method\r\n%p - Local port\r\n%q - Query string (prepended with a '?' if
    it exists, otherwise an empty string\r\n%r - First line of the request\r\n%s - HTTP
    status code of the response\r\n%S - User session ID\r\n%t - Date and time, in Common
    Log Format format\r\n%u - Remote user that was authenticated\r\n%U - Requested URL
    path\r\n%v - Local server name\r\n%I - current request thread name (can compare
    later with stacktraces)\r\n\r\n%z - Custom pattern that parses the cert for the
    subject\r\n%y - Custom pattern determines rest or dme2\r\n -->\r\n"
  
  janusgraph-realtime.properties: |
    #
    # ============LICENSE_START=======================================================
    # Copyright  2017 AT&T Intellectual Property. All rights reserved.
    # ================================================================================
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #    http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
    # ============LICENSE_END=========================================================
    #
    # ECOMP is a trademark and service mark of AT&T Intellectual Property.
    #
  
    query.fast-property=true
    query.smart-limit=false
  
    
  
    storage.backend=cassandra
    storage.hostname=cassandra
    storage.cassandra.keyspace=aaigraph
    storage.username=cassandra
    storage.password=cassandra
  
    storage.cassandra.read-consistency-level=LOCAL_QUORUM
    storage.cassandra.write-consistency-level=LOCAL_QUORUM
    storage.cassandra.replication-factor=3
    storage.cassandra.replication-strategy-class=org.apache.cassandra.locator.SimpleStrategy
  
    
  
    storage.lock.wait-time=300
    # Setting db-cache to false ensure the fastest propagation of changes across servers
    cache.db-cache = false
    #load graphson file on startup
    load.snapshot.file=false
  
  janusgraph-cached.properties: |
    #
    # ============LICENSE_START=======================================================

    # limitations under the License.

    #

    query.fast-property=true
    query.smart-limit=false
  
    
  
    storage.backend=cassandra
    storage.hostname=cassandra
    storage.cassandra.keyspace=aaigraph
    storage.username=cassandra
    storage.password=cassandra

    storage.cassandra.write-consistency-level=LOCAL_QUORUM
    storage.cassandra.replication-factor=3
    storage.cassandra.replication-strategy-class=org.apache.cassandra.locator.SimpleStrategy
  
    
  
    storage.lock.wait-time=300
    #caching on

    cache.db-cache-time = 180000
    cache.db-cache-size = 0.3

    load.snapshot.file=false
  
  aaiconfig.properties: |
    #
    # ============LICENSE_START=======================================================
    # org.onap.aai
    # ================================================================================
    # Copyright  2017 AT&T Intellectual Property. All rights reserved.
    # ================================================================================
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #    http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
    # ============LICENSE_END=========================================================
    #
    # ECOMP is a trademark and service mark of AT&T Intellectual Property.
    #
  
    aai.config.checktime=1000
  
    # this could come from siteconfig.pl?
    aai.config.nodename=AutomaticallyOverwritten
  
    aai.server.url.base=https://aai.onap:8443/aai/
    aai.server.url=https://aai.onap:8443/aai/v19/
    aai.global.callback.url=https://aai.onap:8443/aai/
  
    
    aai.tools.enableBasicAuth=true
    aai.tools.username=AAI
    aai.tools.password=AAI
    
  
    aai.truststore.filename=aai_keystore
    aai.truststore.passwd.x=OBF:1vn21ugu1saj1v9i1v941sar1ugw1vo0
    aai.keystore.filename=aai_keystore
    aai.keystore.passwd.x=OBF:1vn21ugu1saj1v9i1v941sar1ugw1vo0
  
    aai.notification.current.version=v19
    aai.notificationEvent.default.status=UNPROCESSED
    aai.notificationEvent.default.eventType=AAI-EVENT
    aai.notificationEvent.default.domain=dev
    aai.notificationEvent.default.sourceName=aai
    aai.notificationEvent.default.sequenceNumber=0
    aai.notificationEvent.default.severity=NORMAL
    aai.notificationEvent.default.version=v19
    # This one lets us enable/disable resource-version checking on updates/deletes
    aai.resourceversion.enableflag=true
    aai.logging.maxStackTraceEntries=10
    aai.default.api.version=v19
  
    # Used by Model-processing code
    aai.model.delete.sleep.per.vtx.msec=500
    aai.model.query.resultset.maxcount=50
    aai.model.query.timeout.sec=90
  
    aai.model.proc.max.levels=50
    aai.edgeTag.proc.max.levels=50
  
    aai.logging.trace.enabled=true
    aai.logging.trace.logrequest=false
    aai.logging.trace.logresponse=false
  
    aai.transaction.logging=true
    aai.transaction.logging.get=false
    aai.transaction.logging.post=false
  
    aai.realtime.clients=SDNC,MSO,SO,robot-ete
  
    #timeout for traversal enabled flag
    aai.traversal.timeoutenabled=true
  
    #timeout app specific
    aai.traversal.timeout.appspecific=JUNITTESTAPP1,1|JUNITTESTAPP2,-1|DCAE-CCS,-1|DCAES,-1|AAI-FILEGEN-GFPIP,-1
  
    #default timeout limit added for traversal if not overridden (in ms)
    aai.traversal.timeoutlimit=180000
  
    #timeout for traversal dsl enabled flag
    aai.traversal.dsl.timeoutenabled=true
  
    #timeout app specific -1 to bypass for that app id, a whole number to override the timeout with that value (in ms)
    aai.traversal.dsl.timeout.appspecific=JUNITTESTAPP1,1|JUNITTESTAPP2,-1|AAI-TOOLS,-1|DCAE-CCS,1200000|DCAES,1200000|VPESAT,-1|AAI-CACHER,-1|VidAaiController,300000|AAI-UI,180000
  
    #default timeout limit added for traversal dsl if not overridden (in ms)
    aai.traversal.dsl.timeoutlimit=150000
  
    # Threshold for margin of error (in ms) for resources_with_sot format to derive the most recent http method performed
    aai.resource.formatter.threshold=10
    aai.dsl.override=ZV4V7E3N77SKIB6MR9MHQ6M4P6Q99Z7M76RBODA
  
  application.properties: |

    # The following info parameters are being referenced by ajsc6
    info.build.artifact=aai-traversal

    spring.profiles.active=production,dmaap,aaf-auth
    spring.jersey.application-path=${schema.uri.base.path}
    #The max number of active threads in this pool
    server.tomcat.max-threads=200
    #The minimum number of threads always kept alive
    server.tomcat.min-Spare-Threads=25
    #The number of milliseconds before an idle thread shutsdown, unless the number of active threads are less or equal to minSpareThreads
    server.tomcat.max-idle-time=60000
  
    # If you get an application startup failure that the port is already taken
    # If thats not it, please check if the key-store file path makes sense

    # Schema related attributes for the oxm and edges
    # Any additional schema related attributes should start with prefix schema

    schema.nodes.location=${server.local.startpath}/schema/${schema.source.name}/oxm/

    # Lists all of the versions in the schema

    # Specifies from which version should the related link be displayed in response payload

    # Specifies from which version should the client see only the uri excluding host info
    # Before this version server base will also be included
    schema.version.app.root.start=v11
    # Specifies from which version should the namespace be changed

    # Specifies from which version should the client start seeing the edge label in payload
    schema.version.edge.label.start=v12
    # Specifies the version that the application should default to

# this is a shared resource for subcharts
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: aai-filebeat
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai
    chart: aai-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  filebeat.yml: |
    # Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada, AT&T
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
  
    filebeat.prospectors:
    #it is mandatory, in our case it's log
    - input_type: log
      #This is the canolical path as mentioned in logback.xml, *.* means it will monitor all files in the directory.
      paths:
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*.log
      #Files older than this should be ignored.In our case it will be 48 hours i.e. 2 days. It is a helping flag for clean_inactive
      ignore_older: 48h
      # Remove the registry entry for a file that is more than the specified time. In our case it will be 96 hours, i.e. 4 days. It will help to keep registry records with in limit
      clean_inactive: 96h
  
  
    # Name of the registry file. If a relative path is used, it is considered relative to the
    # data path. Else full qualified file name.
    #filebeat.registry_file: ${path.data}/registry
  
  
    output.logstash:
      #List of logstash server ip addresses with port number.
      #But, in our case, this will be the loadbalancer IP address.
      #For the below property to work the loadbalancer or logstash should expose 5044 port to listen the filebeat events or port in the property should be changed appropriately.
      hosts: ["log-ls.onap:5044"]
      #If enable will do load balancing among availabe Logstash, automatically.
      loadbalance: true
  
      #The list of root certificates for server verifications.
      #If certificate_authorities is empty or not set, the trusted
      #certificate authorities of the host system are used.
      #ssl.certificate_authorities: $ssl.certificate_authorities
  
      #The path to the certificate for SSL client authentication. If the certificate is not specified,
      #client authentication is not available.
      #ssl.certificate: $ssl.certificate
  
      #The client certificate key used for client authentication.
      #ssl.key: $ssl.key
  
      #The passphrase used to decrypt an encrypted key stored in the configured key file
      #ssl.key_passphrase: $ssl.key_passphrase
---
# Source: aai/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: aai-deployment-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai
    chart: aai-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
data:

  haproxy.cfg: |+
    # Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada, AT&T
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
  
    global
            log /dev/log    local0
            stats socket /usr/local/etc/haproxy/haproxy.socket mode 660 level admin
            stats timeout 30s
            user root
            group root
            daemon
            #################################
            # Default SSL material locations#
            #################################
            ca-base /etc/ssl/certs
            crt-base /etc/ssl/private
  
            # Default ciphers to use on SSL-enabled listening sockets.
            # For more information, see ciphers(1SSL). This list is from:
            # https://hynek.me/articles/hardening-your-web-servers-ssl-ciphers/
            # An alternative list with additional directives can be obtained from
            # https://mozilla.github.io/server-side-tls/ssl-config-generator/?server=haproxy
            tune.ssl.default-dh-param 2048
  
    defaults
            log     global
            mode    http
            option  httplog
            option  ssl-hello-chk
            option  httpchk GET /aai/util/echo HTTP/1.1\r\nHost:\ aai\r\nX-TransactionId:\ haproxy-0111\r\nX-FromAppId:\ haproxy\r\nAccept:\ application/json\r\nAuthorization:\ Basic\ QUFJOkFBSQ==
            default-server init-addr none
    #       option  dontlognull
    #       errorfile 400 /etc/haproxy/errors/400.http
    #       errorfile 403 /etc/haproxy/errors/403.http
    #       errorfile 408 /etc/haproxy/errors/408.http
    #       errorfile 500 /etc/haproxy/errors/500.http
    #       errorfile 502 /etc/haproxy/errors/502.http
    #       errorfile 503 /etc/haproxy/errors/503.http
    #       errorfile 504 /etc/haproxy/errors/504.http
  
            option  http-server-close
            option forwardfor except 127.0.0.1
            retries 6
            option redispatch
            maxconn 50000
            timeout connect 50000
            timeout client  480000
            timeout server  480000
            timeout http-keep-alive 30000
  
  
    frontend IST_8443
            mode http
            bind 0.0.0.0:8443 name https ssl crt /etc/ssl/private/aai.pem
    #       log-format %ci:%cp\ [%t]\ %ft\ %b/%s\ %Tq/%Tw/%Tc/%Tr/%Tt\ %ST\ %B\ %CC\ %CS\ %tsc\ %ac/%fc/%bc/%sc/%rc\ %sq/%bq\ %hr\ %hs\ {%[ssl_c_verify],%{+Q}[ssl_c_s_dn],%{+Q}[ssl_c_i_dn]}\ %{+Q}r
            log-format "%ci:%cp [%tr] %ft %b/%s %TR/%Tw/%Tc/%Tr/%Ta %ST %B %CC \ %CS %tsc %ac/%fc/%bc/%sc/%rc %sq/%bq %hr %hs %{+Q}r"
            option httplog
            log global
            option logasap
            option forwardfor
            capture request header  Host len 100
            capture response header Host len 100
            option log-separate-errors
            option forwardfor
            http-request set-header X-Forwarded-Proto https if { ssl_fc }
            http-request set-header X-AAI-Client-SSL TRUE if { ssl_c_used }
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL                       %[ssl_fc]
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL-Client-Verify         %[ssl_c_verify]
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL-Client-DN             %{+Q}[ssl_c_s_dn]
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL-Client-CN             %{+Q}[ssl_c_s_dn(cn)]
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL-Issuer                %{+Q}[ssl_c_i_dn]
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL-Client-NotBefore      %{+Q}[ssl_c_notbefore]
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL-Client-NotAfter       %{+Q}[ssl_c_notafter]
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL-ClientCert-Base64   %{+Q}[ssl_c_der,base64]
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL-Client-OU             %{+Q}[ssl_c_s_dn(OU)]
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL-Client-L              %{+Q}[ssl_c_s_dn(L)]
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL-Client-ST             %{+Q}[ssl_c_s_dn(ST)]
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL-Client-C              %{+Q}[ssl_c_s_dn(C)]
            http-request set-header X-AAI-SSL-Client-O              %{+Q}[ssl_c_s_dn(O)]
            reqadd X-Forwarded-Proto:\ https
            reqadd X-Forwarded-Port:\ 8443
  
    #######################
    #ACLS FOR PORT 8446####
    #######################
  
            acl is_Port_8446_generic path_reg -i ^/aai/v[0-9]+/search/generic-query$
            acl is_Port_8446_nodes path_reg -i ^/aai/v[0-9]+/search/nodes-query$
            acl is_Port_8446_version path_reg -i ^/aai/v[0-9]+/query$
            acl is_dsl path_reg -i ^/aai/v[0-9]+/dsl$
            acl is_named-query path_beg -i /aai/search/named-query
            acl is_search-model path_beg -i /aai/search/model
            use_backend IST_AAI_8446 if is_Port_8446_generic or is_Port_8446_nodes or is_Port_8446_version or is_named-query or is_search-model or is_dsl
  
            default_backend IST_Default_8447
  
  
    #######################
    #DEFAULT BACKEND 847###
    #######################
  
    backend IST_Default_8447
            balance roundrobin
            http-request set-header X-Forwarded-Port %[src_port]
            http-response set-header Strict-Transport-Security max-age=16000000;\ includeSubDomains;\ preload;
            server aai-resources.onap aai-resources.onap.svc.cluster.local:8447 resolvers kubernetes check check-ssl port 8447 ssl verify none
  
  
    #######################
    # BACKEND 8446#########
    #######################
  
    backend IST_AAI_8446
            balance roundrobin
            http-request set-header X-Forwarded-Port %[src_port]
            http-response set-header Strict-Transport-Security max-age=16000000;\ includeSubDomains;\ preload;
            server aai-traversal.onap aai-traversal.onap.svc.cluster.local:8446 resolvers kubernetes check check-ssl port 8446 ssl verify none
---

# Source: aai/charts/aai-babel/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, AT&T
# Modifications Copyright  2018 Bell Canada
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-aai-aai-babel
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai-babel
    chart: aai-babel-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aai-babel
        release: dev-aai
    spec:
    
      containers:
        - name: aai-babel
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/babel:1.5.1"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 9516
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 9516
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: CONFIG_HOME
              value: /opt/app/babel/config
            - name: KEY_STORE_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: dev-aai-aai-babel-pass
                  key: KEY_STORE_PASSWORD
            - name: KEY_MANAGER_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: dev-aai-aai-babel-pass
                  key: KEY_MANAGER_PASSWORD
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /opt/app/babel/config/artifact-generator.properties
            name: dev-aai-aai-babel-config
            subPath: artifact-generator.properties
          - mountPath: /opt/app/babel/config/tosca-mappings.json
            name: dev-aai-aai-babel-config
            subPath: tosca-mappings.json
          - mountPath: /opt/app/babel/config/babel-auth.properties
            name: dev-aai-aai-babel-config
            subPath: babel-auth.properties
          - mountPath: /opt/app/babel/config/auth
            name: dev-aai-aai-babel-secrets
          - mountPath: /var/log/onap
            name: dev-aai-aai-babel-logs
          - mountPath: /opt/app/babel/config/logback.xml
            name: dev-aai-aai-babel-config
            subPath: logback.xml
          resources:
            {}
            

        # side car containers
        - name: filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
            name: filebeat-conf
          - mountPath: /var/log/onap
            name: dev-aai-aai-babel-logs
          - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
            name: aai-filebeat

    

      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: dev-aai-aai-babel-config
          configMap:
            name: dev-aai-aai-babel-configmap
            items:
            - key: artifact-generator.properties
              path: artifact-generator.properties
            - key: tosca-mappings.json
              path: tosca-mappings.json
            - key: babel-auth.properties
              path: babel-auth.properties
            - key: logback.xml
              path: logback.xml
        - name: dev-aai-aai-babel-secrets
          secret:
            secretName: dev-aai-aai-babel-babel-secrets
        - name: filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: aai-filebeat
        - name: dev-aai-aai-babel-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: aai-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
    

      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

# Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-aai-aai-data-router
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai-data-router
    chart: aai-data-router-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: aai-data-router
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aai-data-router
        release: dev-aai
      name: aai-data-router
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - |
          mkdir -p /logroot/data-router/logs
          chmod -R 777 /logroot/data-router/logs
          chown -R root:root /logroot
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        image: docker.io/busybox
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: init-sysctl
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-logs
          mountPath: /logroot/
      containers:
      - name: aai-data-router
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/data-router:1.5.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: SERVICE_BEANS
          value: /opt/app/data-router/dynamic/conf
        - name: CONFIG_HOME
          value: /opt/app/data-router/config/
        - name: KEY_STORE_PASSWORD
          value: OBF:1y0q1uvc1uum1uvg1pil1pjl1uuq1uvk1uuu1y10
        - name: DYNAMIC_ROUTES
          value: /opt/app/data-router/dynamic/routes
        - name: KEY_MANAGER_PASSWORD
          value: OBF:1y0q1uvc1uum1uvg1pil1pjl1uuq1uvk1uuu1y10
        - name: PATH
          value: /usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
        - name: JAVA_HOME
          value: usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath:  /opt/app/data-router/config/auth
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-auth
        - mountPath:  /opt/app/data-router/config/data-router.properties
          subPath: data-router.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-properties
        - mountPath:  /opt/app/data-router/config/schemaIngest.properties
          subPath: schemaIngest.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/data-router/dynamic/routes/entity-event.route
          subPath: entity-event.route
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-dynamic-route
        - mountPath: /opt/app/data-router/dynamic/conf/entity-event-policy.xml
          subPath: entity-event-policy.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-dynamic-policy
        - mountPath: /opt/app/data-router/dynamic/conf/data-router-oxm.xml
          subPath: data-router-oxm.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-dynamic-oxm
        - mountPath: /opt/app/data-router/bundleconfig/etc/logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-logback-config
          subPath: logback.xml
        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-logs
        - mountPath: /logs
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-logs

        ports:
        - containerPort: 9502
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9502
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9502
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
            {}
            

      # side car containers
      - name: filebeat-onap
        image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
          subPath: filebeat.yml
          name: filebeat-conf
        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-logs
        - mountPath: /logs
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-logs
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: aai-filebeat
        resources:
            {}
            
      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: aai-filebeat
      - name: aai-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-auth
        secret:
          secretName: dev-aai-aai-data-router
      - name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-properties
        configMap:
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-prop
          items:
          - key: data-router.properties
            path: data-router.properties
          - key: schemaIngest.properties
            path: schemaIngest.properties
      - name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-dynamic-route
        configMap:
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-dynamic
      - name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-dynamic-policy
        configMap:
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-dynamic
      - name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-dynamic-oxm
        configMap:
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-dynamic
      - name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-logs
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-logback-config
        configMap:
          name: dev-aai-aai-data-router-log-configmap
          items:
          - key: logback.xml
            path: logback.xml
      restartPolicy: Always
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: aai/charts/aai-elasticsearch/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada, AT&T
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-aai-aai-elasticsearch
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai-elasticsearch
    chart: aai-elasticsearch-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: aai-elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aai-elasticsearch
        release: dev-aai
      name: aai-elasticsearch
    spec:
      hostname: aai-elasticsearch
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - |
          sysctl -w vm.max_map_count=262144
          mkdir -p /logroot/elasticsearch/logs
          mkdir -p /logroot/elasticsearch/data
          chmod -R 777 /logroot/elasticsearch
          chown -R 1000:1000 /logroot
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        image: docker.io/busybox
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: init-sysctl
        volumeMounts:
        - name: elasticsearch-data
          mountPath: /logroot/
      containers:
      - name: aai-elasticsearch        
        image: "docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:6.1.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
        - containerPort: 8443
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9200
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9200
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
          - name: localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: elasticsearch-config
            subPath: elasticsearch.yml
            mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/config/elasticsearch.yml
          - name: elasticsearch-config
            subPath: jvm.options
            mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/config/jvm.options
          - name: elasticsearch-config
            subPath: log4j2.properties
            mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/config/log4j2.properties
          - name: elasticsearch-data
            mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        resources:
                        {}
                        

      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: elasticsearch-config
        configMap:
          name: dev-aai-aai-elasticsearch-es-config
      - name: elasticsearch-data
        hostPath:
          path: /dockerdata-nfs/dev-aai/aai/elasticsearch/data
      restartPolicy: Always
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai-graphadmin
    chart: aai-graphadmin-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: aai-graphadmin
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aai-graphadmin
        release: dev-aai
      name: aai-graphadmin
      annotations:
        checksum/config: ab0ffc28e1876d98d4ba109bc88bc75fad6e35e7d0c05ac9ef3d5c2d015627a2
    spec:
      hostname: aai-graphadmin
    
      initContainers:
      - command:
      
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-create-db-schema
      
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: aai-graphadmin-readiness
      
      containers:
      - name: aai-graphadmin
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/aai-graphadmin:1.5.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: LOCAL_USER_ID
          value: "1000"
        - name: LOCAL_GROUP_ID
          value: "1000"
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/etc/appprops/janusgraph-realtime.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: janusgraph-realtime.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/etc/appprops/janusgraph-cached.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: janusgraph-cached.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/etc/appprops/aaiconfig.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: aaiconfig.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/aai/logroot/AAI-RES
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-logs
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: logback.xml
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/localhost-access-logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: localhost-access-logback.xml
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/etc/auth/realm.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: realm.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/application.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: application.properties
          
          
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/etc/auth/aai_keystore
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-auth-truststore-sec
          subPath: aai_keystore
          
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8449
        - containerPort: 5005
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8449
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
            {}
            

      # side car containers
      - name: filebeat-onap
        image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
          subPath: filebeat.yml
          name: filebeat-conf
        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-logs
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-filebeat

      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: aai-filebeat
      - name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-logs
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-configmap
      - name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-auth-truststore-sec
        secret:
         secretName: aai-common-truststore
         items:
          
           - key: aai_keystore
             path: aai_keystore
          
      restartPolicy: Always
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-aai-aai-graphgraph
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai-graphgraph
    chart: aai-graphgraph-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: aai-graphgraph
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aai-graphgraph
        release: dev-aai
      name: aai-graphgraph
      annotations:
        checksum/config: 2903e2433997c14e1ae546bf3480dee650e84c61ea711004532c097edccade42
    spec:
      hostname: aai-graphgraph
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - aai-schema-service
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: aai-graphgraph-readiness
      containers:
      - name: aai-graphgraph
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/aai-graphgraph:1.5"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: LOCAL_USER_ID
          value: "1000"
        - name: LOCAL_GROUP_ID
          value: "1000"
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /graphgraph/application.properties
          name: springapp-conf
          subPath: application.properties
          
          
        - mountPath: /graphgraph/etc/auth/aai_keystore
          name: auth-truststore-sec
          subPath: aai_keystore
          
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8453
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        
        resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
      - name: aai-common-aai-auth-mount
        secret:
          secretName: aai-common-aai-auth
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: springapp-conf
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-graphgraph-springapp-configmap
      - name: auth-truststore-sec
        secret:
         secretName: aai-common-truststore
         items:
          
           - key: aai_keystore
             path: aai_keystore
          
      restartPolicy: Always
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-aai-aai-modelloader
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai-modelloader
    chart: aai-modelloader-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: aai-modelloader
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aai-modelloader
        release: dev-aai
      name: aai-modelloader
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: aai-modelloader
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/model-loader:1.5.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: CONFIG_HOME
          value: /opt/app/model-loader/config/
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /opt/app/model-loader/config/model-loader.properties
          subPath: model-loader.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-modelloader-prop-config
        - mountPath: /opt/app/model-loader/config/auth/
          name: dev-aai-aai-modelloader-auth-config
        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-aai-aai-modelloader-logs
        - mountPath: /opt/app/model-loader/logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-modelloader-log-conf
          subPath: logback.xml
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        - containerPort: 8443
        resources:
            {}
            

      # side car containers
      - name: filebeat-onap
        image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
          subPath: filebeat.yml
          name: filebeat-conf
        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-aai-aai-modelloader-logs
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: aai-filebeat
        resources:
            {}
            
      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: dev-aai-aai-modelloader-prop-config
        configMap:
          name: dev-aai-aai-modelloader-prop
      - name: dev-aai-aai-modelloader-auth-config
        secret:
          secretName: dev-aai-aai-modelloader
      - name: filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: aai-filebeat
      - name: dev-aai-aai-modelloader-logs
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: aai-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-modelloader-log-conf
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-modelloader-log
      restartPolicy: Always
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

    spec:
      hostname: aai-resources
    
      
      initContainers:
      - command:
      
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-create-db-schema
      
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: aai-resources-readiness
      
    
      containers:
      - name: aai-resources
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/aai-resources:1.5.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: LOCAL_USER_ID
          value: "1000"
        - name: LOCAL_GROUP_ID
          value: "1000"
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/etc/appprops/janusgraph-realtime.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-config
          subPath: janusgraph-realtime.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/etc/appprops/janusgraph-cached.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-config
          subPath: janusgraph-cached.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/etc/appprops/aaiconfig.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-config
          subPath: aaiconfig.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/aai/logroot/AAI-RES
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-logs
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-config
          subPath: logback.xml
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/localhost-access-logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-config
          subPath: localhost-access-logback.xml
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/etc/auth/realm.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-config
          subPath: realm.properties
        
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/aaf/org.onap.aai.keyfile
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-aaf-certs
          subPath: org.onap.aai.keyfile
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/aaf/bath_config.csv
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-aaf-certs
          subPath: bath_config.csv
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/aaf/org.onap.aai.props
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-aaf-properties
          subPath: org.onap.aai.props
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/aaf/org.osaaf.location.props
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-aaf-properties
          subPath: org.osaaf.location.props
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/aaf/permissions.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-aaf-properties
          subPath: permissions.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/cadi.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-aaf-properties
          subPath: cadi.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/aaf/org.onap.aai.p12
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-aaf-certs
          subPath: org.onap.aai.p12
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/aaf/truststoreONAPall.jks
          name: aai-common-aai-auth-mount
          subPath: truststoreONAPall.jks
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/application.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-config
          subPath: application.properties
          
          
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-resources/resources/etc/auth/aai_keystore
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-auth-truststore-sec
          subPath: aai_keystore
          
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8447
        - containerPort: 5005
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8447
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
            {}
            

      # side car containers
      - name: filebeat-onap
        image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
          subPath: filebeat.yml
          name: filebeat-conf
        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-logs
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: dev-aai-aai-resources-filebeat
        resources:
            {}
            
    

      volumes:
      - name: aai-common-aai-auth-mount
        secret:
          secretName: aai-common-aai-auth
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: aai-filebeat
      - name: dev-aai-aai-resources-logs
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-resources-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-resources-config
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-resources-configmap
      - name: dev-aai-aai-resources-aaf-properties
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-resources-aaf-props
      - name: dev-aai-aai-resources-aaf-certs
        secret:
         secretName: dev-aai-aai-resources-aaf-keys
      - name: dev-aai-aai-resources-auth-truststore-sec
        secret:
         secretName: aai-common-truststore
         items:
          
           - key: aai_keystore
             path: aai_keystore
          
    
      restartPolicy: Always
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai-schema-service
    chart: aai-schema-service-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: aai-schema-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aai-schema-service
        release: dev-aai
      name: aai-schema-service
      annotations:
        checksum/config: 4a103044a2ec30c9dd03278dc9598fb7b5ac829057712fc72aba6bc9392db6a5
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: aai-schema-service
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/aai-schema-service:1.6.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: LOCAL_USER_ID
          value: "1000"
        - name: LOCAL_GROUP_ID
          value: "1000"
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-schema-service/resources/etc/appprops/aaiconfig.properties
          name: aaiconfig-conf
          subPath: aaiconfig.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/aai/logroot/AAI-SS
          name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service-logs
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-schema-service/resources/logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service-log-conf
          subPath: logback.xml
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-schema-service/resources/localhost-access-logback.xml
          name: localhost-access-log-conf
          subPath: localhost-access-logback.xml
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-schema-service/resources/etc/auth/realm.properties
          name: realm-conf
          subPath: realm.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-schema-service/resources/application.properties
          name: springapp-conf
          subPath: application.properties
          
          
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-schema-service/resources/etc/auth/aai_keystore
          name: auth-truststore-sec
          subPath: aai_keystore
          
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8452
        - containerPort: 5005
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8452
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
                        {}
                        

      # side car containers
      - name: filebeat-onap
        image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
          subPath: filebeat.yml
          name: filebeat-conf
        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service-logs
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service-filebeat
      volumes:
      - name: aai-common-aai-auth-mount
        secret:
          secretName: aai-common-aai-auth
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: aai-filebeat
      - name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service-logs
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service-log-conf
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service-log
      - name: localhost-access-log-conf
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service-localhost-access-log-configmap
      - name: springapp-conf
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service-springapp-configmap
      - name: aaiconfig-conf
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service-aaiconfig-configmap
      - name: realm-conf
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-schema-service-realm-configmap
      - name: auth-truststore-sec
        secret:
         secretName: aai-common-truststore
         items:
          
           - key: aai_keystore
             path: aai_keystore
          
      restartPolicy: Always
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-aai-aai-search-data
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai-search-data
    chart: aai-search-data-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: aai-search-data
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aai-search-data
        release: dev-aai
      name: aai-search-data
    spec:
    
      containers:
      - name: aai-search-data
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/search-data-service:1.5.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: CONFIG_HOME
          value: /opt/app/search-data-service/config/
        - name: KEY_STORE_PASSWORD
          value: OBF:1y0q1uvc1uum1uvg1pil1pjl1uuq1uvk1uuu1y10
        - name: KEY_MANAGER_PASSWORD
          value: OBF:1y0q1uvc1uum1uvg1pil1pjl1uuq1uvk1uuu1y10
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /opt/app/search-data-service/config/filter-config.json
          subPath: filter-config.json
          name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-config
        - mountPath: /opt/app/search-data-service/config/elastic-search.properties
          subPath: elastic-search.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-config
        - mountPath: /opt/app/search-data-service/config/analysis-config.json
          subPath: analysis-config.json
          name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-config
        - mountPath: /opt/app/search-data-service/config/es-payload-translation.json
          subPath: es-payload-translation.json
          name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-config
        - mountPath: /opt/app/search-data-service/config/dynamic-custom-template.json
          subPath: dynamic-custom-template.json
          name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-config
        - mountPath: /opt/app/search-data-service/config/auth/tomcat_keystore
          subPath: tomcat_keystore
          name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-auth-config
        - mountPath: /opt/app/search-data-service/config/auth/search_policy.json
          subPath: search_policy.json
          name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-search-policy-config
        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-logs
        - mountPath: /opt/app/search-data-service/bundleconfig/etc/logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-log-conf
          subPath: logback.xml
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9509
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9509
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9509
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
            {}
            

      # side car containers
      - name: filebeat-onap
        image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
          subPath: filebeat.yml
          name: filebeat-conf
        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-logs
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-filebeat

    

      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-config
        configMap:
          name: dev-aai-aai-search-data
      - name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-auth-config
        secret:
          secretName: dev-aai-aai-search-data-keystone
      - name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-search-policy-config
        secret:
          secretName: dev-aai-aai-search-data-policy
      - name: filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: aai-filebeat
      - name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-logs
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-log-conf
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-search-data-service-log
    
      restartPolicy: Always
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai-sparky-be
    chart: aai-sparky-be-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: aai-sparky-be
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aai-sparky-be
        release: dev-aai
      name: aai-sparky-be
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - aai-elasticsearch
        - --container-name
        - aai-search-data
        - --container-name
        - aai
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: aai-sparky-be-readiness
      containers:
      - name: aai-sparky-be
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/sparky-be:1.5.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always

        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /opt/app/sparky/config/auth/client-cert-onap.p12
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-auth-config
          subPath: client-cert-onap.p12

        - mountPath: /opt/app/sparky/config/auth/csp-cookie-filter.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-auth-config
          subPath: csp-cookie-filter.properties

        - mountPath: /opt/app/sparky/config/auth/org.onap.aai.p12
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-auth-config
          subPath: org.onap.aai.p12

        - mountPath: /opt/app/sparky/config/auth/truststoreONAPall.jks
          name: aai-common-aai-auth-mount
          subPath: truststoreONAPall.jks

        - mountPath: /opt/app/sparky/config/portal/
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-portal-config

        - mountPath: /opt/app/sparky/config/portal/BOOT-INF/classes/
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-portal-config-props

        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-logs

        - mountPath:  /opt/app/sparky/config/application.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-properties
          subPath: application.properties

        - mountPath:  /opt/app/sparky/config/application-resources.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-properties
          subPath: application-resources.properties

        - mountPath:  /opt/app/sparky/config/application-ssl.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-properties
          subPath: application-ssl.properties

        - mountPath:  /opt/app/sparky/config/application-oxm-default.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-properties
          subPath: application-oxm-default.properties

        - mountPath:  /opt/app/sparky/config/application-oxm-override.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-properties
          subPath: application-oxm-override.properties

        - mountPath:  /opt/app/sparky/config/application-oxm-schema-prod.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-properties
          subPath: application-oxm-schema-prod.properties

        - mountPath:  /opt/app/sparky/config/roles.config
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-properties
          subPath: roles.config

        - mountPath:  /opt/app/sparky/config/users.config
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-properties
          subPath: users.config

        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
            {}
            

      # side car containers
      - name: filebeat-onap
        image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
          subPath: filebeat.yml
          name: filebeat-conf
        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-logs
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: aai-sparky-filebeat
        resources:
            {}
            

      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime

      - name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-properties
        configMap:
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-prop

      - name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-config
        configMap:
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be

      - name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-portal-config
        configMap:
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-portal

      - name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-portal-config-props
        configMap:
          name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-portal-props

      - name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-auth-config
        secret:
          secretName: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be
      
      - name: aai-common-aai-auth-mount
        secret:
          secretName: aai-common-aai-auth
      
      - name: filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: aai-filebeat
      - name: dev-aai-aai-sparky-be-logs
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: aai-sparky-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: modeldir
        emptyDir: {}
      restartPolicy: Always
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

    spec:
      hostname: aai-traversal
    
      initContainers:
      - command:
      
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-create-db-schema
      
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: aai-traversal-readiness
    
      containers:
      - name: aai-traversal
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/aai-traversal:1.5.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: DISABLE_UPDATE_QUERY
          value: "true"
        - name: LOCAL_USER_ID
          value: "1000"
        - name: LOCAL_GROUP_ID
          value: "1000"
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/etc/appprops/janusgraph-realtime.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: janusgraph-realtime.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/etc/appprops/janusgraph-cached.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: janusgraph-cached.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/etc/appprops/aaiconfig.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: aaiconfig.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/aai/logroot/AAI-GQ
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-logs
        - mountPath: /opt/aai/logroot/AAI-GQ/misc
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-logs-misc
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: logback.xml
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/localhost-access-logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: localhost-access-logback.xml
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/etc/auth/realm.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: realm.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/aaf/org.onap.aai.keyfile
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-aaf-certs
          subPath: org.onap.aai.keyfile
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/aaf/bath_config.csv
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-aaf-certs
          subPath: bath_config.csv
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/aaf/org.onap.aai.props
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-aaf-properties
          subPath: org.onap.aai.props
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/aaf/org.osaaf.location.props
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-aaf-properties
          subPath: org.osaaf.location.props
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/aaf/permissions.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-aaf-properties
          subPath: permissions.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/cadi.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-aaf-properties
          subPath: cadi.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/aaf/org.onap.aai.p12
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-aaf-certs
          subPath: org.onap.aai.p12
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/aaf/truststoreONAPall.jks
          name: aai-common-aai-auth-mount
          subPath: truststoreONAPall.jks
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/application.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: application.properties
          
          
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/etc/auth/aai_keystore
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-auth-truststore-sec
          subPath: aai_keystore
          
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8446
        - containerPort: 5005
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8446
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
            {}
            

      # side car containers
      - name: filebeat-onap
        image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
          subPath: filebeat.yml
          name: filebeat-conf
        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-logs
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-filebeat
        resources:
            {}
            
      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: aai-filebeat
      - name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-logs
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-logs-misc
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-configmap
      - name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-aaf-properties
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-aaf-props
      - name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-aaf-certs
        secret:
         secretName: dev-aai-aai-traversal-aaf-keys
      - name: aai-common-aai-auth-mount
        secret:
          secretName: aai-common-aai-auth
      - name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-auth-truststore-sec
        secret:
         secretName: aai-common-truststore
         items:
          
           - key: aai_keystore
             path: aai_keystore
          
      restartPolicy: Always
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-aai-aai
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai
    chart: aai-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aai
        release: dev-aai
      name: dev-aai
      annotations:
        checksum/config: dce9f6775db5de2936375b26def30de672253873ef2b0e2d55b8cfa5f7419832
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - aai-resources
        - --container-name
        - aai-traversal
        - --container-name
        - aai-graphadmin
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: aai-readiness
      containers:
      - name: aai
        image: "docker.io/aaionap/haproxy:1.4.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /dev/log
          name: aai-service-log
        - mountPath: /usr/local/etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
        
          subPath: haproxy.cfg
        
          name: haproxy-cfg
        - mountPath: /etc/ssl/private/aai.pem
          name: aai-pem
          subPath: aai.pem
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8443
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /aai/util/echo
            port: 8443
            scheme: HTTPS
            httpHeaders:
            - name: X-FromAppId
              value: OOM_ReadinessCheck
      
            - name: X-TransactionId
              value: 38c579bf-3360-4712-9525-809092534a4a
            - name: Accept
              value: application/json
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
            {}
            

      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: aai-service-log
          hostPath:
            path: "/dev/log"
        - name: haproxy-cfg
          configMap:
            name: aai-deployment-configmap
        - name: aai-pem
          secret:
            secretName: aai-haproxy-secret
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: aai/charts/aai-graphadmin/templates/job.yaml
#
# ============LICENSE_START=======================================================
# org.onap.aai

# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#    http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.

# In ONAP, the following job will always be run on each installation
# The following job will go through the latest oxm and
# create properties based on the data type defined in the oxm
# and create the required indexes for the appropriate properties
# This can be run multiple times as the code if the index or property already exists
# then the index or property won't be created again
# NOTE - During the execution of the createSchema job, there should
# be no other janusgraph connection to the graph as its the reason
# that resources traversal and graphadmin wait until this job is done
# If you are using an existing cassandra cluster not coming from oom
# then it is your job to ensure that there are no connections to the database
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-create-db-schema
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai-graphadmin-job
    chart: aai-graphadmin-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  backoffLimit: 20
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aai-graphadmin-job
        release: dev-aai
      name: aai-graphadmin
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - cassandra
        - --container-name
        - aai-schema-service
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: aai-graphadmin-readiness
      containers:
      - name: aai-graphadmin-job
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/aai-graphadmin:1.5.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - docker-entrypoint.sh
        - createDBSchema.sh
        env:
        - name: LOCAL_USER_ID
          value: "1000"
        - name: LOCAL_GROUP_ID
          value: "1000"
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/etc/appprops/janusgraph-realtime.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: janusgraph-realtime.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/etc/appprops/janusgraph-cached.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: janusgraph-cached.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/etc/appprops/aaiconfig.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: aaiconfig.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/aai/logroot/AAI-GA
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-logs
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: logback.xml
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/localhost-access-logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: localhost-access-logback.xml
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/application.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
          subPath: application.properties
          
          
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-graphadmin/resources/etc/auth/aai_keystore
          name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-auth-truststore-sec
          subPath: aai_keystore
          
        resources:
            {}
            
      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: aai-filebeat
      - name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-logs
        hostPath:
          path: /dockerdata-nfs/dev-aai/aai/aai-graphadmin-create-db-schema
      - name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-config
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-configmap
      - name: dev-aai-aai-graphadmin-auth-truststore-sec
