apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-update-query-data
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: aai-traversal
    chart: aai-traversal-5.0.0
    release: dev-aai
    heritage: Tiller

spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: aai-traversal-job
        release: dev-aai
      name: aai-traversal
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - aai
        
        - --container-name
        - aaf-locate
        
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: aai-traversal-readiness
      containers:
      - name: aai-traversal-job
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/aai-traversal:1.5.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
        - bash
        - "-c"
        - |
          set -x
          if [ ! -d /opt/aai/logroot/AAI-GQ/misc ]; then mkdir -p /opt/aai/logroot/AAI-GQ/misc; fi
          until nc -w10 -z -v aai.onap 8443; do echo "Retrying to reach aai on port 8443"; done;
          bash -x /opt/app/aai-traversal/docker-entrypoint.sh install/updateQueryData.sh
        env:
        - name: LOCAL_USER_ID
          value: "1000"
        - name: LOCAL_GROUP_ID
          value: "1000"
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/etc/appprops/janusgraph-realtime.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: janusgraph-realtime.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/etc/appprops/janusgraph-cached.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: janusgraph-cached.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/etc/appprops/aaiconfig.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: aaiconfig.properties
        - mountPath: /opt/aai/logroot/AAI-GQ/
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-logs
        - mountPath: /opt/aai/logroot/AAI-GQ/misc
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-logs-misc
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: logback.xml
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/localhost-access-logback.xml
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: localhost-access-logback.xml
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/application.properties
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
          subPath: application.properties
          
          
        - mountPath: /opt/app/aai-traversal/resources/etc/auth/aai_keystore
          name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-auth-truststore-sec
          subPath: aai_keystore
          
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: aai-filebeat
      - name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-logs
        hostPath:
          path: /dockerdata-nfs/dev-aai/aai/aai-traversal-update-query
      - name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-logs-misc
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-config
        configMap:
         name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-configmap
      - name: dev-aai-aai-traversal-auth-truststore-sec
        secret:
         secretName: aai-common-truststore
         items:
          
           - key: aai_keystore
             path: aai_keystore
          
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

        mountPath: /dockerdata-nfs

        password: docker

# Source: appc/charts/dgbuilder/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-appc-appc-dgbuilder-scripts
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: appc-dgbuilder
    chart: dgbuilder-5.0.0
    release: dev-appc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  createReleaseDir.sh: "# Copyright  2018 AT&T, Amdocs, Bell Canada\n#\n# Licensed
    under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\n# you may not use this
    file except in compliance with the License.\n# You may obtain a copy of the License
    at\n#\n#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\n#\n# Unless required
    by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\n# distributed under the License
    is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\n# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
    KIND, either express or implied.\n# See the License for the specific language governing
    permissions and\n# limitations under the License.\n\n#!/bin/bash\nexport PATH=$PATH:.\nappDir=$(pwd)\nif
    [ \"$#\" != 3 -a \"$#\" != 4 ]\nthen\n\techo \"Usage $0 releaseDir  loginId emailAddress
    [gitLocalRepository]\"\n\techo \"Note: Specify the gitLocalRepository path if you
    would want to be able to import flows from your local git repository\"\n\texit\nfi\nif
    [ ! -e \"releases\" ]\nthen\n\tmkdir releases\nfi\nreleaseDir=\"$1\"\nname=\"Release
    $releaseDir\"\nloginId=\"$2\"\nemailid=\"$3\"\ndbHost=\"appc-dbhost.onap\"\ndbPort=\"3306\"\ndbName=\"sdnctl\"\ndbUser=\"sdnctl\"\ndbPassword=\"gamma\"\ngitLocalRepository=\"$4\"\n\nlastPort=$(find
    \"releases/\" -name \"customSettings.js\" |xargs grep uiPort|cut -d: -f2|sed -e
    s/,//|sort|tail -1)\necho $lastPort|grep uiPort >/dev/null 2>&1\nif [ \"$?\" ==
    \"0\" ]\nthen\nlastPort=$(find \"releases/\" -name \"customSettings.js\" |xargs
    grep uiPort|cut -d: -f3|sed -e s/,//|sort|tail -1)\nfi\n#echo $lastPort\nif [ \"${lastPort}\"
    == \"\" ]\nthen\n\tlastPort=\"3099\"\nfi\nlet nextPort=$(expr $lastPort+1)\n#echo
    $nextPort\nif [ ! -e \"releases/$releaseDir\" ]\nthen\nmkdir releases/$releaseDir\ncd
    releases/$releaseDir\nmkdir flows\nmkdir flows/shared\nmkdir flows/shared/backups\nmkdir
    html\nmkdir xml\nmkdir lib\nmkdir lib/flows\nmkdir logs\nmkdir conf\nmkdir codecloud\ncustomSettingsFile=\"customSettings.js\"\nif
    [ ! -e \"./$customSettingsFile\" ]\nthen\n\techo \"module.exports = {\" >$customSettingsFile\n\techo
    \"\t\t'name' : '$name',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'emailAddress' :'$emailid',\"
    >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'uiPort' :$nextPort,\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo
    \"\t\t'mqttReconnectTime': 15000,\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'serialReconnectTime'
    : 15000,\"  >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'debugMaxLength': 1000,\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo
    \"\t\t'htmlPath': 'releases/$releaseDir/html/',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo
    \"\t\t'xmlPath': 'releases/$releaseDir/xml/',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'flowFile'
    : 'releases/$releaseDir/flows/flows.json',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'sharedDir':
    'releases/$releaseDir/flows/shared',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'userDir'
    : 'releases/$releaseDir',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'httpAuth': {user:'$loginId',pass:'cc03e747a6afbbcbf8be7668acfebee5'},\"
    >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'dbHost': '$dbHost',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo
    \"\t\t'dbPort': '$dbPort',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'dbName': '$dbName',\"
    >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'dbUser': '$dbUser',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo
    \"\t\t'dbPassword': '$dbPassword',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'gitLocalRepository':
    '$gitLocalRepository'\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'restConfUrl': '$restConfUrl',\"
    >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'restConfUser': '$restConfUser',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo
    \"\t\t'restConfPassword': '$restConfPassword',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'formatXML':
    '$formatXML',\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'formatJSON': '$formatJSON',\"
    >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo \"\t\t'enableHttps': true\" >>$customSettingsFile\n\techo
    \"\t\t}\" >>$customSettingsFile\nfi\n\t#echo \"Created custom settings  file $customSettingsFile\"\n\techo
    \"Done .....\"\nelse\n\techo \"ERROR:customSettings file $customSettingsFile already
    exists for $releaseDir\"\n\texit\nfi\n#echo \"Content of custom settings file\"\n#echo
    \"============================================================================\"\n#\tcat
    $customSettingsFile\n#echo \"============================================================================\"\nsvclogicPropFile=\"./conf/svclogic.properties\"\nif
    [ ! -d \"${appDir}/yangFiles\" ]\nthen\n\tmkdir -p \"${appDir}/yangFiles\"\nfi\nif
    [ ! -d \"${appDir}/generatedJS\" ]\nthen\n\tmkdir -p \"${appDir}/generatedJS\"\nfi\n\nif
    [ ! -e \"./$svclogicPropFile\" ]\nthen\n\techo \"org.onap.ccsdk.sli.dbtype=jdbc\"
    >$svclogicPropFile\n\techo \"org.onap.ccsdk.sli.jdbc.url=jdbc:mysql://appc-dbhost.onap:3306/sdnctl\"
    >>$svclogicPropFile\n\techo \"org.onap.ccsdk.sli.jdbc.database=sdnctl\" >>$svclogicPropFile\n\techo
    \"org.onap.ccsdk.sli.jdbc.user=sdnctl\" >>$svclogicPropFile\n\techo \"org.onap.ccsdk.sli.jdbc.password=gamma\"
    >>$svclogicPropFile\nfi\nif [ ! -e \"${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\" ]\nthen\n\techo
    \"module.exports = {\\\"flowShareUsers\\\":\" >${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\n        echo
    \"\t[\" >>${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\n        echo \"\t]\" >>${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\n
    \       echo \"}\" >>${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\nfi\ngrep \"$releaseDir\" ${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js
    >/dev/null 2>&1\nif [ \"$?\" != \"0\" ]\nthen\n\tnum_of_lines=$(cat ${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js|wc
    -l)\n\tif [ $num_of_lines -gt 4 ]\n\tthen\n\t\tcontent=$(head -n -2 ${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js)\n\t\techo
    \"${content},\" > ${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\n\telse\n\t\tcontent=$(head -n -2
    ${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js)\n\t\techo \"$content\" > ${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\n\tfi\n\techo
    \"\t{\" >> ${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\n\techo \"          \\\"name\\\" : \\\"$name\\\",\"
    >> ${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\n\techo \"          \\\"rootDir\\\" : \\\"$releaseDir\\\"\"
    >> ${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\n\techo \"\t}\" >> ${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\n\techo
    \"\t]\" >> ${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\n\techo \"}\" >> ${appDir}/flowShareUsers.js\nfi\n"
  customSettings.js: |
    /* Copyright  2017 AT&T, Amdocs, Bell Canada
    *
    * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    * you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    * You may obtain a copy of the License at
    *
    *       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    *
    * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    * limitations under the License.
    */
  
    module.exports={
        "name": "Release sdnc1.0",
        "emailAddress": "dguser@onap.org",
        "uiPort": 3100,
        "mqttReconnectTime": 15000,
        "serialReconnectTime": 15000,
        "debugMaxLength": 1000,
        "htmlPath": "releases/sdnc1.0/html/",
        "xmlPath": "releases/sdnc1.0/xml/",
        "flowFile": "releases/sdnc1.0/flows/flows.json",
        "sharedDir": "releases/sdnc1.0/flows/shared",
        "userDir": "releases/sdnc1.0",
        "httpAuth": {
            "user": "dguser",
            "pass": "cc03e747a6afbbcbf8be7668acfebee5"
        },
        "dbHost": "appc-dbhost.onap",
        "dbPort": "3306",
        "dbName": "sdnctl",
        "dbUser": "sdnctl",
        "dbPassword": "gamma",
        "gitLocalRepository": "",
        "restConfUrl": "http://localhost:8181/restconf/operations/SLI-API:execute-graph",
        "restConfUser": "admin",
        "restConfPassword": "admin",
        "formatXML": "Y",
        "formatJSON": "Y",
        "httpRoot": "/",
        "disableEditor": false,
        "httpAdminRoot": "/",
        "httpAdminAuth": {
            "user": "dguser",
            "pass": "cc03e747a6afbbcbf8be7668acfebee5"
        },
        "httpNodeRoot": "/",
        "httpNodeAuth": {
            "user": "dguser",
            "pass": "cc03e747a6afbbcbf8be7668acfebee5"
        },
        "uiHost": "0.0.0.0",
        "version": "0.9.1",
        "performGitPull": "N",
        "enableHttps" : true

# Source: appc/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-appc-appc-logging-cfg
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: appc
    chart: appc-5.0.0
    release: dev-appc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  org.ops4j.pax.logging.cfg: |+
    ################################################################################
    #
    #  ============LICENSE_START=======================================================
    #  ONAP : APPC
    #  ================================================================================
    #  Copyright (C) 2017-2018 AT&T Intellectual Property. All rights reserved.
    #  ================================================================================
    #  Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    #  you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    #  You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    #  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    #  distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    #  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    #  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    #  limitations under the License.
    #  ============LICENSE_END=========================================================
    #
    ################################################################################
  
    # Common pattern layout for appenders
    log4j2.pattern = %d{ISO8601} | %-5p | %-16t | %-32c{1} | %X{bundle.id} - %X{bundle.name} - %X{bundle.version} | %m%n
  
    # Root logger
    log4j2.rootLogger.level = INFO
    # uncomment to use asynchronous loggers, which require mvn:com.lmax/disruptor/3.3.2 library
    #log4j2.rootLogger.type = asyncRoot
    #log4j2.rootLogger.includeLocation = false
    log4j2.rootLogger.appenderRef.RollingFile.ref = RollingFile
    log4j2.rootLogger.appenderRef.PaxOsgi.ref = PaxOsgi
    log4j2.rootLogger.appenderRef.Console.ref = Console
    log4j2.rootLogger.appenderRef.Console.filter.threshold.type = ThresholdFilter
    log4j2.rootLogger.appenderRef.Console.filter.threshold.level = ${karaf.log.console:-OFF}
  
    # Loggers configuration
  
    # Spifly logger
    log4j2.logger.spifly.name = org.apache.aries.spifly
    log4j2.logger.spifly.level = WARN
  
    # Security audit logger
    log4j2.logger.audit.name = org.apache.karaf.jaas.modules.audit
    log4j2.logger.audit.level = INFO
    log4j2.logger.audit.additivity = false
    log4j2.logger.audit.appenderRef.AuditRollingFile.ref = AuditRollingFile
  
    # Appenders configuration
  
    # Console appender not used by default (see log4j2.rootLogger.appenderRefs)
    log4j2.appender.console.type = Console
    log4j2.appender.console.name = Console
    log4j2.appender.console.layout.type = PatternLayout
    log4j2.appender.console.layout.pattern = ${log4j2.pattern}
  
    # Rolling file appender
    log4j2.appender.rolling.type = RollingRandomAccessFile
    log4j2.appender.rolling.name = RollingFile
    log4j2.appender.rolling.fileName = ${karaf.data}/log/karaf.log
    log4j2.appender.rolling.filePattern = ${karaf.data}/log/karaf.log.%i
    # uncomment to not force a disk flush
    #log4j2.appender.rolling.immediateFlush = false
    log4j2.appender.rolling.append = true
    log4j2.appender.rolling.layout.type = PatternLayout
    log4j2.appender.rolling.layout.pattern = ${log4j2.pattern}
    log4j2.appender.rolling.policies.type = Policies
    log4j2.appender.rolling.policies.size.type = SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy
    log4j2.appender.rolling.policies.size.size = 16MB
  
    # Audit file appender
    log4j2.appender.audit.type = RollingRandomAccessFile
    log4j2.appender.audit.name = AuditRollingFile
    log4j2.appender.audit.fileName = ${karaf.data}/security/audit.log
    log4j2.appender.audit.filePattern = ${karaf.data}/security/audit.log.%i
    log4j2.appender.audit.append = true
    log4j2.appender.audit.layout.type = PatternLayout
    log4j2.appender.audit.layout.pattern = ${log4j2.pattern}
    log4j2.appender.audit.policies.type = Policies
    log4j2.appender.audit.policies.size.type = SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy
    log4j2.appender.audit.policies.size.size = 8MB
  
    # OSGi appender
    log4j2.appender.osgi.type = PaxOsgi
    log4j2.appender.osgi.name = PaxOsgi
    log4j2.appender.osgi.filter = *
  
    # help with identification of maven-related problems with pax-url-aether
    #log4j2.logger.aether.name = shaded.org.eclipse.aether
    #log4j2.logger.aether.level = TRACE
    #log4j2.logger.http-headers.name = shaded.org.apache.http.headers
    #log4j2.logger.http-headers.level = DEBUG
    #log4j2.logger.maven.name = org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn
    #log4j2.logger.maven.level = TRACE
---
# Source: appc/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-appc-appc-onap-appc-bin
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: appc
    chart: appc-5.0.0
    release: dev-appc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  health_check.sh: |
    #!/bin/bash -x
    # Copyright  2018  AT&T, Amdocs, Bell Canada Intellectual Property.  All rights reserved.
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
  
    waiting_bundles=$(/opt/opendaylight/current/bin/client bundle:list | grep Waiting | wc -l)
    run_level=$(/opt/opendaylight/current/bin/client system:start-level)
  
      if [ "$run_level" == "Level 100" ] && [ "$waiting_bundles" -lt "1" ]
      then
        echo APPC is healthy.
      else
        echo APPC is not healthy.
        exit 1
      fi
  
    exit 0
  installAppcDb.sh: |+
    ###
    # ============LICENSE_START=======================================================
    # APPC
    # ================================================================================
    # Copyright (C) 2017 AT&T Intellectual Property. All rights reserved.
    # Modifications Copyright  2018 Amdocs,Bell Canada
    # ================================================================================
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
    # ============LICENSE_END=========================================================
    ###
  
    SDNC_HOME=${SDNC_HOME:-/opt/onap/ccsdk}
    APPC_HOME=${APPC_HOME:-/opt/onap/appc}
    MYSQL_PASSWD=${MYSQL_PASSWD:-secretpassword}
  
    APPC_DB_USER=${APPC_DB_USER:-appcctl}
    APPC_DB_PASSWD=${APPC_DB_PASSWD:-appcctl}
    APPC_DB_DATABASE=${SDN_DB_DATABASE:-appcctl}
  
  
    # Create tablespace and user account
    mysql -h appc-dbhost.onap -u root -p${MYSQL_PASSWD} mysql <<-END
    CREATE DATABASE ${APPC_DB_DATABASE};
    CREATE USER '${APPC_DB_USER}'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY '${APPC_DB_PASSWD}';
    CREATE USER '${APPC_DB_USER}'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '${APPC_DB_PASSWD}';
    GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ${APPC_DB_DATABASE}.* TO '${APPC_DB_USER}'@'localhost' WITH GRANT OPTION;
    GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ${APPC_DB_DATABASE}.* TO '${APPC_DB_USER}'@'%' WITH GRANT OPTION;
    commit;
    END
  
    if [ -f ${APPC_HOME}/data/appcctl.dump ]
    then
      mysql -h appc-dbhost.onap -u root -p${MYSQL_PASSWD} appcctl < ${APPC_HOME}/data/appcctl.dump
    fi
  
    if [ -f ${APPC_HOME}/data/sdnctl.dump ]
    then
      mysql -h appc-dbhost.onap -u root -p${MYSQL_PASSWD} sdnctl < ${APPC_HOME}/data/sdnctl.dump
    fi
  
    if [ -f ${APPC_HOME}/data/sqlData.dump ]
    then
      mysql -h appc-dbhost.onap -u root -p${MYSQL_PASSWD} sdnctl < ${APPC_HOME}/data/sqlData.dump
    fi
  
  startODL.sh: |
    #!/bin/bash -x
  
    ###
    # ============LICENSE_START=======================================================
    # APPC
    # ================================================================================
    # Copyright (C) 2017-2019 AT&T Intellectual Property. All rights reserved.
    # Modifications Copyright  2018 Amdocs,Bell Canada
    # ================================================================================
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
    # ============LICENSE_END=========================================================
    # ECOMP is a trademark and service mark of AT&T Intellectual Property.
    ###
  
    #
    # This script takes care of installing the SDNC & APPC platform components
    #  if not already installed, and starts the APPC Docker Container
    #
    #set -x
  
    function enable_odl_cluster(){
      if [ -z $APPC_REPLICAS ]; then
         echo "APPC_REPLICAS is not configured in Env field"
         exit
      fi
  
      echo "Update cluster information statically"
      hm=$(hostname)
      echo "Get current Hostname ${hm}"
  
      node=($(echo ${hm} | sed 's/-[0-9]*$//g'))
      node_index=($(echo ${hm} | awk -F"-" '{print $NF}'))
      node_list="${node}-0.appc-cluster.onap";
  
      for ((i=1;i<${APPC_REPLICAS};i++));
      do
        node_list="${node_list} ${node}-$i.appc-cluster.onap"
      done
  
      /opt/opendaylight/current/bin/configure_cluster.sh $((node_index+1)) ${node_list}
    }
  
    ODL_HOME=${ODL_HOME:-/opt/opendaylight/current}
    SDNC_HOME=${SDNC_HOME:-/opt/onap/ccsdk}
    APPC_HOME=${APPC_HOME:-/opt/onap/appc}
    SLEEP_TIME=${SLEEP_TIME:-120}
    MYSQL_PASSWD=${MYSQL_PASSWD:-secretpassword}
    ENABLE_ODL_CLUSTER=${ENABLE_ODL_CLUSTER:-false}
    ENABLE_AAF=${ENABLE_AAF:-true}
    DBINIT_DIR=${DBINIT_DIR:-/opt/opendaylight/current/daexim}
  
    #
    # Wait for database to init properly
    #
    echo "Waiting for mariadbgalera"
    until mysql -h appc-dbhost.onap -u root -psecretpassword mysql &> /dev/null
    do
      printf "."
      sleep 1
    done
    echo -e "\nmariadbgalera ready"
  
    if [ ! -d ${DBINIT_DIR} ]
    then
        mkdir -p ${DBINIT_DIR}
    fi
  
    if [ ! -f ${DBINIT_DIR}/.installed ]
    then
            sdnc_db_exists=$(mysql -h appc-dbhost.onap -u root -psecretpassword mysql <<-END
    show databases like 'sdnctl';
    END
    )
            if [ "x${sdnc_db_exists}" == "x" ]
            then
                echo "Installing SDNC database"
                ${SDNC_HOME}/bin/installSdncDb.sh
  
                appc_db_exists=$(mysql -h appc-dbhost.onap -u root -psecretpassword mysql <<-END
    show databases like 'appcctl';
    END
    )
                if [ "x${appc_db_exists}" == "x" ]
                then
                  echo "Installing APPC database"
                  ${APPC_HOME}/bin/installAppcDb.sh
                fi
            else
                sleep 30
            fi
  
            echo "Installed at `date`" > ${DBINIT_DIR}/.installed
    fi
  
  
    if [ ! -f ${SDNC_HOME}/.installed ]
    then
            echo "Installing ODL Host Key"
            ${SDNC_HOME}/bin/installOdlHostKey.sh
  
    #        echo "Copying a working version of the logging configuration into the opendaylight etc folder"
    #        cp ${APPC_HOME}/data/org.ops4j.pax.logging.cfg ${ODL_HOME}/etc/org.ops4j.pax.logging.cfg
  
  
            echo "Waiting ${SLEEP_TIME} seconds for OpenDaylight to initialize"
            sleep ${SLEEP_TIME}
  
  
            if [ -x ${SDNC_HOME}/svclogic/bin/install.sh ]
            then
                    echo "Installing directed graphs"
                    ${SDNC_HOME}/svclogic/bin/install.sh
            fi
  
            if [ -x ${APPC_HOME}/svclogic/bin/install-converted-dgs.sh ]
            then
                    echo "Installing APPC JSON DGs converted to XML using dg-loader"
                    ${APPC_HOME}/svclogic/bin/install-converted-dgs.sh
            fi
  
            if $ENABLE_ODL_CLUSTER
            then
                    echo "Enabling Opendaylight cluster features"
                    enable_odl_cluster
            fi
  
            echo "Copying the aaa shiro configuration into opendaylight"
            mkdir -p ${ODL_HOME}/etc/opendaylight/datastore/initial/config
            if $ENABLE_AAF
            then
                 cp ${APPC_HOME}/data/properties/aaa-app-config.xml ${ODL_HOME}/etc/opendaylight/datastore/initial/config/aaa-app-config.xml
            else
                 cp ${APPC_HOME}/data/aaa-app-config.xml ${ODL_HOME}/etc/opendaylight/datastore/initial/config/aaa-app-config.xml
            fi
  
    fi
  
    # Move journal and snapshots directory to persistent storage
  
    hostdir=${ODL_HOME}/daexim/$(hostname -s)
    if [ ! -d $hostdir ]
    then
        mkdir -p $hostdir
        if [ -d ${ODL_HOME}/journal ]
        then
            mv ${ODL_HOME}/journal ${hostdir}
        else
            mkdir ${hostdir}/journal
        fi
        if [ -d ${ODL_HOME}/snapshots ]
        then
            mv ${ODL_HOME}/snapshots ${hostdir}
        else
            mkdir ${hostdir}/snapshots
        fi
    fi
  
    ln -s ${hostdir}/journal ${ODL_HOME}/journal
    ln -s ${hostdir}/snapshots ${ODL_HOME}/snapshots
  
    echo "Starting cdt-proxy-service jar, logging to ${APPC_HOME}/cdt-proxy-service/jar.log"
    java -jar ${APPC_HOME}/cdt-proxy-service/cdt-proxy-service.jar > ${APPC_HOME}/cdt-proxy-service/jar.log &
  
    echo "Adding a property system.properties for AAF cadi.properties location"
    echo "" >> ${ODL_HOME}/etc/system.properties
    echo "cadi_prop_files=${APPC_HOME}/data/properties/cadi.properties" >> ${ODL_HOME}/etc/system.properties
    echo "" >> ${ODL_HOME}/etc/system.properties
  
    echo "Adding a value to property appc.asdc.env in appc.properties for appc-asdc-listener feature"
    echo "" >> $APPC_HOME/data/properties/appc.properties
    echo "appc.asdc.env=$DMAAP_TOPIC_ENV" >> $APPC_HOME/data/properties/appc.properties
    echo "" >> $APPC_HOME/data/properties/appc.properties
  
    echo "Copying jetty, keystore for https into opendalight"
    cp ${APPC_HOME}/data/jetty.xml ${ODL_HOME}/etc/jetty.xml
    cp ${APPC_HOME}/data/keystore ${ODL_HOME}/etc/keystore
    cp ${APPC_HOME}/data/custom.properties ${ODL_HOME}/etc/custom.properties
  
    echo "Copying a working version of the logging configuration into the opendaylight etc folder"
    cp ${APPC_HOME}/data/org.ops4j.pax.logging.cfg ${ODL_HOME}/etc/org.ops4j.pax.logging.cfg
  
    ODL_BOOT_FEATURES_EXTRA="odl-netconf-connector,odl-restconf-noauth,odl-netconf-clustered-topology,odl-mdsal-clustering"
    sed -i -e "\|featuresBoot[^a-zA-Z]|s|$|,${ODL_BOOT_FEATURES_EXTRA}|"  $ODL_HOME/etc/org.apache.karaf.features.cfg
  
    exec ${APPC_HOME}/bin/dockerInstall.sh &
    echo "Starting OpenDaylight"
    exec ${ODL_HOME}/bin/karaf server
---
# Source: appc/templates/configmap.yaml

  namespace: onap

    release: dev-appc
    heritage: Tiller

    org.onap.ccsdk.sli.dbtype = jdbc
    org.onap.ccsdk.sli.jdbc.url = jdbc:mysql://appc-dbhost.onap:3306/sdnctl

# Source: appc/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-appc-appc-onap-appc-data-properties
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: appc
    chart: appc-5.0.0
    release: dev-appc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  aaa-app-config.xml: |+
    <?xml version="1.0" ?>
    <!--
    ###
    # ============LICENSE_START=======================================================
    # APPC
    # ================================================================================
    # Copyright (C) 2018 AT&T Intellectual Property. All rights reserved.
    # Modifications Copyright  2018 Amdocs,Bell Canada
    # ================================================================================
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
    # ============LICENSE_END=========================================================
    ###
     -->
  
    <shiro-configuration xmlns="urn:opendaylight:aaa:app:config">
  
        <!--
          ================================= TokenAuthRealm ==================================
          =                                                                                 =
          = Use org.onap.aaf.cadi.shiro.AAFRealm to enable AAF authentication               =
          = Use org.opendaylight.aaa.shiro.realm.TokenAuthRealm                             =
          ===================================================================================
        -->
        <main>
            <pair-key>tokenAuthRealm</pair-key>
    <!--        <pair-value>org.opendaylight.aaa.shiro.realm.TokenAuthRealm</pair-value> -->
            <pair-value>org.onap.aaf.cadi.shiro.AAFRealm</pair-value>
        </main>
  
  
        <!-- add tokenAuthRealm as the only default realm -->
        <main>
            <pair-key>securityManager.realms</pair-key>
            <pair-value>$tokenAuthRealm</pair-value>
        </main>
  
        <!-- Used to support OAuth2 use case. -->
        <main>
            <pair-key>authcBasic</pair-key>
            <pair-value>org.opendaylight.aaa.shiro.filters.ODLHttpAuthenticationFilter</pair-value>
        </main>
  
        <!-- in order to track AAA challenge attempts -->
        <main>
            <pair-key>accountingListener</pair-key>
            <pair-value>org.opendaylight.aaa.shiro.filters.AuthenticationListener</pair-value>
        </main>
        <main>
            <pair-key>securityManager.authenticator.authenticationListeners</pair-key>
            <pair-value>$accountingListener</pair-value>
        </main>
  
        <!-- Model based authorization scheme supporting RBAC for REST endpoints -->
        <main>
            <pair-key>dynamicAuthorization</pair-key>
            <pair-value>org.opendaylight.aaa.shiro.realm.MDSALDynamicAuthorizationFilter</pair-value>
        </main>
  
  
        <!--
          ===================================================================================
          =                                      URLS                                       =
          = For AAF use <pair-value> authcBasic, roles[org.onap.appc.odl|odl-api\*]         =
          = org.onap.appc.odl|odl-api|* can be replaced with other AAF permissions          =
          = For default <pair-value> authcBasic, roles[admin]                               =
          ===================================================================================
        -->
  
        <!-- restrict access to some endpoints by default -->
        <urls>
            <pair-key>/auth/**</pair-key>
    <!--        <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[admin], dynamicAuthorization</pair-value> -->
            <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[org.onap.appc.odl:odl-api:*]</pair-value>
        </urls>
        <urls>
            <pair-key>/restconf/config/aaa-cert-mdsal**</pair-key>
    <!--        <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[admin]</pair-value> -->
            <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[org.onap.appc.odl:odl-api:*]</pair-value>
        </urls>
        <urls>
            <pair-key>/restconf/operational/aaa-cert-mdsal**</pair-key>
    <!--        <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[admin]</pair-value> -->
            <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[org.onap.appc.odl:odl-api:*]</pair-value>
        </urls>
        <urls>
            <pair-key>/restconf/operations/aaa-cert-rpc**</pair-key>
    <!--        <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[admin]</pair-value> -->
            <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[org.onap.appc.odl:odl-api:*]</pair-value>
        </urls>
        <urls>
            <pair-key>/restconf/config/aaa-authn-model**</pair-key>
    <!--        <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[admin]</pair-value> -->
            <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[org.onap.appc.odl:odl-api:*]</pair-value>
        </urls>
        <urls>
            <pair-key>/restconf/operational/aaa-authn-model**</pair-key>
    <!--        <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[admin]</pair-value> -->
            <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[org.onap.appc.odl:odl-api:*]</pair-value>
        </urls>
        <urls>
            <pair-key>/restconf/operations/cluster-admin**</pair-key>
    <!--        <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[admin]</pair-value> -->
            <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[org.onap.appc.odl:odl-api:*]</pair-value>
        </urls>
        <urls>
            <pair-key>/**</pair-key>
    <!--        <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[admin]</pair-value> -->
            <pair-value>authcBasic, roles[org.onap.appc.odl:odl-api:*]</pair-value>
        </urls>
    </shiro-configuration>
  
  aaiclient.properties: "###\n# ============LICENSE_START=======================================================\n#
    APPC\n# ================================================================================\n#
    Copyright (C) 2018 AT&T Intellectual Property. All rights reserved.\n# Modifications
    Copyright  2018 Amdocs,Bell Canada\n# ================================================================================\n#
    Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\n# you may not
    use this file except in compliance with the License.\n# You may obtain a copy of
    the License at\n# \n#      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\n# \n# Unless
    required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\n# distributed under
    the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\n# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS
    OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\n# See the License for the specific language
    governing permissions and\n# limitations under the License.\n# ============LICENSE_END=========================================================\n###\n\n#\n#
    Configuration file for A&AI Client\n#\n\n#\n# Certificate keystore and truststore\n#\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.ssl.trust=/opt/onap/appc/data/stores/truststoreONAPall.jks\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.ssl.trust.psswd=changeit\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.ssl.key=/opt/onap/appc/data/stores/truststoreONAPall.jks\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.ssl.key.psswd=changeit\n\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.client.name=appc@appc.onap.org\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.client.psswd=demo123456!\n\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.application=openECOMP\nconnection.timeout=60000\nread.timeout=60000\n\n#\n#
    Configuration file for A&AI Client\n#\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.uri=https://aai.onap:8443\n\n#
    query\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.path.query=/aai/v14/search/sdn-zone-query\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.query.nodes=/aai/v14/search/nodes-query?search-node-type={node-type}&filter={entity-identifier}:EQUALS:{entity-name}\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.query.generic=/aai/v14/search/generic-query?key={identifier}:{value}&start-node-type={start-node-type}&include=complex&depth=3\n\n#
    named query\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.query.named=/aai/search/named-query\n\n\n#update\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.update=/aai/v14/actions/update\n\n#
    vce\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.path.vce =/aai/v14/network/vces/vce/\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.path.vces=/aai/v14/network/vces/\n\n#
    vpe\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.path.vpe =/aai/v14/network/vpes/vpe/\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.path.vpes=/aai/v14/network/vpes/\n\n#
    customer\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.path.customer=/aai/v14/business/customers/customer/{customer-id}\n\n#
    service subscription\norg.onap.ccsdk.sli.adaptors.aai.path.service.subscription=/aai/v14/business/customers/customer/{global-customer-id}/service-subscriptions/service-subscription/{service-type}\n\n#

    org.onap.ccsdk.sli.jdbc.limit.max=20
    org.onap.dblib.connection.recovery=false

# Source: appc/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-appc-appc-filebeat
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: appc
    chart: appc-5.0.0
    release: dev-appc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  filebeat.yml: |
    # Copyright  2018  AT&T, Amdocs, Bell Canada Intellectual Property.  All rights reserved.
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
  
    filebeat.prospectors:
    #it is mandatory, in our case it's log
    - input_type: log
      #This is the canolical path as mentioned in logback.xml, *.* means it will monitor all files in the directory.
      paths:
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*.log
  
      # The below commented properties are for time-based rolling policy. But as the log4j 1.2x does not support time-based rolling these properties are not set
      #Files older than this should be ignored.In our case it will be 48 hours i.e. 2 days. It is a helping flag for clean_inactive
      #ignore_older: 48h
      # Remove the registry entry for a file that is more than the specified time. In our case it will be 96 hours, i.e. 4 days. It will help to keep registry records with in limit
      #clean_inactive: 96h
  
      #Multiline properties for log4j xml log events
      multiline.pattern: '</log4j:event>'
      multiline.negate: true
      multiline.match: before
      #multiline.max_lines: 500
      #multiline.timeout: 5s
  
    # Name of the registry file. If a relative path is used, it is considered relative to the
    # data path. Else full qualified file name.
    #filebeat.registry_file: ${path.data}/registry
  
  
    output.logstash:
      #List of logstash server ip addresses with port number.
      #But, in our case, this will be the loadbalancer IP address.
      #For the below property to work the loadbalancer or logstash should expose 5044 port to listen the filebeat events or port in the property should be changed appropriately.
      hosts: ["log-ls.onap:5044"]
      #If enable will do load balancing among availabe Logstash, automatically.
      loadbalance: true
  
      #The list of root certificates for server verifications.
      #If certificate_authorities is empty or not set, the trusted
      #certificate authorities of the host system are used.
      #ssl.certificate_authorities: $ssl.certificate_authorities
  
      #The path to the certificate for SSL client authentication. If the certificate is not specified,
      #client authentication is not available.
      #ssl.certificate: $ssl.certificate
  
      #The client certificate key used for client authentication.
      #ssl.key: $ssl.key
  
      #The passphrase used to decrypt an encrypted key stored in the configured key file
      #ssl.key_passphrase: $ssl.key_passphrase
---

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-appc-appc-onap-sdnc-bin
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: appc
    chart: appc-5.0.0
    release: dev-appc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  installSdncDb.sh: |+
    #!/bin/bash
  
    ###
    # ============LICENSE_START=======================================================
    # openECOMP : SDN-C
    # ================================================================================
    # Copyright (C) 2017 AT&T Intellectual Property. All rights
    #                                                       reserved.
    # Modifications Copyright  2018 Amdocs,Bell Canada
    # ================================================================================
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
    # ============LICENSE_END=========================================================
    ###
  
    SDNC_HOME=${SDNC_HOME:-/opt/onap/ccsdk}
    MYSQL_PASSWD=${MYSQL_PASSWD:-secretpassword}
  
    SDNC_DB_USER=${SDNC_DB_USER:-sdnctl}
    SDNC_DB_PASSWD=${SDNC_DB_PASSWD:-gamma}
    SDNC_DB_DATABASE=${SDN_DB_DATABASE:-sdnctl}
  
  
    # Create tablespace and user account
    mysql -h appc-dbhost.onap -u root -p${MYSQL_PASSWD} mysql <<-END
    CREATE DATABASE ${SDNC_DB_DATABASE};
    CREATE USER '${SDNC_DB_USER}'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY '${SDNC_DB_PASSWD}';
    CREATE USER '${SDNC_DB_USER}'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '${SDNC_DB_PASSWD}';
    GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ${SDNC_DB_DATABASE}.* TO '${SDNC_DB_USER}'@'localhost' WITH GRANT OPTION;
    GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ${SDNC_DB_DATABASE}.* TO '${SDNC_DB_USER}'@'%' WITH GRANT OPTION;
    commit;
    END
  
    if [ -f ${SDNC_HOME}/data/odlsli.dump ]
    then
    mysql -h appc-dbhost.onap -u root -p${MYSQL_PASSWD} sdnctl < ${SDNC_HOME}/data/odlsli.dump
    fi
---

kind: PersistentVolume
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: dev-appc-appc-ansible-server-playbook0
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: dev-appc-appc-ansible-server
    chart: "appc-ansible-server-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-appc"
    heritage: "Tiller"
    name: dev-appc-appc-ansible-server

  capacity:
    storage: 1Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  storageClassName: "dev-appc-appc-ansible-server-playbook"
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  hostPath:
    path: /dockerdata-nfs/dev-appc/appc/ansible0
---

  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: appc
    chart: appc-5.0.0
    release: dev-appc
    heritage: Tiller
  annotations:
    msb.onap.org/service-info: '[
      {
          "serviceName": "appc",
          "version": "v1",
          "url": "/",
          "protocol": "REST",
          "port": "8282",
          "visualRange":"1",
          "path": "/"
      }
      ]'
spec:
  type: NodePort
  ports:
    - port: 8282
      targetPort: 8181
      nodePort: 30208
      name: "appc-8282"
    - port: 8443
      targetPort: 8443
      nodePort: 30230
      name: "appc-8443"
    - port: 1830
      targetPort: 
      nodePort: 30231
      name: "appc-1830"

      targetPort: 9191
      nodePort: 30211
      name: "appc-9090"

# Source: appc/charts/appc-cdt/templates/deployment.yaml

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-appc-appc-cdt
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: appc-cdt
    chart: appc-cdt-5.0.0
    release: dev-appc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: appc-cdt
        release: dev-appc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      containers:
        - name: appc-cdt
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/appc-cdt-image:1.6.4"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          command:
          - /opt/startCdt.sh
          ports:
          - containerPort: 18080
            name: appc-cdt
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 18080
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 18080
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          # This sets the port that CDT will use to connect to the main appc container.
          # The 11 is the node port suffix that is used in the main appc oom templates
          # for nodePort4. This value will be configured in appc main chart in appc-cdt section.
          - name: CDT_PORT
            value: "30211"
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: appc/charts/dgbuilder/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2018 AT&T, Amdocs, Bell Canada
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-appc-appc-dgbuilder
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: appc-dgbuilder
    chart: dgbuilder-5.0.0
    release: dev-appc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: appc-dgbuilder
        release: dev-appc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - appc-db
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: appc-dgbuilder-readiness
      containers:
        - name: appc-dgbuilder
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/ccsdk-dgbuilder-image:0.6.3"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          command: ["/bin/bash"]
          args: ["-c", "cd /opt/onap/ccsdk/dgbuilder/ && ./start.sh sdnc1.0 && wait"]
          ports:
          - containerPort: 3100
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 3100
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
            valueFrom:
              secretKeyRef:
                name: dev-appc-appc-dgbuilder
                key: db-root-password
          - name: SDNC_CONFIG_DIR
            value: /opt/onap/sdnc/data/properties
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: config
            mountPath: /opt/app/application.properties
            subPath: application.properties
          - name: config
            mountPath: /opt/onap/ccsdk/dgbuilder/releases/sdnc1.0/conf/svclogic.properties
            subPath: svclogic.properties
          - name: config
            mountPath: /opt/onap/ccsdk/dgbuilder/svclogic/svclogic.properties
            subPath: svclogic.properties
          - name: scripts
            mountPath: /opt/onap/ccsdk/dgbuilder/createReleaseDir.sh
            subPath: createReleaseDir.sh
          - name: scripts
            mountPath: /opt/onap/ccsdk/dgbuilder/releases/sdnc1.0/customSettings.js
            subPath: customSettings.js
          resources:
                        null
                        
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: config
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-dgbuilder-config
        - name: scripts
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-dgbuilder-scripts
            defaultMode: 0755
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: appc/charts/appc-ansible-server/templates/statefulset.yaml
# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada, AT&T

apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: dev-appc-appc-ansible-server
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: appc-ansible-server
    chart: appc-ansible-server-5.0.0
    release: dev-appc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: appc-ansible-server
        release: dev-appc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: appc-ansible-server-chown
        image: "busybox"
        command: ["sh", "-c", "chown -R 100:101 /home/ansible"]
        volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /home/ansible
            name: dev-appc-appc-ansible-server-playbook
      containers:
        - name: appc-ansible-server
          command: ["/bin/bash"]
          args: ["-c", "cd /opt/onap/ccsdk && ./startAnsibleServer.sh"]
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/ccsdk-ansible-server-image:0.4.4"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8000
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8000
            initialDelaySeconds: 180
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8000
            initialDelaySeconds: 60
            periodSeconds: 10
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/ccsdk/RestServer_config
            name: config
            subPath: RestServer_config
          - mountPath: /home/ansible
            name: dev-appc-appc-ansible-server-playbook
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: config
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-ansible-server
            defaultMode: 0644

  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: dev-appc-appc-ansible-server-playbook
      labels:
        name: dev-appc-appc-ansible-server
    spec:
      accessModes: [ ReadWriteOnce ]
      storageClassName: dev-appc-appc-ansible-server-playbook
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
---
# Source: appc/charts/mariadb-galera/templates/statefulset.yaml
# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada

apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: dev-appc-appc-db
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: dev-appc-appc-db
    chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-appc"
    heritage: "Tiller"
spec:
  serviceName: appc-dbhost
  replicas: 3
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dev-appc-appc-db
        chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
        release: "dev-appc"
        heritage: "Tiller"
      annotations:
        pod.alpha.kubernetes.io/initialized: "true"
    spec:
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: onap-docker-registry-key
      containers:
        - name: appc-db
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/adfinissygroup/k8s-mariadb-galera-centos:v002"
          imagePullPolicy: "Always"
          env:
            - name: POD_NAMESPACE
              valueFrom:
                fieldRef:
                  apiVersion: v1
                  fieldPath: metadata.namespace
            - name: MYSQL_USER
              value: "my-user"
            - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: dev-appc-appc-db
                  key: user-password
            - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
              value: "my-database"
            - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: dev-appc-appc-db
                  key: db-root-password
          ports:
          - containerPort: 3306
            name: appc-dbhost
          - containerPort: 4444
            name: sst
          - containerPort: 4567
            name: replication
          - containerPort: 4568
            name: ist
          readinessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - /usr/share/container-scripts/mysql/readiness-probe.sh
            initialDelaySeconds: 15
            periodSeconds: 10
            timeoutSeconds: 5
          livenessProbe:
            exec:
              command: ["mysqladmin", "ping"]
            initialDelaySeconds: 30
            periodSeconds: 10
            timeoutSeconds: 5
          resources:
                        {}
                        
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
            name: dev-appc-appc-db-data
      initContainers:
        - name: mariadb-galera-prepare
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/busybox"
          imagePullPolicy: "Always"
          command: ["sh", "-c", "chown -R 27:27 /var/lib/mysql"]
          volumeMounts:
            - name: dev-appc-appc-db-data
              mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: dev-appc-appc-db-data
      labels:
        name: dev-appc-appc-db
        chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
        release: "dev-appc"
        heritage: "Tiller"
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - "ReadWriteOnce"
      storageClassName: dev-appc-appc-db-data
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: "2Gi"
      selector:
        matchLabels:
          name: dev-appc-appc-db
---

apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: dev-appc-appc
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: appc
    chart: appc-5.0.0
    release: dev-appc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  serviceName: "appc-cluster"
  replicas: 1
  podManagementPolicy: Parallel
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: appc
        release: dev-appc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: appc-readiness
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - appc-db
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
      - name: appc-chown
        image: "busybox"
        command: ["sh", "-c", "chown -R 100:101 /opt/opendaylight/current/daexim"]
        volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /opt/opendaylight/current/daexim
            name: dev-appc-appc-data
      containers:
        - name: appc
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/appc-image:1.6.4"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          command:
          - /opt/appc/bin/startODL.sh
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8181
          - containerPort: 8443
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
               port: 8181
            initialDelaySeconds: 300
            periodSeconds: 60
          env:
            - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: dev-appc-appc
                  key: db-root-password
            - name: SDNC_CONFIG_DIR
              value: "/opt/onap/appc/data/properties"
            - name: APPC_CONFIG_DIR
              value: "/opt/onap/appc/data/properties"
            - name: DMAAP_TOPIC_ENV
              value: "SUCCESS"
            - name: ENABLE_AAF
              value: "true"
            - name: ENABLE_ODL_CLUSTER
              value: "false"
            - name: APPC_REPLICAS
              value: "1"
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/data/properties/dblib.properties
            name: onap-appc-data-properties
            subPath: dblib.properties
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/data/properties/svclogic.properties
            name: onap-appc-data-properties
            subPath: svclogic.properties
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/data/properties/appc.properties
            name: onap-appc-data-properties
            subPath: appc.properties
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/data/properties/aaiclient.properties
            name: onap-appc-data-properties
            subPath: aaiclient.properties
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/data/properties/cadi.properties
            name: onap-appc-data-properties
            subPath: cadi.properties
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/data/properties/aaa-app-config.xml
            name: onap-appc-data-properties
            subPath: aaa-app-config.xml
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/data/properties/bath_config.csv
            name: onap-appc-data-properties
            subPath: bath_config.csv
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/svclogic/config/svclogic.properties
            name: onap-appc-svclogic-config
            subPath: svclogic.properties
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/svclogic/bin/showActiveGraphs.sh
            name: onap-appc-svclogic-bin
            subPath: showActiveGraphs.sh
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/bin/startODL.sh
            name: onap-appc-bin
            subPath: startODL.sh
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/bin/installAppcDb.sh
            name: onap-appc-bin
            subPath: installAppcDb.sh
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/bin/health_check.sh
            name: onap-appc-bin
            subPath: health_check.sh
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/ccsdk/data/properties/dblib.properties
            name: onap-sdnc-data-properties
            subPath: dblib.properties
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/ccsdk/data/properties/svclogic.properties
            name: onap-sdnc-data-properties
            subPath: svclogic.properties
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/ccsdk/data/properties/aaiclient.properties
            name: onap-sdnc-data-properties
            subPath: aaiclient.properties
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/ccsdk/svclogic/config/svclogic.properties
            name: onap-sdnc-svclogic-config
            subPath: svclogic.properties
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/ccsdk/svclogic/bin/showActiveGraphs.sh
            name: onap-sdnc-svclogic-bin
            subPath: showActiveGraphs.sh
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/ccsdk/bin/installSdncDb.sh
            name: onap-sdnc-bin
            subPath: installSdncDb.sh
          - mountPath: /opt/opendaylight/current/daexim
            name: dev-appc-appc-data
          - mountPath: /var/log/onap
            name: logs
          - mountPath: /opt/onap/appc/data/org.ops4j.pax.logging.cfg
            name: log-config
            subPath: org.ops4j.pax.logging.cfg
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            name: filebeat-conf
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - mountPath: /var/log/onap
            name: logs
          - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
            name: data-filebeat
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-filebeat
        - name: log-config
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-logging-cfg
        - name: logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: onap-appc-data-properties
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-onap-appc-data-properties
        - name: onap-appc-svclogic-config
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-onap-appc-svclogic-config
        - name: onap-appc-svclogic-bin
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-onap-appc-svclogic-bin
            defaultMode: 0755
        - name: onap-appc-bin
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-onap-appc-bin
            defaultMode: 0755
        - name: onap-sdnc-data-properties
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-onap-sdnc-data-properties
        - name: onap-sdnc-svclogic-config
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-onap-sdnc-svclogic-config
        - name: onap-sdnc-svclogic-bin
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-onap-sdnc-svclogic-bin
            defaultMode: 0755
        - name: onap-sdnc-bin
          configMap:
            name: dev-appc-appc-onap-sdnc-bin
            defaultMode: 0755

  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: dev-appc-appc-data
      labels:
        name: dev-appc-appc
    spec:
      accessModes: [ ReadWriteOnce ]
      storageClassName: dev-appc-appc-data
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
Release "dev-appc" has been upgraded. Happy Helming!

1. Get the application URL by running these commands:
  export NODE_PORT=$(kubectl get --namespace onap -o jsonpath="{.spec.ports[0].nodePort}" services dev-appc-appc)
  export NODE_IP=$(kubectl get nodes --namespace onap -o jsonpath="{.items[0].status.addresses[0].address}")
  echo http://$NODE_IP:$NODE_PORT

[debug] SERVER: "127.0.0.1:36275"

---
# Source: cassandra/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-cassandra-cassandra-entrypoint
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: cassandra
    chart: cassandra-5.0.0
    release: dev-cassandra
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  docker-entrypoint.sh: |+
    #!/bin/bash
    set -e
  
    # first arg is `-f` or `--some-option`
    # or there are no args
    if [ "$#" -eq 0 ] || [ "${1#-}" != "$1" ]; then
            set -- cassandra -f "$@"
    fi
  
    # allow the container to be started with `--user`
    if [ "$1" = 'cassandra' -a "$(id -u)" = '0' ]; then
            find /var/lib/cassandra /var/log/cassandra "$CASSANDRA_CONFIG" \
                    \! -user cassandra -exec chown cassandra '{}' +
            exec gosu cassandra "$BASH_SOURCE" "$@"
    fi
  
    _ip_address() {
            # scrape the first non-localhost IP address of the container
            # in Swarm Mode, we often get two IPs -- the container IP, and the (shared) VIP, and the container IP should always be first
            ip address | awk '
                    $1 == "inet" && $NF != "lo" {
                            gsub(/\/.+$/, "", $2)
                            print $2
                            exit
                    }
            '
    }
  
    # "sed -i", but without "mv" (which doesn't work on a bind-mounted file, for example)
    _sed-in-place() {
            local filename="$1"; shift
            local tempFile
            tempFile="$(mktemp)"
            sed "$@" "$filename" > "$tempFile"
            cat "$tempFile" > "$filename"
            rm "$tempFile"
    }
  
    if [ "$1" = 'cassandra' ]; then
            : ${CASSANDRA_RPC_ADDRESS='0.0.0.0'}
  
            : ${CASSANDRA_LISTEN_ADDRESS='auto'}
            if [ "$CASSANDRA_LISTEN_ADDRESS" = 'auto' ]; then
                    CASSANDRA_LISTEN_ADDRESS="$(_ip_address)"
            fi
  
            : ${CASSANDRA_BROADCAST_ADDRESS="$CASSANDRA_LISTEN_ADDRESS"}
  
            if [ "$CASSANDRA_BROADCAST_ADDRESS" = 'auto' ]; then
                    CASSANDRA_BROADCAST_ADDRESS="$(_ip_address)"
            fi
            : ${CASSANDRA_BROADCAST_RPC_ADDRESS:=$CASSANDRA_BROADCAST_ADDRESS}
  
            if [ -n "${CASSANDRA_NAME:+1}" ]; then
                    : ${CASSANDRA_SEEDS:="cassandra"}
            fi
            : ${CASSANDRA_SEEDS:="$CASSANDRA_BROADCAST_ADDRESS"}
  
            _sed-in-place "$CASSANDRA_CONFIG/cassandra.yaml" \
                    -r 's/(- seeds:).*/\1 "'"$CASSANDRA_SEEDS"'"/'
  
            for yaml in \
                    broadcast_address \
                    broadcast_rpc_address \
                    cluster_name \
                    endpoint_snitch \
                    listen_address \
                    num_tokens \
                    rpc_address \
                    start_rpc \
                    authenticator \
            ; do
                    var="CASSANDRA_${yaml^^}"
                    val="${!var}"
                    if [ "$val" ]; then
                            _sed-in-place "$CASSANDRA_CONFIG/cassandra.yaml" \
                                    -r 's/^(# )?('"$yaml"':).*/\2 '"$val"'/'
                    fi
            done
  
            for rackdc in dc rack; do
                    var="CASSANDRA_${rackdc^^}"
                    val="${!var}"
                    if [ "$val" ]; then
                            _sed-in-place "$CASSANDRA_CONFIG/cassandra-rackdc.properties" \
                                    -r 's/^('"$rackdc"'=).*/\1 '"$val"'/'
                    fi
            done
    fi
  
    exec "$@"
---
# Source: cassandra/templates/pv.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: dev-cassandra-cassandra-0
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    type: local
    app: cassandra
    chart: cassandra-5.0.0
    release: dev-cassandra
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  capacity:
    storage: 2Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  hostPath:
    path: /dockerdata-nfs/dev-cassandra/cassandra-0
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: cassandra
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: cassandra
    chart: cassandra-5.0.0
    release: dev-cassandra
    heritage: Tiller
  annotations:
    service.alpha.kubernetes.io/tolerate-unready-endpoints: "true"
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  publishNotReadyAddresses: true
  ports:
  
  - port: 7000
    targetPort: 7000
    name: intra
  - port: 7001
    targetPort: 7001
    name: tls
  - port: 7199
    targetPort: 7199
    name: jmx
  - port: 9042
    targetPort: 9042
    name: cql
  - port: 9160
    targetPort: 9160
    name: thrift
  - port: 61621
    targetPort: 61621
    name: agent
  selector:
    app: cassandra
    release: dev-cassandra
  clusterIP: None
---

apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: dev-cassandra-cassandra
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: cassandra
    chart: cassandra-5.0.0
    release: dev-cassandra
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cassandra
      release: dev-cassandra
  serviceName: cassandra
  replicas: 3
  podManagementPolicy: OrderedReady
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: cassandra
        release: dev-cassandra
      name: cassandra
    spec:
      hostNetwork: false
      containers:
      - name: cassandra
        image: library/cassandra:2.2.14
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7000
        - containerPort: 7001
        - containerPort: 7199
        - containerPort: 9042
        - containerPort: 9160
        - containerPort: 61621
        volumeMounts:
          - name: cassandra-data
            mountPath: /var/lib/cassandra
          - name: localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: cassandra-entrypoint
            mountPath: /docker-entrypoint.sh
            subPath: docker-entrypoint.sh
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
           command:
            - /bin/bash
            - -c
            - nodetool status | grep $POD_IP | awk '$1!="UN" { exit 1; }'
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 3
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
        
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/bash
            - -c
            - nodetool status | grep $POD_IP | awk '$1!="UN" { exit 1; }'
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 3
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
        env:
          - name: CASSANDRA_SEEDS
            value: "dev-cassandra-cassandra-0.cassandra.onap.svc.cluster.local,dev-cassandra-cassandra-1.cassandra.onap.svc.cluster.local,dev-cassandra-cassandra-2.cassandra.onap.svc.cluster.local"
          - name: MAX_HEAP_SIZE
            value: 2048M
          - name: HEAP_NEWSIZE
            value: 100M
          - name: JVM_OPTS
            value: "-Dcassandra.consistent.rangemovement=false"
          - name: CASSANDRA_CLUSTER_NAME
            value: "cassandra"
          - name: CASSANDRA_DC
            value: "Pod"
          - name: CASSANDRA_RACK
            value: "Rack"
          - name: CASSANDRA_AUTO_BOOTSTRAP
            value: "true"
          - name: CASSANDRA_START_RPC
            value: "true"
          - name: CASSANDRA_ENDPOINT_SNITCH
            value: "GossipingPropertyFileSnitch"
          - name: CASSANDRA_AUTHENTICATOR
            value: "PasswordAuthenticator"
          - name: POD_IP
            valueFrom:
              fieldRef:
                fieldPath: status.podIP
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command: ["/bin/sh", "-c", "PID=$(pidof java) && kill $PID && while ps -p $PID > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done"]
        resources:
          {}
          
      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: cassandra-entrypoint
        configMap:
          name: dev-cassandra-cassandra-entrypoint
          defaultMode: 0755
  volumeClaimTemplates:
    - metadata:
        name: cassandra-data
        labels:
          app: dev-cassandra-cassandra
          release: "dev-cassandra"
          heritage: "Tiller"
      annotations:
        volume.beta.kubernetes.io/storage-class: 
      spec:
        accessModes:
          - "ReadWriteOnce"
        resources:
          requests:
            storage: "2Gi"
        selector:
          matchLabels:
            release: "dev-cassandra"
---

        <appender name="STDOUT" class="ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender">
            <!-- encoders are assigned the type
                 ch.qos.logback.classic.encoder.PatternLayoutEncoder by default -->
            <encoder>
                <pattern>${defaultPattern}</pattern>
            </encoder>
        </appender>
  
        <logger name="org.springframework" level="info"/>
        <logger name="org.springframework.web" level="info"/>
        <logger name="org.springframework.security.web.authentication" level="warn"/>

  name: dev-cds-cds-sdc-listener-configmap
  namespace: onap
data:
  application.yaml: |-
    listenerservice:
      config:
        asdcAddress: sdc-be:8443 #SDC-BE
        messageBusAddress: message-router #Message-Router
        user: vid #SDC-username
        password: Kp8bJ4SXszM0WXlhak3eHlcse2gAw84vaoGGmJvUy2U #SDC-password
        pollingInterval: 15
        pollingTimeout: 60
        relevantArtifactTypes: TOSCA_CSAR
        consumerGroup: cds
        environmentName: AUTO
        consumerId: cds
        keyStorePassword:
        keyStorePath:
        activateServerTLSAuth : false
        isUseHttpsWithDmaap: false
        archivePath: /opt/app/onap/sdc-listener/
        grpcAddress: cds-blueprints-processor-grpc
        grpcPort: 9111
        authHeader: Basic Y2NzZGthcHBzOmNjc2RrYXBwcw==
  logback.xml: |-
    <!--
      ~ Copyright (c) 2019 Bell Canada
      ~
      ~ Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
      ~ you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
      ~ You may obtain a copy of the License at
      ~
      ~     http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
      ~
      ~ Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
      ~ distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
      ~ WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
      ~ See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
      ~ limitations under the License.
      -->
  
    <configuration>
  
      <property name="localPattern" value="%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS} %-5level %logger{100} - %msg%n" />
  
      <property name="defaultPattern" value="%date{ISO8601,UTC}|%X{RequestID}|%X{ServiceInstanceId}|%thread|%X{VirtualServerName}|%X{ServiceName}|%X{InstanceUUID}|%.-5level|%X{AlertSeverity}|%X{ServerIPAddress}|%X{ServerFQDN}|%X{RemoteHost}|%X{ClassName}|%X{Timer}| %msg%n" />
  
      <property name="debugLoggerPattern" value="%date{ISO8601,UTC}|%X{RequestID}|%X{ServiceInstanceId}|%thread|%X{VirtualServerName}|%X{ServiceName}|%X{InstanceUUID}|%.-5level|%X{AlertSeverity}|%X{ServerIPAddress}|%X{ServerFQDN}|%X{RemoteHost}|%X{ClassName}|%X{Timer}|[%caller{3}]| %msg%n" />
  
      <appender name="STDOUT" class="ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender">
        <!-- encoders are assigned the type
             ch.qos.logback.classic.encoder.PatternLayoutEncoder by default -->
        <encoder>
          <pattern>${defaultPattern}</pattern>
        </encoder>
      </appender>
  
      <logger name="org.springframework" level="info"/>
      <logger name="org.springframework.web" level="info"/>
      <logger name="org.springframework.security.web.authentication" level="warn"/>
      <logger name="org.hibernate" level="error"/>
      <logger name="org.onap.ccsdk.cds" level="info"/>
  
      <root level="warn">
        <appender-ref ref="STDOUT"/>
      </root>
  
    </configuration>

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-cds-cds-db-confd
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: cds-db
    chart: mariadb-galera-5.0.0
    release: dev-cds
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  {}
---
# Source: cds/charts/cds-blueprints-processor/templates/pv.yaml
kind: PersistentVolume
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: dev-cds-cds-blueprints-processor-blueprints
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: cds-blueprints-processor
    chart: "cds-blueprints-processor-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-cds"
    heritage: "Tiller"
    name: dev-cds-cds-blueprints-processor-blueprints
spec:
  capacity:
    storage: 2Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteMany
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  hostPath:
    path: /dockerdata-nfs/dev-cds/cds/blueprints/deploy
---
# Source: cds/charts/mariadb-galera/templates/pv.yaml
kind: PersistentVolume
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: dev-cds-cds-db-data0
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: dev-cds-cds-db
    chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-cds"
    heritage: "Tiller"
    name: dev-cds-cds-db
spec:
  capacity:
    storage: 2Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  storageClassName: "dev-cds-cds-db-data"
  hostPath:
    path: /dockerdata-nfs/dev-cds/cds/data0
---
# Source: cds/charts/cds-blueprints-processor/templates/pvc.yaml
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: dev-cds-cds-blueprints
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: cds-blueprints-processor
    chart: "cds-blueprints-processor-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-cds"
    heritage: "Tiller"
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: dev-cds-cds-blueprints-processor-blueprints
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteMany
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 2Gi
---
# Source: cds/charts/cds-blueprints-processor/templates/service.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: cds-blueprints-processor-grpc
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: cds-blueprints-processor
    chart: cds-blueprints-processor-5.0.0
    release: dev-cds
    heritage: Tiller
  annotations:
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  ports:
    - port: 9111
      targetPort: 9111
      name: blueprints-processor-grpc
  selector:
    app: cds-blueprints-processor
    release: dev-cds
---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    service.alpha.kubernetes.io/tolerate-unready-endpoints: "true"
#  name: cds-db
  name: cds-db
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: dev-cds-cds-db
    chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-cds"
    heritage: "Tiller"
spec:
  ports:
    - name: cds-db
      port: 3306
  clusterIP: None
  selector:
    app: dev-cds-cds-db
---
# Source: cds/charts/cds-blueprints-processor/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright (c) 2019 IBM, Bell Canada
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
