      limits:
        cpu: 200m
        memory: 500Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 200Mi
    unlimited: {}
  service:
    externalPort: 80
    externalPortHttps: 443
    internalPort: 80
    internalPortHttps: 443
    name: msb-eag
    nodePort: 82
    nodePortHttps: 84
    type: NodePort
msb-iag:
  affinity: {}
  config:
    routeLabels: visualRange:1
  flavor: small
  global:
    debugEnabled: false
    flavor: unlimited
    ingress:
      enabled: true
      virtualhost:
        baseurl: simpledemo.onap.org
        enabled: true
    loggingImage: beats/filebeat:5.5.0
    loggingRepository: docker.elastic.co
    nodePortPrefix: 302
    nodePortPrefixExt: 304
    persistence:
      enableDefaultStorageclass: false
      mountPath: /dockerdata-nfs
      parameters: {}
      storageclassProvisioner: kubernetes.io/no-provisioner
      volumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
    pullPolicy: Always
    readinessImage: readiness-check:2.0.0
    readinessRepository: oomk8s
    repositoryCred:
      password: docker
      user: docker
  image: onap/msb/msb_apigateway:1.2.5
  ingress:
    enabled: false
  istioSidecar: true
  liveness:
    enabled: true
    initialDelaySeconds: 10
    periodSeconds: 10
  nodeSelector: {}
  pullPolicy: Always
  readiness:
    initialDelaySeconds: 10
    periodSeconds: 10
  replicaCount: 1
  repository: nexus3.onap.org:10001
  resources:
    large:
      limits:
        cpu: 200m
        memory: 800Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 400Mi
    small:
      limits:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 400Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 50m
        memory: 200Mi
    unlimited: {}
  service:
    externalPort: 80
    externalPortHttps: 443
    internalPort: 80
    internalPortHttps: 443
    name: msb-iag
    nodePort: 80
    nodePortHttps: 83
    type: NodePort

HOOKS:
MANIFEST:

---
# Source: msb/charts/msb-discovery/templates/configmap.yaml
# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada , ZTE
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-msb-msb-discovery-log
  namespace: onap
data:
  logback.xml: "<!--# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada , ZTE\n#\n# Licensed under
    the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\n# you may not use this file
    except in compliance with the License.\n# You may obtain a copy of the License at\n#\n#
    \      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\n#\n# Unless required by applicable
    law or agreed to in writing, software\n# distributed under the License is distributed
    on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\n# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express
    or implied.\n# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and\n#
    limitations under the License. -->\n<configuration scan=\"false\" debug=\"true\">\n
    \   <property name=\"p_tim\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;,
    UTC}\"/>\n    <property name=\"p_lvl\" value=\"%level\"/>\n    <property name=\"p_log\"
    value=\"%logger\"/>\n    <property name=\"p_mdc\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%mdc){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n',
    '\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n    <property name=\"p_msg\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%msg){'\\t',
    '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n    <property name=\"p_exc\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%rootException){'\\t',
    '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n    <property name=\"p_mak\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%marker){'\\t',
    '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n    <property name=\"p_thr\" value=\"%thread\"/>\n
    \   <property name=\"pattern\" value=\"%nopexception${p_tim}\\t${p_thr}\\t${p_lvl}\\t${p_log}\\t${p_mdc}\\t${p_msg}\\t${p_exc}\\t${p_mak}\\t%n\"/>\n\n
    \ <property name=\"logDir\" value=\"/var/log/onap\" />\n  <property name=\"debugDir\"
    value=\"/var/log/onap\" />\n\n  <property name=\"componentName\" value=\"msb\"></property>\n
    \ <property name=\"subComponentName\" value=\"msb-discovery\"></property>\n\n  <property
    name=\"errorLogName\" value=\"error\" />\n  <property name=\"metricsLogName\" value=\"metrics\"
    />\n  <property name=\"auditLogName\" value=\"audit\" />\n  <property name=\"debugLogName\"
    value=\"debug\" />\n\n  <property name=\"errorPattern\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;,
    UTC}|%X{RequestId}|%thread|%X{ServiceName}|%X{PartnerName}|%X{TargetEntity}|%X{TargetServiceName}|%.-5level|%X{ErrorCode}|%X{ErrorDesc}|%msg%n\\t${p_mdc}\\t${p_msg}\\t${p_exc}\\t${p_mak}\\t%n\"
    />\n  <property name=\"debugPattern\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;,
    UTC}|%X{RequestId}|%msg%n\\t${p_mdc}\\t${p_msg}\\t${p_exc}\\t${p_mak}\\t%n\" />\n\n
    \ <property name=\"auditPattern\" value=\"%X{BeginTimestamp}|%X{EndTimestamp}|%X{RequestId}|%X{ServiceInstanceId}|%thread||%X{ServiceName}|%X{PartnerName}|%X{StatusCode}|%X{ResponseCode}|%X{ResponseDesc}|%X{InstanceUUID}|%.-5level|%X{AlertSeverity}|%X{ServerIPAddress}|%X{Timer}|%X{ServerFQDN}|%X{RemoteHost}||||||||%msg%n\"
    />\n  <property name=\"metricPattern\" value=\"%X{BeginTimestamp}|%X{EndTimestamp}|%X{RequestId}|%X{ServiceInstanceId}|%thread||%X{ServiceName}|%X{PartnerName}|%X{TargetEntity}|%X{TargetServiceName}|%X{StatusCode}|%X{ResponseCode}|%X{ResponseDesc}|%X{InstanceUUID}|%.-5level|%X{AlertSeverity}|%X{ServerIPAddress}|%X{Timer}|%X{ServerFQDN}|%X{RemoteHost}||||%X{TargetVirtualEntity}|||||%msg%n\"
    />\n  <property name=\"logDirectory\" value=\"${logDir}/${componentName}/${subComponentName}\"
    />\n  <property name=\"debugLogDirectory\" value=\"${debugDir}/${componentName}/${subComponentName}\"
    />\n\n  <appender name=\"EELFAudit\"\n            class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n
    \   <file>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.log</file>\n    <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n
    \     <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.log.%d</fileNamePattern>\n
    \   </rollingPolicy>\n    <encoder>\n      <pattern>${auditPattern}</pattern>\n
    \   </encoder>\n  </appender>\n  \n  <appender name=\"asyncEELFAudit\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n
    \   <queueSize>256</queueSize>\n    <appender-ref ref=\"EELFAudit\" />\n  </appender>\n\n
    \ <appender name=\"EELFMetrics\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n
    \   <file>${logDirectory}/${metricsLogName}.log</file>\n    <rollingPolicy\n            class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n
    \     <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${metricsLogName}.log.%d</fileNamePattern>\n
    \   </rollingPolicy>\n    <encoder>\n      <pattern>${metricPattern}</pattern>\n
    \   </encoder>\n  </appender>\n\n  <appender name=\"asyncEELFMetrics\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n
    \   <queueSize>256</queueSize>\n    <appender-ref ref=\"EELFMetrics\"/>\n  </appender>\n\n
    \ <appender name=\"EELFError\"\n            class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n
    \   <file>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.log</file>\n    <rollingPolicy\n            class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n
    \     <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.log.%d</fileNamePattern>\n
    \   </rollingPolicy>\n    <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n
    \     <level>INFO</level>\n    </filter>\n    <encoder>\n      <pattern>${errorPattern}</pattern>\n
    \   </encoder>\n  </appender>\n\n  <appender name=\"asyncEELFError\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n
    \   <queueSize>256</queueSize>\n    <appender-ref ref=\"EELFError\"/>\n  </appender>\n\n
    \ <appender name=\"EELFDebug\"\n            class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n
    \   <file>${debugLogDirectory}/${debugLogName}.log</file>\n    <rollingPolicy\n
    \           class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n      <fileNamePattern>${debugLogDirectory}/${debugLogName}.log.%d</fileNamePattern>\n
    \   </rollingPolicy>\n    <encoder>\n      <pattern>${debugPattern}</pattern>\n
    \   </encoder>\n  </appender>\n\n  <appender name=\"asyncEELFDebug\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n
    \   <queueSize>256</queueSize>\n    <appender-ref ref=\"EELFDebug\" />\n    <includeCallerData>true</includeCallerData>\n
    \ </appender>\n\n  <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.audit\" level=\"info\" additivity=\"false\">\n
    \   <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFAudit\" />\n  </logger>\n\n  <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.metrics\"
    level=\"info\" additivity=\"false\">\n    <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFMetrics\"
    />\n  </logger>\n\n  <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.error\" level=\"debug\" additivity=\"false\">\n
    \   <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFError\" />\n  </logger>\n  \n  <root level=\"INFO\">\n
    \   <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFDebug\" />\n  </root>\n\n</configuration>\n\n"
---

    \   </encoder>\n  </appender>\n\n  <appender name=\"asyncEELFMetrics\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n

    limitations under the License. -->\n<configuration scan=\"false\" debug=\"true\">\n

    \   <file>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.log</file>\n    <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n

    \   </encoder>\n  </appender>\n\n  <appender name=\"asyncEELFMetrics\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n
    \   <queueSize>256</queueSize>\n    <appender-ref ref=\"EELFMetrics\"/>\n  </appender>\n\n
    \ <appender name=\"EELFError\"\n            class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n
    \   <file>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.log</file>\n    <rollingPolicy\n            class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n
    \     <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.log.%d</fileNamePattern>\n
    \   </rollingPolicy>\n    <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n
    \     <level>INFO</level>\n    </filter>\n    <encoder>\n      <pattern>${errorPattern}</pattern>\n
    \   </encoder>\n  </appender>\n\n  <appender name=\"asyncEELFError\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n
    \   <queueSize>256</queueSize>\n    <appender-ref ref=\"EELFError\"/>\n  </appender>\n\n
    \ <appender name=\"EELFDebug\"\n            class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n
    \   <file>${debugLogDirectory}/${debugLogName}.log</file>\n    <rollingPolicy\n
    \           class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n      <fileNamePattern>${debugLogDirectory}/${debugLogName}.log.%d</fileNamePattern>\n
    \   </rollingPolicy>\n    <encoder>\n      <pattern>${debugPattern}</pattern>\n
    \   </encoder>\n  </appender>\n\n  <appender name=\"asyncEELFDebug\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n
    \   <queueSize>256</queueSize>\n    <appender-ref ref=\"EELFDebug\" />\n    <includeCallerData>true</includeCallerData>\n
    \ </appender>\n\n  <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.audit\" level=\"info\" additivity=\"false\">\n
    \   <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFAudit\" />\n  </logger>\n\n  <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.metrics\"
    level=\"info\" additivity=\"false\">\n    <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFMetrics\"
    />\n  </logger>\n\n  <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.error\" level=\"debug\" additivity=\"false\">\n
    \   <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFError\" />\n  </logger>\n  \n  <root level=\"INFO\">\n
    \   <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFDebug\" />\n  </root>\n\n</configuration>\n\n"
---
# Source: msb/templates/configmap.yaml
# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada , ZTE
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-msb-msb-filebeat-configmap
  namespace: onap
data:
  filebeat.yml: |
    # Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada , ZTE
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
    filebeat.prospectors:
    #it is mandatory, in our case it's log
    - input_type: log
      #This is the canolical path as mentioned in logback.xml, *.* means it will monitor all files in the directory.
      paths:
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*.log
      #Files older than this should be ignored.In our case it will be 48 hours i.e. 2 days. It is a helping flag for clean_inactive
      ignore_older: 48h
      # Remove the registry entry for a file that is more than the specified time. In our case it will be 96 hours, i.e. 4 days. It will help to keep registry records with in limit
      clean_inactive: 96h
  
  
    # Name of the registry file. If a relative path is used, it is considered relative to the
    # data path. Else full qualified file name.
    #filebeat.registry_file: ${path.data}/registry
  
  
    output.logstash:
      #List of logstash server ip addresses with port number.
      #But, in our case, this will be the loadbalancer IP address.
      #For the below property to work the loadbalancer or logstash should expose 5044 port to listen the filebeat events or port in the property should be changed appropriately.
      hosts: ["log-ls.onap:5044"]
      #If enable will do load balancing among availabe Logstash, automatically.
      loadbalance: true
  
      #The list of root certificates for server verifications.
      #If certificate_authorities is empty or not set, the trusted
      #certificate authorities of the host system are used.
      #ssl.certificate_authorities: $ssl.certificate_authorities
  
      #The path to the certificate for SSL client authentication. If the certificate is not specified,
      #client authentication is not available.
      #ssl.certificate: $ssl.certificate
  
      #The client certificate key used for client authentication.
      #ssl.key: $ssl.key
  
      #The passphrase used to decrypt an encrypted key stored in the configured key file
      #ssl.key_passphrase: $ssl.key_passphrase
---

  namespace: onap

# Source: msb/templates/serviceaccout.yaml
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1
kind: ClusterRoleBinding
metadata:
  name: onap-msb-binding
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: msb
    chart: msb-5.0.0
    release: dev-msb
    heritage: Tiller
roleRef:
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
  kind: ClusterRole
  name: cluster-admin
subjects:
  - kind: ServiceAccount
    name: msb
    namespace: onap
---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: msb-consul
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: msb-consul
    chart: msb-consul-5.0.0
    release: dev-msb
    heritage: Tiller
  annotations:
spec:
  type: NodePort
  ports:
    - port: 8500
      nodePort: 30285
      name: http-msb-consul
  selector:
    app: msb-consul
    release: dev-msb

# Source: msb/charts/kube2msb/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada , ZTE
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-msb-kube2msb
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: kube2msb
    chart: kube2msb-5.0.0
    release: dev-msb
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kube2msb
        release: dev-msb
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: msb
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - msb-discovery
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: kube2msb-readiness
      containers:
        - name: kube2msb
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/oom/kube2msb:1.1.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          env:
          - name: KUBE_MASTER_URL
            value: https://kubernetes.default:443
          - name: MSB_URL
            value: http://msb-discovery.onap:10081
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: msb/charts/msb-consul/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada , ZTE
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");

# You may obtain a copy of the License at

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-msb-msb-consul
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: msb-consul
    chart: msb-consul-5.0.0
    release: dev-msb
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: msb-consul
        release: dev-msb
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: msb
      containers:
        - name: msb-consul
          image: "registry.hub.docker.com/library/consul:1.4.3"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8500
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8500
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8500
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: msb/charts/msb-discovery/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada , ZTE
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-msb-msb-discovery
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: msb-discovery
    chart: msb-discovery-5.0.0
    release: dev-msb
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: msb-discovery
        release: dev-msb
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: msb
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - msb-consul
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: msb-discovery-readiness
      containers:
        - name: msb-discovery
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/msb/msb_discovery:1.2.5"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 10081
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 10081
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 10081
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          - name: CONSUL_IP
            value: msb-consul.onap
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /usr/local/discover-works/logs
            name: dev-msb-msb-discovery-logs
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # Filebeat sidecar container
        - name: msb-discovery-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-msb-msb-discovery-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-msb-msb-discovery-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          - name: dev-msb-msb-discovery-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap/msb/msb-discovery
          - mountPath: /opt/ajsc/etc/config/logback.xml
            name: dev-msb-msb-discovery-log-conf
            subPath: logback.xml
      volumes:
        - name: dev-msb-msb-discovery-log-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-msb-msb-discovery-log
        - name: dev-msb-msb-discovery-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-msb-msb-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-msb-msb-discovery-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
        - name:  dev-msb-msb-discovery-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-msb-msb-eag
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: msb-eag
    chart: msb-eag-5.0.0
    release: dev-msb
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: msb-eag
        release: dev-msb
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: msb
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - msb-discovery
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: msb-eag-readiness
      containers:
        - name: msb-eag
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/msb/msb_apigateway:1.2.5"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 80
            name: msb-eag
          - containerPort: 443
            name: msb-eag-https
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 80
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 80
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          - name: CONSUL_IP
            value: msb-consul.onap
          - name: SDCLIENT_IP
            value: msb-discovery.onap
          - name: ROUTE_LABELS
            value: visualRange:0
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /usr/local/apiroute-works/logs
            name: dev-msb-msb-eag-logs
          resources:
                        {}
                        
        # side car containers
        - name: filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-msb-msb-eag-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-msb-msb-eag-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          - name: dev-msb-msb-eag-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap/msb/msb-eag
          - mountPath: /opt/ajsc/etc/config/logback.xml
            name: dev-msb-msb-eag-log-conf
            subPath: logback.xml
      volumes:
        - name: dev-msb-msb-eag-log-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-msb-msb-eag-log
        - name: dev-msb-msb-eag-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-msb-msb-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-msb-msb-eag-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
        - name:  dev-msb-msb-eag-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-msb-msb-iag
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: msb-iag
    chart: msb-iag-5.0.0
    release: dev-msb
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: msb-iag
        release: dev-msb
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: msb
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - msb-discovery
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: msb-iag-readiness
      containers:
        - name: msb-iag
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/msb/msb_apigateway:1.2.5"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 80
            name: msb-iag
          - containerPort: 443
            name: msb-iag-https
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 80
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 80
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          - name: CONSUL_IP
            value: msb-consul.onap
          - name: SDCLIENT_IP
            value: msb-discovery.onap
          - name: ROUTE_LABELS
            value: visualRange:1
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /usr/local/apiroute-works/logs
            name: dev-msb-msb-iag-logs
          resources:
                        {}
                        
        # side car containers
        - name: filebeat-onap

          cpu: 2
          memory: 8Gi
        requests:
          cpu: 20m
          memory: 2Gi
      small:
        limits:
          cpu: 1
          memory: 4Gi
        requests:
          cpu: 10m
          memory: 1Gi
      unlimited: {}
    service:
      externalPort: 9093
      internalPort: 9093
      meshpeer:
        enabled: false
        port: 6783
        portName: multicloud-prometheus-meshpeer
      name: multicloud-prometheus-alertmanager
      portName: prometheus-alertmanager
      type: ClusterIP
  prometheus-grafana:
    affinity: {}
    dashboardProviders: {}
    dashboards: {}
    datasources:
      datasources.yaml:
        apiVersion: 1
        datasources:
        - access: proxy
          isDefault: true

          baseurl: simpledemo.onap.org
          enabled: true

      loggingRepository: docker.elastic.co

      nodePortPrefixExt: 304

        enableDefaultStorageclass: false
        mountPath: /dockerdata-nfs

        enabled: false

      readinessRepository: oomk8s

        password: docker
        user: docker

      repository: grafana/grafana
      tag: 5.2.4

      enabled: false

      enabled: true

      periodSeconds: 30

# Source: multicloud/charts/multicloud-azure/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-azure-log-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: multicloud-azure
    chart: multicloud-azure-5.0.0
    release: dev-multicloud
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  log.yml: |
    # Copyright  2018  AT&T, Amdocs, Bell Canada Intellectual Property.  All rights reserved.
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
    version: 1
    disable_existing_loggers: False
  
    loggers:
        vio:
          handlers: [azure_handler]
          level: "DEBUG"
          propagate: False
    handlers:
        vio_handler:
            level: "DEBUG"
            class: "logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler"
            filename: "/var/log/onap/multicloud/azure/azure.log"
            formatter: "mdcFormat"
            maxBytes: 52428800
            backupCount: 10
    formatters:
        standard:
            format: "%(asctime)s|||||%(name)s||%(thread)||%(funcName)s||%(levelname)s||%(message)s"
        mdcFormat:
            format: "%(asctime)s|||||%(name)s||%(thread)s||%(funcName)s||%(levelname)s||%(message)s||||%(mdc)s \t"
            mdcfmt: "{requestID} {invocationID} {serviceName} {serviceIP}"
            datefmt: "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"
            (): onaplogging.mdcformatter.MDCFormatter
---

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: multicloud-k8s
    chart: multicloud-k8s-5.0.0
    release: dev-multicloud
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  config.json: |
    {
        "name":"SDCDistributionGroup",
        "restServerParameters":{
            "host":"0.0.0.0",
            "port":9014,
            "userName":"healthcheck",
            "password":"zb!XztG34",
            "https":true
        },
        "receptionHandlerParameters":{
            "SDCReceptionHandler":{
                "receptionHandlerType":"SDC",
                "receptionHandlerClassName":"org.onap.policy.distribution.reception.handling.sdc.SdcReceptionHandler",
            "receptionHandlerConfigurationName":"sdcConfiguration",
                "pluginHandlerParameters":{
                    "artifactForwarders":{
                        "PAPEngineForwarder":{
                            "forwarderType":"PAPEngine",
                            "forwarderClassName":"org.onap.policy.distribution.forwarding.k8s.K8sArtifactForwarder",
                            "forwarderConfigurationName": "k8sConfiguration"
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "receptionHandlerConfigurationParameters":{
            "sdcConfiguration":{
                "parameterClassName":"org.onap.policy.distribution.reception.handling.sdc.SdcReceptionHandlerConfigurationParameterGroup",
                "parameters":{
                "asdcAddress": "sdc-be:8443",
                    "messageBusAddress": [
                        "message-router"
                     ],
                    "user": "multicloud",
                    "password": "Kp8bJ4SXszM0WXlhak3eHlcse2gAw84vaoGGmJvUy2U",
                    "pollingInterval":20,
                    "pollingTimeout":30,
                    "consumerId": "multicloud-k8s-id",
                    "artifactTypes": [
                        "TOSCA_CSAR",
                        "HEAT",
                        "HEAT_ARTIFACT",
                        "HEAT_ENV",
                        "HEAT_NESTED",
                        "HEAT_VOL",
                        "OTHER",
                        "VF_MODULES_METADATA",
                        "CLOUD_TECHNOLOGY_SPECIFIC_ARTIFACT"
                    ],
                    "consumerGroup": "multicloud-k8s-group",
                    "environmentName": "AUTO",
                    "keystorePath": "null",
                    "keystorePassword": "null",
                    "activeserverTlsAuth": false,
                    "isFilterinEmptyResources": true,
                    "isUseHttpsWithDmaap": false
                }
            }
        },
        "artifactForwarderConfigurationParameters":{
            "k8sConfiguration":{
                "parameterClassName":"org.onap.policy.distribution.forwarding.k8s.K8sArtifactForwarderParameterGroup",
                "parameters":{
                    "useHttps": true,
                    "hostname": "pdp",
                    "port": 8081,
                    "userName": "testpdp",
                    "password": "alpha123",
                    "clientAuth": "cHl0aG9uOnRlc3Q=",
                    "isManaged": true,
                    "pdpGroup": "default"
                }
            }
        }
    }
  k8sconfig.json: |-
    {
        "ca-file": "/opt/multicloud/k8splugin/certs/root_ca.cer",
        "server-cert": "/opt/multicloud/k8splugin/certs/multicloud-k8s.pub",
        "server-key": "/opt/multicloud/k8splugin/certs/multicloud-k8s.pr",
        "password": "c2VjcmV0bWFuYWdlbWVudHNlcnZpY2VzZWNyZXRwYXNzd29yZA==",
  
        "database-type": "mongo",
        "database-address": "multicloud-k8s-mongo",
        "etcd-ip": "multicloud-k8s-etcd",
        "plugin-dir": "/opt/multicloud/k8splugin/plugins"
    }

                "parameters":{

                    "hostname": "null",
                    "port": 8081,
                    "userName": "null",
                    "password": "null",
                    "isManaged": true
                }
            }
        }

# Source: multicloud/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: multicloud-filebeat-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: multicloud
    chart: multicloud-5.0.0
    release: dev-multicloud
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  filebeat.yml: |
    # Copyright  2018  AT&T, Amdocs, Bell Canada Intellectual Property.  All rights reserved.
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
    filebeat.prospectors:
    #it is mandatory, in our case it's log
    - input_type: log
      #This is the canolical path as mentioned in logback.xml, *.* means it will monitor all files in the directory.
      paths:
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*.log
      #Files older than this should be ignored.In our case it will be 48 hours i.e. 2 days. It is a helping flag for clean_inactive
      ignore_older: 24h
      # Remove the registry entry for a file that is more than the specified time. In our case it will be 96 hours, i.e. 4 days. It will help to keep registry records with in limit
      clean_inactive: 48h
  
  
    # Name of the registry file. If a relative path is used, it is considered relative to the
    # data path. Else full qualified file name.
    #filebeat.registry_file: ${path.data}/registry
  
  
    output.logstash:
      #List of logstash server ip addresses with port number.
      #But, in our case, this will be the loadbalancer IP address.
      #For the below property to work the loadbalancer or logstash should expose 5044 port to listen the filebeat events or port in the property should be changed appropriately.
      hosts: ["log-ls.onap:5044"]
      #If enable will do load balancing among availabe Logstash, automatically.
      loadbalance: true
  
      #The list of root certificates for server verifications.
      #If certificate_authorities is empty or not set, the trusted
      #certificate authorities of the host system are used.
      #ssl.certificate_authorities: $ssl.certificate_authorities
  
      #The path to the certificate for SSL client authentication. If the certificate is not specified,
      #client authentication is not available.
      #ssl.certificate: $ssl.certificate
  
      #The client certificate key used for client authentication.
      #ssl.key: $ssl.key
  
      #The passphrase used to decrypt an encrypted key stored in the configured key file
      #ssl.key_passphrase: $ssl.key_passphrase
---

kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-etcd-data-0
  namespace: onap

    type: 
    app: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-etcd
    chart: etcd-5.0.0
    release: dev-multicloud
    heritage: Tiller

    storage: 1Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  storageClassName: "dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-etcd-data"
  hostPath:
    path: /dockerdata-nfs/dev-multicloud/multicloud-k8s/etcd/data-0
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy:

# Source: multicloud/charts/multicloud-k8s/charts/mongo/templates/pvc.yaml
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-mongo-data
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-mongo
    chart: "mongo-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-multicloud"
    heritage: "Tiller"
    name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-mongo
spec:
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 1Gi
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-mongo
  storageClassName: "dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-mongo-data"
---

  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: multicloud-azure
    chart: multicloud-azure-5.0.0
    release: dev-multicloud
    heritage: Tiller
  annotations:
    msb.onap.org/service-info: '[
    {
      "serviceName": "multicloud-azure",
      "version": "v0",
      "url": "/api/multicloud-azure/v0",
      "protocol": "REST",
      "port": "9008",
      "visualRange": "1"
    }
    ]'
spec:
  ports:
  - port: 9008
    targetPort: 9008
    name: multicloud-azure
  selector:
    app: multicloud-azure
    release: dev-multicloud
  type: ClusterIP

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    service.alpha.kubernetes.io/tolerate-unready-endpoints: "true"
metadata:
  name: multicloud-k8s-etcd
  labels:
    heritage: "Tiller"
    release: "dev-multicloud"
    chart: "etcd-5.0.0"
    app: multicloud-k8s-etcd
spec:
  ports:
  - name: etcd-server
    port: 2380
  - name: etcd-client
    port: 2379
  clusterIP: None
  selector:
    app: multicloud-k8s-etcd
    release: "dev-multicloud"
---

    ]'

spec:
  ports:
  - port: 9010
    targetPort: 9010
    name: multicloud-thinkcloud
  selector:
    app: multicloud-lenovo
    release: dev-multicloud
  type: ClusterIP
---

      "visualRange": "1"

# Source: multicloud/charts/multicloud-azure/templates/deployment.yaml
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-azure
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: multicloud-azure
    chart: multicloud-azure-5.0.0
    release: dev-multicloud
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: multicloud-azure
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: multicloud-azure
        release: dev-multicloud
      name: multicloud-azure
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
     containers:
     - env:
       - name: MSB_ADDR
         value: "msb-iag"
       - name: MSB_PORT
         value: "80.onap"
       - name: AAI_ADDR
         value: aai.onap
       - name: AAI_PORT
         value: "8443"
       - name: AAI_SCHEMA_VERSION
         value: "v13"
       - name: AAI_USERNAME
         value: "AAI"
       - name: AAI_PASSWORD
         value: "AAI"
       name: multicloud-azure
       volumeMounts:
       - mountPath: /var/log/onap
         name: azure-log
       - mountPath: /opt/multicloud_azure/multicloud_azure/pub/config/log.yml
         name: azure-logconfig
         subPath: log.yml
       resources:
            limits:
              cpu: 1
              memory: 4Gi
            requests:
              cpu: 10m
              memory: 1Gi
            
       image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/multicloud/azure:1.2.4"
       imagePullPolicy: Always
       ports:
       - containerPort: 9008
       # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
       # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
       livenessProbe:
         httpGet:
           path: /api/multicloud-azure/v0/swagger.json
           port: 9008
           scheme: HTTP
         initialDelaySeconds: 30
         periodSeconds: 10
         timeoutSeconds: 10
         successThreshold: 1
         failureThreshold: 5
       # side car containers
     - image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
       imagePullPolicy: Always
       name: filebeat-onap
       volumeMounts:
       - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
         name: filebeat-conf
         subPath: filebeat.yml
       - mountPath: /var/log/onap
         name: azure-log
       - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
         name: azure-data-filebeat
     volumes:
     - name: azure-log
       emptyDir: {}
     - name: azure-data-filebeat
       emptyDir: {}
     - name: filebeat-conf
       configMap:
         name: multicloud-filebeat-configmap
     - name: azure-logconfig
       configMap:
         name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-azure-log-configmap
     imagePullSecrets:
     - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
     restartPolicy: Always
---
# Source: multicloud/charts/multicloud-fcaps/templates/deployment.yaml
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-fcaps
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: multicloud-fcaps
    chart: multicloud-fcaps-5.0.0
    release: dev-multicloud
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: multicloud-fcaps
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: multicloud-fcaps
        release: dev-multicloud
      name: multicloud-fcaps
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "false"
    spec:
     containers:
     - env:
       - name: MSB_ADDR
         value: "msb-iag.onap"
       - name: MSB_PORT
         value: "80"
       - name: AAI_ADDR
         value: aai.onap
       - name: AAI_PORT
         value: "8443"
       - name: AAI_SCHEMA_VERSION
         value: "v13"
       - name: AAI_USERNAME
         value: "AAI"
       - name: AAI_PASSWORD
         value: "AAI"
       name: multicloud-fcaps
       volumeMounts:
       - mountPath: /var/log/onap
         name: fcaps-log
       - mountPath: /opt/fcaps/fcaps/pub/config/log.yml
         name: fcaps-logconfig
         subPath: log.yml
       resources:
                        {}
                        
       image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/multicloud/openstack-fcaps:1.4.1"
       imagePullPolicy: Always
       ports:
       - containerPort: 9011
       # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
       # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
       
       livenessProbe:
         httpGet:
           path: /api/multicloud-fcaps/v1/healthcheck
           port: 9011
           scheme: HTTP
         initialDelaySeconds: 30
         periodSeconds: 10
         timeoutSeconds: 10
         successThreshold: 1
         failureThreshold: 5
       
     # side car containers
     - image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
       imagePullPolicy: Always
       name: filebeat-onap
       volumeMounts:
       - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
         name: filebeat-conf
         subPath: filebeat.yml
       - mountPath: /var/log/onap
         name: fcaps-log
       - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
         name: fcaps-data-filebeat
     - image: rabbitmq:alpine
       imagePullPolicy: Always
       name: rabbit-mq

     volumes:
     - name: fcaps-log
       emptyDir: {}
     - name: fcaps-data-filebeat
       emptyDir: {}
     - name: filebeat-conf
       configMap:
         name: multicloud-filebeat-configmap
     - name: fcaps-logconfig
       configMap:
         name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-fcaps-log-configmap
     imagePullSecrets:
     - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
     restartPolicy: Always
---
# Source: multicloud/charts/multicloud-k8s/templates/deployment.yaml
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: multicloud-k8s
    chart: multicloud-k8s-5.0.0
    release: dev-multicloud
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: multicloud-k8s
        release: dev-multicloud
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/multicloud/k8s:0.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: multicloud-k8s
        command: ["/opt/multicloud/k8splugin/k8plugin"]
        workingDir: /opt/multicloud/k8splugin
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9015
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9015
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 30
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9015
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 30
        volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /opt/multicloud/k8splugin/k8sconfig.json
            name: multicloud-k8s
            subPath: k8sconfig.json
        resources:
                      {}
                      
      - image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/multicloud/framework-artifactbroker:1.4.2"
        name: framework-artifactbroker
        command: ["/opt/app/distribution/bin/artifact-dist.sh"]
        args: ["/opt/app/distribution/etc/mounted/config.json"]
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9014
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/app/distribution/etc/mounted/config.json
          name: multicloud-k8s
          subPath: config.json
        - mountPath: /data
          name: artifact-data

      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name : multicloud-k8s
        configMap:
          name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s
      - name: artifact-data
        emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

         subPath: log.yml

         name: artifact-data

       name: framework-artifactbroker

         subPath: config.json

# Source: multicloud/charts/multicloud-vio/templates/deployment.yaml
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-vio
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: multicloud-vio
    chart: multicloud-vio-5.0.0
    release: dev-multicloud
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: multicloud-vio
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: multicloud-vio
        release: dev-multicloud
      name: multicloud-vio
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
     containers:
     - env:
       - name: MSB_ADDR
         value: "msb-iag"
       - name: MSB_PORT
         value: "80.onap"
       - name: AAI_ADDR
         value: aai.onap
       - name: AAI_PORT
         value: "8443"
       - name: AAI_SCHEMA_VERSION
         value: "v13"
       - name: AAI_USERNAME
         value: "AAI"
       - name: AAI_PASSWORD
         value: "AAI"
       name: multicloud-vio
       volumeMounts:
       - mountPath: /var/log/onap
         name: vio-log
       - mountPath: /opt/vio/vio/pub/config/log.yml
         name: vio-logconfig
         subPath: log.yml
       resources:
                        {}
                        
       image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/multicloud/vio:1.4.1"
       imagePullPolicy: Always
       ports:
       - containerPort: 9004
       # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
       # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
       livenessProbe:
         httpGet:
           path: /api/multicloud-vio/v0/swagger.json
           port: 9004
           scheme: HTTP
         initialDelaySeconds: 30
         periodSeconds: 10
         timeoutSeconds: 10
         successThreshold: 1
         failureThreshold: 5
       # side car containers
     - image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
       imagePullPolicy: Always
       name: filebeat-onap
       volumeMounts:
       - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
         name: filebeat-conf
         subPath: filebeat.yml
       - mountPath: /var/log/onap
         name: vio-log
       - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
         name: vio-data-filebeat
     volumes:
     - name: vio-log
       emptyDir: {}
     - name: vio-data-filebeat
       emptyDir: {}
     - name: filebeat-conf
       configMap:
         name: multicloud-filebeat-configmap
     - name: vio-logconfig
       configMap:
         name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-vio-log-configmap

     restartPolicy: Always

kind: Deployment

         value: "8443"

# Source: multicloud/templates/deployment.yaml
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-multicloud-multicloud
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: multicloud
    chart: multicloud-5.0.0
    release: dev-multicloud
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: multicloud
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: multicloud
        release: dev-multicloud
      name: multicloud
    spec:
     containers:
     - env:
       - name: MSB_ADDR
         value: msb-iag.onap
       - name: MSB_PORT
         value: "80"
       - name: AAI_ADDR
         value: "aai.onap"
       - name: AAI_PORT
         value: "8443"
       - name: AAI_SCHEMA_VERSION
         value: "v13"
       - name: AAI_USERNAME
         value: "AAI"
       - name: AAI_PASSWORD
         value: "AAI"
       resources:
                        {}
                        
       image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/multicloud/framework:1.4.2"
       imagePullPolicy: Always
       name: multicloud
       volumeMounts:
       - mountPath: /var/log/onap
         name: framework-log
       - mountPath: /opt/multivimbroker/multivimbroker/pub/config/log.yml
         name: framework-logconfig
         subPath: log.yml
       - mountPath: /opt/multivimbroker/multivimbroker/pub/config/provider-plugin.json
         name: provider-plugin
         subPath: provider-plugin.json
       ports:
       - containerPort: 9001
       # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
       # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
       livenessProbe:
         httpGet:
           path: /api/multicloud/v0/swagger.json
           port: 9001
           scheme: HTTP
         initialDelaySeconds: 30
         periodSeconds: 10
         timeoutSeconds: 10
         successThreshold: 1
         failureThreshold: 5
       # side car containers
     - image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
       imagePullPolicy: Always
       name: filebeat-onap
       volumeMounts:
       - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
         name: filebeat-conf
         subPath: filebeat.yml
       - mountPath: /var/log/onap
         name: framework-log
       - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
         name: framework-data-filebeat
     volumes:
     - name: framework-log
       emptyDir: {}
     - name: provider-plugin
       configMap:
         name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-provider-plugin-configmap
     - name: framework-data-filebeat
       emptyDir: {}
     - name: filebeat-conf
       configMap:
         name: multicloud-filebeat-configmap
     - name: framework-logconfig
       configMap:
         name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-log-configmap
     imagePullSecrets:
     - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
     restartPolicy: Always

# Source: multicloud/charts/multicloud-k8s/charts/etcd/templates/statefulset.yaml
# Copyright  2019 Intel Corporation Inc
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.
apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-etcd
  labels:
    heritage: "Tiller"
    release: "dev-multicloud"
    chart: "etcd-5.0.0"
    app: multicloud-k8s-etcd
spec:
  serviceName: multicloud-k8s-etcd
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        heritage: "Tiller"
        release: "dev-multicloud"
        chart: "etcd-5.0.0"
        app: multicloud-k8s-etcd
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-etcd
        image: "k8s.gcr.io/etcd-amd64:3.2.24"
        imagePullPolicy: "Always"
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2380
          name: etcd-server
        - containerPort: 2379
          name: etcd-client
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 2379
          initialDelaySeconds: 90
          periodSeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
                      null
                      
        env:
        - name: INITIAL_CLUSTER_SIZE
          value: "1"
        - name: SET_NAME
          value: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-etcd
        - name: SERVICE_NAME
          value: multicloud-k8s-etcd
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
                - "/bin/sh"
                - "-ec"
                - |
                  EPS=""
                  for i in $(seq 0 $((${INITIAL_CLUSTER_SIZE} - 1))); do
                      EPS="${EPS}${EPS:+,}http://${SET_NAME}-${i}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2379"
                  done

                  HOSTNAME=$(hostname)

                  member_hash() {
                      etcdctl member list | grep http://${HOSTNAME}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2380 | cut -d':' -f1 | cut -d'[' -f1
                  }

                  SET_ID=${HOSTNAME##*[^0-9]}

                  if [ "${SET_ID}" -ge ${INITIAL_CLUSTER_SIZE} ]; then
                      echo "Removing ${HOSTNAME} from etcd cluster"
                      ETCDCTL_ENDPOINT=${EPS} etcdctl member remove $(member_hash)
                      if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
                          # Remove everything otherwise the cluster will no longer scale-up
                          rm -rf /var/run/etcd/*
                      fi
                  fi
        command:
          - "/bin/sh"
          - "-ec"
          - |
            HOSTNAME=$(hostname)

            # store member id into PVC for later member replacement
            collect_member() {
                while ! etcdctl member list &>/dev/null; do sleep 1; done
                etcdctl member list | grep http://${HOSTNAME}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2380 | cut -d':' -f1 | cut -d'[' -f1 > /var/run/etcd/member_id
                exit 0
            }

            eps() {
                EPS=""
                for i in $(seq 0 $((${INITIAL_CLUSTER_SIZE} - 1))); do
                    EPS="${EPS}${EPS:+,}http://${SET_NAME}-${i}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2379"
                done
                echo ${EPS}
            }

            member_hash() {
                etcdctl member list | grep http://${HOSTNAME}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2380 | cut -d':' -f1 | cut -d'[' -f1
            }

            # we should wait for other pods to be up before trying to join
            # otherwise we got "no such host" errors when trying to resolve other members
            for i in $(seq 0 $((${INITIAL_CLUSTER_SIZE} - 1))); do
                while true; do
                    echo "Waiting for ${SET_NAME}-${i}.${SERVICE_NAME} to come up"
                    ping -W 1 -c 1 ${SET_NAME}-${i}.${SERVICE_NAME} > /dev/null && break
                    sleep 1s
                done
            done

            # re-joining after failure?
            if [[ -e /var/run/etcd/default.etcd && -f /var/run/etcd/member_id ]]; then
                echo "Re-joining etcd member"
                member_id=$(cat /var/run/etcd/member_id)

                # re-join member
                ETCDCTL_ENDPOINT=$(eps) etcdctl member update ${member_id} http://${HOSTNAME}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2380 | true
                exec etcd --name ${HOSTNAME} \
                    --listen-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
                    --listen-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379\
                    --advertise-client-urls http://${HOSTNAME}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2379 \
                    --data-dir /var/run/etcd/default.etcd
            fi

            # etcd-SET_ID
            SET_ID=${HOSTNAME##*[^0-9]}

            # adding a new member to existing cluster (assuming all initial pods are available)
            if [ "${SET_ID}" -ge ${INITIAL_CLUSTER_SIZE} ]; then
                export ETCDCTL_ENDPOINT=$(eps)

                # member already added?
                MEMBER_HASH=$(member_hash)
                if [ -n "${MEMBER_HASH}" ]; then
                    # the member hash exists but for some reason etcd failed
                    # as the datadir has not be created, we can remove the member
                    # and retrieve new hash
                    etcdctl member remove ${MEMBER_HASH}
                fi

                echo "Adding new member"
                etcdctl member add ${HOSTNAME} http://${HOSTNAME}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2380 | grep "^ETCD_" > /var/run/etcd/new_member_envs

                if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
                    echo "Exiting"
                    rm -f /var/run/etcd/new_member_envs
                    exit 1
                fi

                cat /var/run/etcd/new_member_envs
                source /var/run/etcd/new_member_envs

                collect_member &

                exec etcd --name ${HOSTNAME} \
                    --listen-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
                    --listen-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
                    --advertise-client-urls http://${HOSTNAME}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2379 \
                    --data-dir /var/run/etcd/default.etcd \
                    --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://${HOSTNAME}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2380 \
                    --initial-cluster ${ETCD_INITIAL_CLUSTER} \
                    --initial-cluster-state ${ETCD_INITIAL_CLUSTER_STATE}
            fi

            PEERS=""
            for i in $(seq 0 $((${INITIAL_CLUSTER_SIZE} - 1))); do
                PEERS="${PEERS}${PEERS:+,}${SET_NAME}-${i}=http://${SET_NAME}-${i}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2380"
            done

            collect_member &

            # join member
            exec etcd --name ${HOSTNAME} \
                --initial-advertise-peer-urls http://${HOSTNAME}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2380 \
                --listen-peer-urls http://0.0.0.0:2380 \
                --listen-client-urls http://0.0.0.0:2379 \
                --advertise-client-urls http://${HOSTNAME}.${SERVICE_NAME}:2379 \
                --initial-cluster-token etcd-cluster-1 \
                --initial-cluster ${PEERS} \
                --initial-cluster-state new \
                --data-dir /var/run/etcd/default.etcd
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-etcd-data
          mountPath: /var/run/etcd
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-etcd-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
        - "ReadWriteOnce"
      resources:
        requests:
          # upstream recommended max is 700M
          storage: "1Gi"
      storageClassName: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-etcd-data
---
# Source: multicloud/charts/multicloud-k8s/charts/mongo/templates/statefulset.yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-mongo
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: multicloud-k8s-mongo
    chart: mongo-5.0.0
    release: dev-multicloud
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  serviceName: multicloud-k8s-mongo
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: multicloud-k8s-mongo
        release: dev-multicloud
    spec:
      initContainers:
#

      containers:
        - name: multicloud-k8s-mongo
          image: "registry.hub.docker.com/library/mongo:4.0.8"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          env:
            - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
              value: "mongo"
          ports:
          - containerPort: 27017
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
                - mongo
                - --eval
                - "db.adminCommand('ping')"
            initialDelaySeconds: 30
            periodSeconds: 10
            timeoutSeconds: 5
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 27017
            initialDelaySeconds: 5
            periodSeconds: 10
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /var/lib/mongo
            name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-mongo-data
          resources:
                        null
                        
      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-mongo-data
#
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: dev-multicloud-multicloud-k8s-mongo-data
#

1. Get the application URL by running these commands:
  export POD_NAME=$(kubectl get pods --namespace onap -l "app=multicloud,release=dev-multicloud" -o jsonpath="{.items[0].metadata.name}")
  echo "Visit http://127.0.0.1:8080 to use your application"
  kubectl port-forward $POD_NAME 8080:9001

  namespace: onap

    service.alpha.kubernetes.io/tolerate-unready-endpoints: "true"

  name: nbi-galera
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: dev-nbi-nbi-galera
    chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-nbi"
    heritage: "Tiller"

    - name: nbi-galera
      port: 3306
  clusterIP: None

      name: mongo
  selector:

    release: dev-nbi

    app: nbi

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-nbi-nbi
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: nbi
    chart: nbi-5.0.0
    release: dev-nbi
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nbi
        release: dev-nbi
        name: dev-nbi-nbi
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: nbi
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/externalapi/nbi:5.0.1"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
            - containerPort: 8080
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8080
            initialDelaySeconds: 180
            periodSeconds: 30
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8080
            initialDelaySeconds: 185
            periodSeconds: 30
          env:
            - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_URL
              value: jdbc:mariadb://nbi-galera.onap:3306/nbi
            - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_USERNAME
              value: rene
            - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: dev-nbi-nbi-secret
                  key: db-user-password
            - name: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_HOST
              value: nbi-mongohost.onap
            - name: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_PORT
              value: "27017"
            - name: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_DATABASE
              value: ServiceOrderDB
            - name: ONAP_LCPCLOUDREGIONID
              value: Yolo
            - name: ONAP_TENANTID
              value: "1234"
            - name: ONAP_CLOUDOWNER
              value: CloudOwner
            - name: NBI_URL
              value: "http://nbi.onap:8080/nbi/api/v4"
            - name: SDC_HOST
              value: "https://sdc-be.onap:8443"
            - name: SDC_HEADER_ECOMPINSTANCEID
              value: OOM
            - name: SDC_HEADER_AUTHORIZATION
              value: Basic YWFpOktwOGJKNFNYc3pNMFdYbGhhazNlSGxjc2UyZ0F3ODR2YW9HR21KdlV5MlU=
            - name: AAI_HOST
              value: "https://aai.onap:8443"
            - name: AAI_HEADER_AUTHORIZATION
              value: Basic QUFJOkFBSQ==
            - name: SO_HOST
              value: http://so.onap:8080
            - name: DMAAP_HOST
              value: "http://message-router.onap:3904"
            - name: LOGGING_LEVEL_ORG_ONAP_NBI
              value: INFO
            - name: MSB_ENABLED
              value: "true"
            - name: MSB_DISCOVERY_HOST
              value: "msb-discovery.onap"
            - name: MSB_DISCOVERY_PORT
              value: "10081"
          volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /etc/localtime
              name: localtime
              readOnly: true
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      # side car containers
        # - name: filebeat-onap
        #   image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
        #   imagePullPolicy: Always

apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: dev-nbi-nbi-galera
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: dev-nbi-nbi-galera
    chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-nbi"
    heritage: "Tiller"
spec:
  serviceName: nbi-galera
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dev-nbi-nbi-galera
        chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"

        heritage: "Tiller"

          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime

            name: replication

            periodSeconds: 10

  name: dev-nbi-nbi-mongo

spec:
  serviceName: nbi-mongohost
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nbi-mongo
        release: dev-nbi
    spec:
      initContainers:
#

      containers:
        - name: nbi-mongo
          image: "registry.hub.docker.com/library/mongo:4.0.8"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          env:
            - name: MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE
              value: "ServiceOrderDB"
          ports:
          - containerPort: 27017
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
                - mongo
                - --eval
                - "db.adminCommand('ping')"
            initialDelaySeconds: 30
            periodSeconds: 10
            timeoutSeconds: 5
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 27017
            initialDelaySeconds: 5
            periodSeconds: 10
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /var/lib/mongo
            name: dev-nbi-nbi-mongo-data
          resources:
                        null
                        
      volumes:
      - name: localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: dev-nbi-nbi-mongo-data
#
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: dev-nbi-nbi-mongo-data

      image:
        filebeat: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0
        optf_has: onap/optf-has:1.3.3
        readiness: oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0
      ingress:
        enabled: true
        virtualhost:
          baseurl: simpledemo.onap.org
          enabled: true
      loggingImage: beats/filebeat:5.5.0
      loggingRepository: docker.elastic.co
      nodePortPrefix: 302
      nodePortPrefixExt: 304
      persistence:
        enableDefaultStorageclass: false
        mountPath: /dockerdata-nfs
        parameters: {}
        storageclassProvisioner: kubernetes.io/no-provisioner
        volumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
      pullPolicy: Always
      readinessImage: readiness-check:2.0.0
      readinessRepository: oomk8s
      repository: nexus3.onap.org:10001
      repositoryCred:
        password: docker
        user: docker
    ingress:
      enabled: false
    liveness:
      enabled: true
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
    nodeSelector: {}

    governing permissions and\n# limitations under the License.\n-->\n<included>\n\t<jmxConfigurator
    />\n\t<!-- Example evaluator filter applied against console appender -->\n<property
    name=\"p_tim\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;, UTC}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_lvl\" value=\"%level\"/>\n\t\t<property name=\"p_log\" value=\"%logger\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_mdc\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%mdc){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_msg\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%msg){'\\t', '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_exc\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%rootException){'\\t', '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_mak\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%marker){'\\t', '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_thr\" value=\"%thread\"/>\n\t\t<property name=\"defaultPattern\" value=\"%nopexception${p_tim}\\t${p_thr}\\t${p_lvl}\\t${p_log}\\t${p_mdc}\\t${p_msg}\\t${p_exc}\\t${p_mak}\\t%n\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"debugPattern\" value=\"%nopexception${p_tim}|${p_lvl}|${p_mdc}|${p_exc}|%msg%n\"/>\n\n\t\t<!--
    Example evaluator filter applied against console appender -->\n\t\t<appender name=\"STDOUT\"
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender\">\n\t\t\t\t<filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<level>INFO</level>\n\t\t\t\t</filter>\n\t\t\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t\t\t<pattern>%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS}
    [%thread] %-5level %logger{1024} - %msg%n</pattern>\n\t\t\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t</appender>\n\n\t\t<appender
    name=\"ERROR\"\n\t\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t\t\t<filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<level>INFO</level>\n\t\t\t\t</filter>\n\t\t\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/error2.log</file>\n\t\t\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<pattern>${defaultPattern}</pattern>\n\t\t\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t\t\t<rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<fileNamePattern>${outputDirectory}/cmso/error.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log.zip</fileNamePattern>\n\t\t\t\t\t<maxFileSize>50MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t\t\t\t<maxHistory>30</maxHistory>\n\t\t\t\t\t<totalSizeCap>10GB</totalSizeCap>\n\t\t\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t\t\t<triggeringPolicy\n\t\t\t\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<maxFileSize>10MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t\t\t</triggeringPolicy>\n\t\t</appender>\n\n\t\t<appender
    name=\"DEBUG\"\n\t\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/debug.log</file>\n\t\t\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<pattern>${debugPattern}</pattern>\n\t\t\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t\t\t<rollingPolicy

    name=\"AUDIT\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/audit.log</file>\n\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t<pattern>%X{BeginTimestamp}|%X{EndTimestamp}|%X{RequestId}|%X{ServiceInstanceId}|%.20thread|%X{VirtualServerName}|%X{ServiceName}|%X{PartnerName}|%X{StatusCode}|%X{ResponseCode}|%X{ResponseDescription}|%X{InstanceUUID}|%.-5level|%X{AlertSeverity}|%X{ServerIPAddress}|%X{ElapsedTime}|%X{ServerFQDN}|%X{RemoteHost}|%X{ClassName}|%X{Unused}|%X{ProcessKey}|%X{CustomField1}|%X{CustomField2}|%X{CustomField3}|%X{CustomField4}|%msg%n\n\t\t\t</pattern>\n\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t<rollingPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.FixedWindowRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxIndex>10</maxIndex>\n\t\t\t<FileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/audit.%i.log.zip\n\t\t\t</FileNamePattern>\n\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t<triggeringPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxFileSize>10MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t</triggeringPolicy>\n\t</appender>\n\t<appender

    [%thread] %-5level %logger{1024} - %msg%n\"</pattern>\n\t\t</encoder>\n\t</appender>\n\t<appender
    name=\"perfLogs\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t<filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n\t\t</filter>\n\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/Perform-${lrmRVer}-${lrmRO}-${Pid}.log</file>\n\t\t<rollingPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.FixedWindowRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/Perform-${lrmRVer}-${lrmRO}-${Pid}.%i.log.zip\n\t\t\t</fileNamePattern>\n\t\t\t<minIndex>1</minIndex>\n\t\t\t<maxIndex>9</maxIndex>\n\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t<triggeringPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxFileSize>5MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t</triggeringPolicy>\n\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t<pattern>\"%d
    [%thread] %-5level %logger{1024} - %msg%n\"</pattern>\n\t\t</encoder>\n\t</appender>\n\t<logger
    name=\"AuditRecord\" level=\"INFO\" additivity=\"FALSE\">\n\t\t<appender-ref ref=\"auditLogs\"

    logback jms appenders & loggers definition ends here -->\n\n\t<root level=\"DEBUG\">\n\t\t<appender-ref

    spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mariadb://${DB_HOST}:${DB_PORT}/${DB_SCHEMA}
    spring.datasource.driver-class-name=org.mariadb.jdbc.Driver
    spring.datasource.username=${DB_USERNAME}
    spring.datasource.password=${DB_PASSWORD}
    cmso.database.password=${DB_PASSWORD}
  
    spring.datasource.initialize=false
    spring.datasource.tomcat.max-wait=10000
    spring.datasource.tomcat.initialSize=5
    spring.datasource.tomcat.max-active=25
    spring.datasource.tomcat.test-on-borrow=true
  
    spring.jpa.show-sql=false
    spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=none
    spring.jpa.hibernate.naming.strategy=org.hibernate.cfg.EJB3NamingStrategy
    spring.jpa.database-platform=org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL5InnoDBDialect

    spring.jpa.hibernate.id.new_generator_mappings=false
    hibernate.id.new_generator_mappings=false
  
    logging.level.org.hibernate.SQL=WARN
    logging.level.org.hibernate=WARN
    #-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  
    #
    cmso.aaf.enabled=false
  
    # Enable swagger - Enable in development and test only
    cmso.swagger.enabled=true
  
    # Enable schedule immediate to be dispatched without ticket approvals
    # Has no effect when in vTM loopback mode as always approved.
    cmso.cm.dispatch.immediate.enabled = true
  
    # NUmber of seconds between sniro dispatch jobs
    cmso.optimizer.job.interval.ms=10000
  
    # NUmber of seconds between change management cmso polling jobs
    # Controls frequenct of polling to the ChangeManagementScheduler table...
    cmso.cm.polling.job.interval.ms=10000
    # How many management cmso polling intervals to look ahead to dispatch
    # (To account for possible latency of the polling job)
    cmso.cm.polling.job.lookahead.intervals=5
    # Lead time before event time to enable dispatcher to
    # test that it is safe to dispatch (i.e. meeting reminder lead time)
    cmso.cm.dispatcher.lead.time.ms=5000
    # Lead time to prepare and call VID to dispatch work to MSO
    # Includes latency from VID call to the start of the workflow
    cmso.cm.dispatch.lead.time.ms=1000
  
    # Interval between polling to check status of schedules in Notifications Initiated status
    cmso.status.job.interval.ms=60000
  
    org.quartz.jobStore.class=org.quartz.simpl.RAMJobStore
  
    loopback.mso.requestId=dummy123
  
    so.polling.interval.ms=10000

  logback.xml: "<?xml version = \"1.0\" encoding = \"UTF-8\" ?>\n<!--\n# Copyright
