    />\n\t<!-- Example evaluator filter applied against console appender -->\n<property
    name=\"p_tim\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;, UTC}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_lvl\" value=\"%level\"/>\n\t\t<property name=\"p_log\" value=\"%logger\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_mdc\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%mdc){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_msg\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%msg){'\\t', '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_exc\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%rootException){'\\t', '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_mak\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%marker){'\\t', '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_thr\" value=\"%thread\"/>\n\t\t<property name=\"defaultPattern\" value=\"%nopexception${p_tim}\\t${p_thr}\\t${p_lvl}\\t${p_log}\\t${p_mdc}\\t${p_msg}\\t${p_exc}\\t${p_mak}\\t%n\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"debugPattern\" value=\"%nopexception${p_tim}|${p_lvl}|${p_mdc}|${p_exc}|%msg%n\"/>\n\n\t\t<!--
    Example evaluator filter applied against console appender -->\n\t\t<appender name=\"STDOUT\"
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender\">\n\t\t\t\t<filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<level>INFO</level>\n\t\t\t\t</filter>\n\t\t\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t\t\t<pattern>%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS}
    [%thread] %-5level %logger{1024} - %msg%n</pattern>\n\t\t\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t</appender>\n\n\t\t<appender
    name=\"ERROR\"\n\t\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t\t\t<filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<level>INFO</level>\n\t\t\t\t</filter>\n\t\t\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/error2.log</file>\n\t\t\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<pattern>${defaultPattern}</pattern>\n\t\t\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t\t\t<rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<fileNamePattern>${outputDirectory}/cmso/error.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log.zip</fileNamePattern>\n\t\t\t\t\t<maxFileSize>50MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t\t\t\t<maxHistory>30</maxHistory>\n\t\t\t\t\t<totalSizeCap>10GB</totalSizeCap>\n\t\t\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t\t\t<triggeringPolicy\n\t\t\t\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<maxFileSize>10MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t\t\t</triggeringPolicy>\n\t\t</appender>\n\n\t\t<appender
    name=\"DEBUG\"\n\t\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/debug.log</file>\n\t\t\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<pattern>${debugPattern}</pattern>\n\t\t\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t\t\t<rollingPolicy

    [%thread] %-5level %logger{1024} - %msg%n\"</pattern>\n\t\t</encoder>\n\t</appender>\n\t<appender
    name=\"perfLogs\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t<filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n\t\t</filter>\n\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/Perform-${lrmRVer}-${lrmRO}-${Pid}.log</file>\n\t\t<rollingPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.FixedWindowRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/Perform-${lrmRVer}-${lrmRO}-${Pid}.%i.log.zip\n\t\t\t</fileNamePattern>\n\t\t\t<minIndex>1</minIndex>\n\t\t\t<maxIndex>9</maxIndex>\n\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t<triggeringPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxFileSize>5MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t</triggeringPolicy>\n\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t<pattern>\"%d
    [%thread] %-5level %logger{1024} - %msg%n\"</pattern>\n\t\t</encoder>\n\t</appender>\n\t<logger
    name=\"AuditRecord\" level=\"INFO\" additivity=\"FALSE\">\n\t\t<appender-ref ref=\"auditLogs\"
    />\n\t</logger>\n\t<logger name=\"AuditRecord_DirectCall\" level=\"INFO\"\n\t\tadditivity=\"FALSE\">\n\t\t<appender-ref
    ref=\"auditLogs\" />\n\t</logger>\n\t<logger name=\"PerfTrackerRecord\" level=\"INFO\"
    additivity=\"FALSE\">\n\t\t<appender-ref ref=\"perfLogs\" />\n\t</logger>\n\t<!--
    logback jms appenders & loggers definition ends here -->\n\n\t<root level=\"DEBUG\">\n\t\t<appender-ref
    ref=\"DEBUG\" />\n\t\t<appender-ref ref=\"STDOUT\" />\n\t</root>\n</included>\n\n"
  optimizer.properties: "#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n#

kind: ConfigMap

  name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-ticketmgt
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: oof-cmso-ticketmgt
    chart: oof-cmso-ticketmgt-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  cadi.properties: "#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n#
    ============LICENSE_START==============================================\n# Copyright

  logback.xml: "<?xml version = \"1.0\" encoding = \"UTF-8\" ?>\n<!--\n# Copyright 
    2018  AT&T, Amdocs, Bell Canada Intellectual Property.  All rights reserved.\n#\n#
    Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\n# you may not
    use this file except in compliance with the License.\n# You may obtain a copy of
    the License at\n#\n#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\n#\n# Unless
    required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\n# distributed under
    the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\n# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS
    OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\n# See the License for the specific language
    governing permissions and\n# limitations under the License.\n-->\n<included>\n\t<jmxConfigurator
    />\n\t<!-- Example evaluator filter applied against console appender -->\n<property
    name=\"p_tim\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;, UTC}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_lvl\" value=\"%level\"/>\n\t\t<property name=\"p_log\" value=\"%logger\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_mdc\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%mdc){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_msg\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%msg){'\\t', '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_exc\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%rootException){'\\t', '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_mak\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%marker){'\\t', '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_thr\" value=\"%thread\"/>\n\t\t<property name=\"defaultPattern\" value=\"%nopexception${p_tim}\\t${p_thr}\\t${p_lvl}\\t${p_log}\\t${p_mdc}\\t${p_msg}\\t${p_exc}\\t${p_mak}\\t%n\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"debugPattern\" value=\"%nopexception${p_tim}|${p_lvl}|${p_mdc}|${p_exc}|%msg%n\"/>\n\n\t\t<!--
    Example evaluator filter applied against console appender -->\n\t\t<appender name=\"STDOUT\"
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender\">\n\t\t\t\t<filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<level>INFO</level>\n\t\t\t\t</filter>\n\t\t\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t\t\t<pattern>%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS}
    [%thread] %-5level %logger{1024} - %msg%n</pattern>\n\t\t\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t</appender>\n\n\t\t<appender
    name=\"ERROR\"\n\t\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t\t\t<filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<level>INFO</level>\n\t\t\t\t</filter>\n\t\t\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/error2.log</file>\n\t\t\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<pattern>${defaultPattern}</pattern>\n\t\t\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t\t\t<rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<fileNamePattern>${outputDirectory}/cmso/error.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log.zip</fileNamePattern>\n\t\t\t\t\t<maxFileSize>50MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t\t\t\t<maxHistory>30</maxHistory>\n\t\t\t\t\t<totalSizeCap>10GB</totalSizeCap>\n\t\t\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t\t\t<triggeringPolicy\n\t\t\t\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<maxFileSize>10MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t\t\t</triggeringPolicy>\n\t\t</appender>\n\n\t\t<appender
    name=\"DEBUG\"\n\t\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/debug.log</file>\n\t\t\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<pattern>${debugPattern}</pattern>\n\t\t\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t\t\t<rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<fileNamePattern>${outputDirectory}/cmso/debug.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log.zip</fileNamePattern>\n\t\t\t\t\t<maxFileSize>50MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t\t\t\t<maxHistory>30</maxHistory>\n\t\t\t\t\t<totalSizeCap>10GB</totalSizeCap>\n\t\t\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t</appender>\n\n\n\t<appender
    name=\"AUDIT\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/audit.log</file>\n\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t<pattern>%X{BeginTimestamp}|%X{EndTimestamp}|%X{RequestId}|%X{ServiceInstanceId}|%.20thread|%X{VirtualServerName}|%X{ServiceName}|%X{PartnerName}|%X{StatusCode}|%X{ResponseCode}|%X{ResponseDescription}|%X{InstanceUUID}|%.-5level|%X{AlertSeverity}|%X{ServerIPAddress}|%X{ElapsedTime}|%X{ServerFQDN}|%X{RemoteHost}|%X{ClassName}|%X{Unused}|%X{ProcessKey}|%X{CustomField1}|%X{CustomField2}|%X{CustomField3}|%X{CustomField4}|%msg%n\n\t\t\t</pattern>\n\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t<rollingPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.FixedWindowRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxIndex>10</maxIndex>\n\t\t\t<FileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/audit.%i.log.zip\n\t\t\t</FileNamePattern>\n\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t<triggeringPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxFileSize>10MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t</triggeringPolicy>\n\t</appender>\n\t<appender
    name=\"asyncEELFAudit\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n\t\t<queueSize>256</queueSize>\n\t\t<appender-ref
    ref=\"AUDIT\" />\n\t</appender>\n\n\t<appender name=\"METRIC\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/metric.log</file>\n\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t<pattern>%X{BeginTimestamp}|%X{EndTimestamp}|%X{RequestId}|%X{ServiceInstanceId}|%.20thread|%X{VirtualServerName}|%X{ServiceName}|%X{PartnerName}|%X{TargetEntity}|%X{TargetServiceName}|%X{StatusCode}|%X{ResponseCode}|%X{ResponseDescription}|%X{InstanceUUID}|%.-5level|%X{AlertSeverity}|%X{ServerIPAddress}|%X{ElapsedTime}|%X{ServerFQDN}|%X{RemoteHost}|%X{ClassName}|%X{Unused}|%X{ProcessKey}|%X{TargetVirtualEntity}|%X{CustomField1}|%X{CustomField2}|%X{CustomField3}|%X{CustomField4}|\n\t\t\t\t%msg%n</pattern>\n\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t<rollingPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.FixedWindowRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxIndex>10</maxIndex>\n\t\t\t<FileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/metric.%i.log.zip\n\t\t\t</FileNamePattern>\n\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t<triggeringPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxFileSize>10MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t</triggeringPolicy>\n\t</appender>\n\t<appender
    name=\"asyncEELFMetrics\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n\t\t<queueSize>256</queueSize>\n\t\t<appender-ref
    ref=\"METRIC\" />\n\t</appender>\n\n\t<!-- SECURITY related loggers -->\n\t<appender
    name=\"SECURITY\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/security.log</file>\n\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t<pattern>%X{BeginTimestamp}|%X{EndTimestamp}|%X{RequestId}|%X{ServiceInstanceId}|%.20thread|%X{VirtualServerName}|%X{ServiceName}|%X{PartnerName}|%X{StatusCode}|%X{ResponseCode}|%X{ResponseDescription}|%X{InstanceUUID}|%.-5level|%X{AlertSeverity}|%X{ServerIPAddress}|%X{ElapsedTime}|%X{ServerFQDN}|%X{RemoteHost}|%X{ClassName}|%X{Unused}|%X{ProcessKey}|%X{CustomField1}|%X{CustomField2}|%X{CustomField3}|%X{CustomField4}|%msg%n\n\t\t\t</pattern>\n\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t<rollingPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.FixedWindowRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxIndex>10</maxIndex>\n\t\t\t<FileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/security.%i.log.zip\n\t\t\t</FileNamePattern>\n\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t<triggeringPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxFileSize>10MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t</triggeringPolicy>\n\t</appender>\n\t<appender
    name=\"asyncEELFSecurity\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n\t\t<queueSize>256</queueSize>\n\t\t<appender-ref
    ref=\"SECURITY\" />\n\t</appender>\n\t<!-- AAF related loggers -->\n\t<logger name=\"org.onap.aaf\"
    level=\"INFO\" additivity=\"true\">\n\t\t<appender-ref ref=\"DEBUG\" />\n\t</logger>\n\t<logger
    name=\"org.apache.catalina.core\" level=\"INFO\"\n\t\tadditivity=\"true\">\n\t\t<appender-ref
    ref=\"DEBUG\" />\n\t</logger>\n\t<logger name=\"org.onap.cmso\" level=\"INFO\"\n\t\tadditivity=\"true\">\n\t\t<appender-ref
    ref=\"ERROR\" />\n\t</logger>\n\n\t<!-- CLDS related loggers -->\n\t<logger name=\"com.att.eelf.error\"
    level=\"OFF\" additivity=\"true\">\n\t\t<appender-ref ref=\"ERROR\" />\n\t</logger>\n\t<!--
    EELF related loggers -->\n\t<logger name=\"com.att.eelf.audit\" level=\"INFO\"\n\t\tadditivity=\"false\">\n\t\t<appender-ref
    ref=\"asyncEELFAudit\" />\n\t</logger>\n\t<logger name=\"com.att.eelf.metrics\"
    level=\"DEBUG\"\n\t\tadditivity=\"false\">\n\t\t<appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFMetrics\"
    />\n\t</logger>\n\t<logger name=\"com.att.eelf.security\" level=\"DEBUG\"\n\t\tadditivity=\"false\">\n\t\t<appender-ref
    ref=\"asyncEELFSecurity\" />\n\t</logger>\n\n\t<!-- Spring related loggers -->\n\t<logger
    name=\"org.springframework\" level=\"DEBUG\" />\n\n\t<!-- Other Loggers that may
    help troubleshoot -->\n\t<logger name=\"org.apache\" level=\"DEBUG\" />\n\n\t<!--
    logback internals logging -->\n\t<logger name=\"ch.qos.logback.classic\" level=\"INFO\"
    />\n\t<logger name=\"ch.qos.logback.core\" level=\"INFO\" />\n\n\t<!-- logback jms
    appenders & loggers definition starts here -->\n\t<appender name=\"auditLogs\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t<filter

    [%thread] %-5level %logger{1024} - %msg%n\"</pattern>\n\t\t</encoder>\n\t</appender>\n\t<appender
    name=\"perfLogs\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t<filter

    governing \n# permissions and limitations under the License.\n# ============LICENSE_END=================================================\n#
    \n#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------\ncadi_loglevel=DEBUG\ncadi_prop_files=/share/etc/certs/org.onap.oof.props\n\n"
  logback.xml: "<?xml version = \"1.0\" encoding = \"UTF-8\" ?>\n<!--\n# Copyright 
    2018  AT&T, Amdocs, Bell Canada Intellectual Property.  All rights reserved.\n#\n#
    Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\n# you may not
    use this file except in compliance with the License.\n# You may obtain a copy of
    the License at\n#\n#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\n#\n# Unless
    required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\n# distributed under
    the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\n# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS
    OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\n# See the License for the specific language
    governing permissions and\n# limitations under the License.\n-->\n<included>\n\t<jmxConfigurator
    />\n\t<!-- Example evaluator filter applied against console appender -->\n<property
    name=\"p_tim\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;, UTC}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_lvl\" value=\"%level\"/>\n\t\t<property name=\"p_log\" value=\"%logger\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_mdc\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%mdc){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_msg\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%msg){'\\t', '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_exc\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%rootException){'\\t', '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_mak\" value=\"%replace(%replace(%marker){'\\t', '\\\\\\\\t'}){'\\n','\\\\\\\\n'}\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"p_thr\" value=\"%thread\"/>\n\t\t<property name=\"defaultPattern\" value=\"%nopexception${p_tim}\\t${p_thr}\\t${p_lvl}\\t${p_log}\\t${p_mdc}\\t${p_msg}\\t${p_exc}\\t${p_mak}\\t%n\"/>\n\t\t<property
    name=\"debugPattern\" value=\"%nopexception${p_tim}|${p_lvl}|${p_mdc}|${p_exc}|%msg%n\"/>\n\n\t\t<!--
    Example evaluator filter applied against console appender -->\n\t\t<appender name=\"STDOUT\"
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender\">\n\t\t\t\t<filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<level>INFO</level>\n\t\t\t\t</filter>\n\t\t\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t\t\t<pattern>%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS}
    [%thread] %-5level %logger{1024} - %msg%n</pattern>\n\t\t\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t</appender>\n\n\t\t<appender
    name=\"ERROR\"\n\t\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t\t\t<filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<level>INFO</level>\n\t\t\t\t</filter>\n\t\t\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/error2.log</file>\n\t\t\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<pattern>${defaultPattern}</pattern>\n\t\t\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t\t\t<rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<fileNamePattern>${outputDirectory}/cmso/error.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log.zip</fileNamePattern>\n\t\t\t\t\t<maxFileSize>50MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t\t\t\t<maxHistory>30</maxHistory>\n\t\t\t\t\t<totalSizeCap>10GB</totalSizeCap>\n\t\t\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t\t\t<triggeringPolicy\n\t\t\t\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<maxFileSize>10MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t\t\t</triggeringPolicy>\n\t\t</appender>\n\n\t\t<appender
    name=\"DEBUG\"\n\t\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/debug.log</file>\n\t\t\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<pattern>${debugPattern}</pattern>\n\t\t\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t\t\t<rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<fileNamePattern>${outputDirectory}/cmso/debug.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log.zip</fileNamePattern>\n\t\t\t\t\t<maxFileSize>50MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t\t\t\t<maxHistory>30</maxHistory>\n\t\t\t\t\t<totalSizeCap>10GB</totalSizeCap>\n\t\t\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t</appender>\n\n\n\t<appender
    name=\"AUDIT\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/audit.log</file>\n\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t<pattern>%X{BeginTimestamp}|%X{EndTimestamp}|%X{RequestId}|%X{ServiceInstanceId}|%.20thread|%X{VirtualServerName}|%X{ServiceName}|%X{PartnerName}|%X{StatusCode}|%X{ResponseCode}|%X{ResponseDescription}|%X{InstanceUUID}|%.-5level|%X{AlertSeverity}|%X{ServerIPAddress}|%X{ElapsedTime}|%X{ServerFQDN}|%X{RemoteHost}|%X{ClassName}|%X{Unused}|%X{ProcessKey}|%X{CustomField1}|%X{CustomField2}|%X{CustomField3}|%X{CustomField4}|%msg%n\n\t\t\t</pattern>\n\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t<rollingPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.FixedWindowRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxIndex>10</maxIndex>\n\t\t\t<FileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/audit.%i.log.zip\n\t\t\t</FileNamePattern>\n\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t<triggeringPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxFileSize>10MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t</triggeringPolicy>\n\t</appender>\n\t<appender
    name=\"asyncEELFAudit\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n\t\t<queueSize>256</queueSize>\n\t\t<appender-ref
    ref=\"AUDIT\" />\n\t</appender>\n\n\t<appender name=\"METRIC\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t<file>${logDirectory}/metric.log</file>\n\t\t<append>true</append>\n\t\t<encoder>\n\t\t\t<pattern>%X{BeginTimestamp}|%X{EndTimestamp}|%X{RequestId}|%X{ServiceInstanceId}|%.20thread|%X{VirtualServerName}|%X{ServiceName}|%X{PartnerName}|%X{TargetEntity}|%X{TargetServiceName}|%X{StatusCode}|%X{ResponseCode}|%X{ResponseDescription}|%X{InstanceUUID}|%.-5level|%X{AlertSeverity}|%X{ServerIPAddress}|%X{ElapsedTime}|%X{ServerFQDN}|%X{RemoteHost}|%X{ClassName}|%X{Unused}|%X{ProcessKey}|%X{TargetVirtualEntity}|%X{CustomField1}|%X{CustomField2}|%X{CustomField3}|%X{CustomField4}|\n\t\t\t\t%msg%n</pattern>\n\t\t</encoder>\n\t\t<rollingPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.FixedWindowRollingPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxIndex>10</maxIndex>\n\t\t\t<FileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/metric.%i.log.zip\n\t\t\t</FileNamePattern>\n\t\t</rollingPolicy>\n\t\t<triggeringPolicy\n\t\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\n\t\t\t<maxFileSize>10MB</maxFileSize>\n\t\t</triggeringPolicy>\n\t</appender>\n\t<appender
    name=\"asyncEELFMetrics\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\n\t\t<queueSize>256</queueSize>\n\t\t<appender-ref
    ref=\"METRIC\" />\n\t</appender>\n\n\t<!-- SECURITY related loggers -->\n\t<appender

    logback internals logging -->\n\t<logger name=\"ch.qos.logback.classic\" level=\"INFO\"
    />\n\t<logger name=\"ch.qos.logback.core\" level=\"INFO\" />\n\n\t<!-- logback jms
    appenders & loggers definition starts here -->\n\t<appender name=\"auditLogs\"\n\t\tclass=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\n\t\t<filter

    logback jms appenders & loggers definition ends here -->\n\n\t<root level=\"DEBUG\">\n\t\t<appender-ref

# Source: oof/charts/oof-cmso/templates/configmap.yaml
# Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada
# Modifications Copyright  2018 AT&T
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-cmso-filebeat-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: oof-cmso
    chart: oof-cmso-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  filebeat.yml: |
    # Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada, AT&T
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
  
    filebeat.prospectors:
    #it is mandatory, in our case it's log
    - input_type: log
      #This is the canolical path as mentioned in logback.xml, *.* means it will monitor all files in the directory.
      paths:
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*.log
      #Files older than this should be ignored.In our case it will be 48 hours i.e. 2 days. It is a helping flag for clean_inactive
      ignore_older: 48h
      # Remove the registry entry for a file that is more than the specified time. In our case it will be 96 hours, i.e. 4 days. It will help to keep registry records with in limit
      clean_inactive: 96h
  
  
    # Name of the registry file. If a relative path is used, it is considered relative to the
    # data path. Else full qualified file name.
    #filebeat.registry_file: ${path.data}/registry
  
  
    output.logstash:
      #List of logstash server ip addresses with port number.
      #But, in our case, this will be the loadbalancer IP address.
      #For the below property to work the loadbalancer or logstash should expose 5044 port to listen the filebeat events or port in the property should be changed appropriately.
      hosts: ["log-ls.onap:5044"]
      #If enable will do load balancing among availabe Logstash, automatically.
      loadbalance: true
  
      #The list of root certificates for server verifications.
      #If certificate_authorities is empty or not set, the trusted
      #certificate authorities of the host system are used.
      #ssl.certificate_authorities: $ssl.certificate_authorities
  
      #The path to the certificate for SSL client authentication. If the certificate is not specified,
      #client authentication is not available.
      #ssl.certificate: $ssl.certificate
  
      #The client certificate key used for client authentication.
      #ssl.key: $ssl.key
  
      #The passphrase used to decrypt an encrypted key stored in the configured key file
      #ssl.key_passphrase: $ssl.key_passphrase
---
# Source: oof/charts/oof-has/charts/music/charts/music-cassandra-job/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-music-cassandra-job-cql
  namespace: onap
data:
  admin.cql: |
    CREATE KEYSPACE IF NOT EXISTS admin
        WITH REPLICATION = {
            'class' : 'SimpleStrategy',
            'replication_factor': 3
        }
        AND DURABLE_WRITES = true;
  
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS admin.keyspace_master (
        uuid uuid,
        keyspace_name text,
        application_name text,
        is_api boolean,
        password text,
        username text,
        is_aaf boolean,
        PRIMARY KEY (uuid)
    );
  
    describe keyspaces;
  admin_pw.cql: |+
    CREATE ROLE IF NOT EXISTS nelson24
    WITH PASSWORD = 'nelson24'
    AND SUPERUSER = true
    AND LOGIN = true;
  
    ALTER ROLE cassandra
    WITH PASSWORD = 'A2C4E6G8I0J2L4O6Q8S0U2W4Y6';
---
# Source: oof/charts/oof-has/charts/music/charts/music-cassandra-job/templates/configmap_extra.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-music-cassandra-job-extra-cql
  namespace: onap
data:
  check.cql: |+
    CREATE KEYSPACE testks
        WITH REPLICATION = {
            'class' : 'SimpleStrategy',
            'replication_factor': 3
        }
        AND DURABLE_WRITES = true;
  
    CREATE TABLE testks.keyspace_master_table (
        uuid uuid,
        keyspace_name text,
        application_name text,
        is_api boolean,
        password text,
        username text,
        is_aaf boolean,
        PRIMARY KEY (uuid)
    );
  
    DESCRIBE KEYSPACES;
    DESCRIBE keyspace testks;
    SELECT * FROM system_auth.roles;
    DROP keyspace testks;
---

  healthy.sh: |
    # Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada
    # Modifications Copyright  2018 AT&T,VMware
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
  
    #!/bin/bash
  
    # Controller is a process that reads from Music Q
    # It uses no ports (TCP or HTTP). The PROB will check
    # if the controller process exists or not. In case
    # it exists, it will send 0, else send 1 so k8s can i
    # restart the container
  
    pid="$(pgrep -f '/usr/local/bin/conductor')"
    if [ -z "$pid" ]
    then
       echo 1
    else
       echo 0
    fi
  log.conf: |
    # Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada
    # Modifications Copyright  2018 AT&T,VMware
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
  
    [loggers]
    keys=root
  
    [handlers]
    keys=trfhand,consoleHandler,audithand,metrichand,errhand,debughand
  
    [logger_root]
    level=NOTSET
    handlers=trfhand,consoleHandler,audithand,metrichand,errhand,debughand
  
    [handler_consoleHandler]
    class=StreamHandler
    level=NOTSET
    formatter=generic
    args=(sys.stdout,)
  
    [handler_trfhand]
    class=handlers.TimedRotatingFileHandler
    level=NOTSET
    formatter=generic
    args=('application.log','midnight', 1, 10)
  
    [handler_audithand]
    class=handlers.TimedRotatingFileHandler
    level=INFO
    formatter=audit
    args=('audit.log', 'midnight', 1, 10)
  
    [handler_metrichand]
    class=handlers.TimedRotatingFileHandler
    level=INFO
    formatter=metric
    args=('metric.log','midnight', 1, 10)
  
    [handler_errhand]
    class=handlers.TimedRotatingFileHandler
    level=ERROR
    formatter=error
    args=('error.log','midnight', 1, 10)
  
    [handler_debughand]
    class=handlers.TimedRotatingFileHandler
    level=DEBUG
    formatter=generic
    args=('debug.log','midnight', 1, 10)
  
    [formatters]
    keys=generic,audit,metric,error
  
    [formatter_audit]
    format=%(asctime)s|%(asctime)s|00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000||%(thread)d||Conductor|N/A|COMPLETE|200|sucessful||%(levelname)s|||0|%(module)s|||||||||%(name)s : [-] %(message)s
    datefmt=
  
    [formatter_metric]
    format=%(asctime)s|%(asctime)s|00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000||%(thread)d||Conductor|N/A|N/A|N/A|COMPLETE|200|sucessful||%(levelname)s|||0|%(module)s||||||||||%(name)s : [-] %(message)s
    datefmt=
  
    [formatter_error]
    format=%(asctime)s|00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000|%(thread)d|Conductor|N/A|N/A|N/A|ERROR|500|N/A|%(name)s : [-] %(message)s
    datefmt=
  
    [formatter_generic]
    format=%(asctime)s||%(thread)d|%(levelname)s|%(module)s|%(name)s: [-] %(message)s
    datefmt=
  nginx.conf: |
    events {
            worker_connections 768;
            # multi_accept on;
    }
  
    http {
        # ...
        upstream conductor_uwsgi {
           server 127.0.0.1:80;
        }
  
        server {
  
            listen              8091 ssl;
            server_name         oof;
            ssl_certificate     /etc/nginx/ssl/org.onap.oof.crt;
            ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/ssl/org.onap.oof.key;
            ssl_protocols       TLSv1 TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2;
            ssl_ciphers         HIGH:!aNULL:!MD5;
  
            location / {
                include /etc/nginx/uwsgi_params;
                uwsgi_pass conductor_uwsgi;
  
                uwsgi_param Host $host;
                uwsgi_param X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
                uwsgi_param X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
                uwsgi_param X-Forwarded-Proto $http_x_forwarded_proto;
            }
        }
    }

  common_config.yaml: |
    osdf_system:
        libpath: /opt/app/osdf/libs
        osdf_ports:
            internal: 8699  # inside the Docker container, the app listens to this port
            external: 8698  # clients use this port on DockerHost
        osdf_ip_default: 0.0.0.0

        ssl_context: ['/opt/app/ssl_cert/org.onap.oof.crt', '/opt/app/ssl_cert/org.onap.oof.key']
  
    osdf_temp:  # special configuration required for "workarounds" or testing
        local_policies:
            global_disabled: True
            local_placement_policies_enabled: True
            placement_policy_dir_vcpe: "./test/policy-local-files/"
            placement_policy_files_vcpe: # workaroud for policy platform glitches (or "work-arounds" for other components)
                - Affinity_vCPE_1.json
                #- Capacity_vGMuxInfra.json
                #- Capacity_vG_1.json
                - Distance_vG_1.json
                - Distance_vGMuxInfra_1.json
                - hpa_policy_vG_1.json

                - vnfPolicy_vG.json
                - vnfPolicy_vGMuxInfra.json
            placement_policy_dir_vfw: "./test/policy-local-files/"
            placement_policy_files_vfw: # workaroud for policy platform glitches (or "work-arounds" for other components)
                #- Capacity_vFW_1.json
                - Distance_vFW_1.json
                - hpa_policy_vFW_1.json
                - Placement_Optimization_1.json

                - vnfPolicy_vPGN_TD.json
                - affinity_vFW_TD.json
                - QueryPolicy_vFW_TD.json
    service_info:
        vCPE:
            vcpeHostName: requestParameters.vcpeHostName
            e2eVpnKey: requestParameters.e2eVpnKey
        vFW:
            vcpeHostName: requestParameters.vcpeHostName
            e2eVpnKey: requestParameters.e2eVpnKey
  
    references:
        service_name:
            source: request
            value: serviceInfo.serviceName
        subscriber_role:
            source: SubscriberPolicy
            value: content.properties.subscriberRole
  
    policy_info:
        prioritization_attributes:
            policy_type:
                - content.policyType
            resources:
                - content.resources
                - content.objectiveParameter.parameterAttributes.resources
            service_name:
                - content.serviceName

    conductorUsername: admin1
    conductorPassword: plan.15
    conductorPingWaitTime: 60
    conductorMaxRetries: 30
    # versions to be set in HTTP header
    conductorMinorVersion: 0

    policyPlatformEnv: TEST
    policyPlatformUsername: testpdp
    policyPlatformPassword: alpha123
    policyClientUsername: python
    policyClientPassword: test
  
    # Credentials for DMaaP
    messageReaderHosts: NA
    messageReaderTopic: NA
    messageReaderAafUserId: NA
    messageReaderAafPassword: NA

    sdcUsername: NA
    sdcPassword: NA
    sdcONAPInstanceID: NA

    osdfPlacementUsername: test
    osdfPlacementPassword: testpwd
  
    # Credentials for the OOF placement service - SO
    osdfPlacementSOUsername: so_test
    osdfPlacementSOPassword: so_testpwd

    osdfPlacementVFCPassword: vfc_testpwd

    aaf_cache_expiry_mins: 5

    aaf_user_roles:
      - /placement:org.onap.oof.access|*|read ALL
      - /pci:org.onap.oof.access|*|read ALL

    aaf_sms_timeout: 30
    secret_domain: osdf
    aaf_ca_certs: /opt/app/ssl_cert/aaf_root_ca.cer

# Source: oof/charts/oof-cmso/charts/mariadb-galera/templates/pv.yaml
kind: PersistentVolume
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-cmso-db-data0
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: dev-oof-cmso-db
    chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-oof"
    heritage: "Tiller"
    name: dev-oof-cmso-db
spec:
  capacity:
    storage: 2Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  storageClassName: "dev-oof-cmso-db-data"
  hostPath:
    path: /dockerdata-nfs/dev-oof/cmso/data0
---
# Source: oof/charts/oof-has/charts/music/charts/music-cassandra/templates/volumes.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-music-cassandra-2
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    type: local
    app: music-cassandra
    chart: music-cassandra-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  capacity:
    storage: 2Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  hostPath:
    path: /dockerdata-nfs//dev-oof/common/cassandra/data-2
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  podAntiAffinity:
    preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
    - weight: 1
      podAffinityTerm:
        labelSelector:
          matchExpressions:
            - key: app
              operator: In
              values:
              - "music-cassandra"
        topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    service.alpha.kubernetes.io/tolerate-unready-endpoints: "true"
#  name: oof-cmso-dbhost
  name: oof-cmso-dbhost
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: dev-oof-cmso-db
    chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-oof"
    heritage: "Tiller"
spec:
  ports:
    - name: cmso-dbhost
      port: 3306
  clusterIP: None
  selector:
    app: dev-oof-cmso-db
---

  labels:
    app: oof-cmso-optimizer
    chart: oof-cmso-optimizer-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller

      targetPort: 7997

kind: Service

  name: music-cassandra
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: music-cassandra
    chart: music-cassandra-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
  annotations:
    service.alpha.kubernetes.io/tolerate-unready-endpoints: "true"
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  # Not working, open k8s bug: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/58662
  publishNotReadyAddresses: true
  ports:
  - port: 9042
    name: cql
  - port: 9160
    name: thrift
  - port: 61621
    name: agent
  selector:
    app: music-cassandra
    release: dev-oof
  clusterIP: None

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-optimizer
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: oof-cmso-optimizer
    chart: oof-cmso-optimizer-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: oof-cmso-optimizer
        release: dev-oof
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - cmso-db
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-cmso-optimizer-readiness
      - name: db-init
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-cmso-dbinit:2.1.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: oof-cmso-dbhost.onap
        - name: DB_PORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: DB_SCHEMA
          value: optimizer
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: dev-oof-cmso-db
              key: db-root-password
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-optimizer-config
          mountPath: /share/etc/config
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-optimizer-logs
          mountPath: /share/logs
      containers:
      - name: oof-cmso-optimizer
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-cmso-optimizer:2.1.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: oof-cmso-dbhost.onap
        - name: DB_PORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: DB_SCHEMA
          value: optimizer
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: dev-oof-cmso-db
              key: db-root-password
        - name: JAVA_TRUSTSTORE
          value: /share/etc/certs/truststoreONAPall.jks
        - name: SSL_KEYSTORE
          value: /share/etc/certs/org.onap.oof.jks
        - name: JAVA_TRUSTSTORE_PASSWORD
          value: 
        - name: SSL_KEYSTORE_PASSWORD
          value: N{$tSp*U)RQzjqE;)%4z;Pv[
        - name: AUTHENTICATION
          value: aaf-auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7997
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 7997
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 7997
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-optimizer-logs
          mountPath: /share/logs
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-optimizer-logs
          mountPath: /share/debug-logs
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-optimizer-config
          mountPath: /share/etc/config
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-optimizer-certs
          mountPath: /share/etc/certs
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-optimizer-certs
          mountPath: /opt/app/cmso/src/main/resources/aaf
        resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-optimizer-config
          configMap:
            name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-optimizer
            items:
            - key: logback.xml
              path: logback.xml
            - key: cadi.properties
              path: cadi.properties
            - key: optimizer.properties
              path: optimizer.properties
            - key: liquibase.properties
              path: liquibase.properties
        - name:  dev-oof-oof-cmso-optimizer-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-optimizer-certs
          secret:
            secretName: dev-oof-oof-cmso-certs
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: oof-cmso-service
    chart: oof-cmso-service-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: oof-cmso-service
        release: dev-oof
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - cmso-db
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-cmso-service-readiness
      - name: db-init
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-cmso-dbinit:2.1.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: oof-cmso-dbhost.onap
        - name: DB_PORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: DB_SCHEMA
          value: cmso
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: dev-oof-cmso-db
              key: db-root-password
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-config
          mountPath: /share/etc/config
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-logs
          mountPath: /share/logs
      containers:
      # side car containers
      - name: filebeat-onap
        image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
          subPath: filebeat.yml
          name: filebeat-conf
        - mountPath: /var/log/onap
          name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-logs
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-filebeat
        resources:
            {}
            
      - name: mso-simulator
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-cmso-robot:2.1.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-config
          mountPath: /share/etc/config
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000        
        resources:
            {}
            
      - name: oof-cmso-service
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-cmso-service:2.1.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: oof-cmso-dbhost.onap
        - name: DB_PORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          value: cmso-admin
        - name: DB_SCHEMA
          value: cmso
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: dev-oof-cmso-db
              key: user-password
        - name: JAVA_TRUSTSTORE
          value: /share/etc/certs/truststoreONAPall.jks
        - name: SSL_KEYSTORE
          value: /share/etc/certs/org.onap.oof.jks
        - name: JAVA_TRUSTSTORE_PASSWORD
          value: 
        - name: SSL_KEYSTORE_PASSWORD
          value: N{$tSp*U)RQzjqE;)%4z;Pv[
        - name: AUTHENTICATION
          value: aaf-auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-logs
          mountPath: /share/logs
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-logs
          mountPath: /share/debug-logs
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-config
          mountPath: /share/etc/config
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-certs
          mountPath: /share/etc/certs
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-certs
          mountPath: /opt/app/cmso/src/main/resources/aaf
        resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-config
          configMap:
            name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service
            items:
            - key: logback.xml
              path: logback.xml
            - key: cmso.properties
              path: cmso.properties
            - key: cadi.properties
              path: cadi.properties
            - key: optimizer.properties
              path: optimizer.properties
            - key: ticketmgt.properties
              path: ticketmgt.properties
            - key: liquibase.properties
              path: liquibase.properties
        - name:  dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-oof-cmso-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-service-certs
          secret:
            secretName: dev-oof-oof-cmso-certs
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-ticketmgt
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: oof-cmso-ticketmgt
    chart: oof-cmso-ticketmgt-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: oof-cmso-ticketmgt
        release: dev-oof
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: oof-cmso-ticketmgt
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-cmso-ticketmgt:2.1.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: JAVA_TRUSTSTORE
          value: /share/etc/certs/truststoreONAPall.jks
        - name: SSL_KEYSTORE
          value: /share/etc/certs/org.onap.oof.jks
        - name: JAVA_TRUSTSTORE_PASSWORD
          value: 
        - name: SSL_KEYSTORE_PASSWORD
          value: N{$tSp*U)RQzjqE;)%4z;Pv[
        - name: AUTHENTICATION
          value: proprietary-auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7999
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 7999
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 7999
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-ticketmgt-logs
          mountPath: /share/logs
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-ticketmgt-logs
          mountPath: /share/debug-logs
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-ticketmgt-config
          mountPath: /share/etc/config
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-ticketmgt-certs
          mountPath: /share/etc/certs
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-ticketmgt-certs
          mountPath: /opt/app/cmso/src/main/resources/aaf
        resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-ticketmgt-config
          configMap:
            name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-ticketmgt
            items:
            - key: logback.xml
              path: logback.xml
            - key: ticketmgt.properties
              path: ticketmgt.properties
            - key: cadi.properties
              path: cadi.properties
        - name:  dev-oof-oof-cmso-ticketmgt-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-ticketmgt-certs
          secret:
            secretName: dev-oof-oof-cmso-certs
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-topology
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: oof-cmso-topology
    chart: oof-cmso-topology-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: oof-cmso-topology
        release: dev-oof
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: oof-cmso-topology
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-cmso-topology:2.1.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: JAVA_TRUSTSTORE
          value: /share/etc/certs/truststoreONAPall.jks
        - name: SSL_KEYSTORE
          value: /share/etc/certs/org.onap.oof.jks
        - name: JAVA_TRUSTSTORE_PASSWORD
          value: 
        - name: SSL_KEYSTORE_PASSWORD
          value: N{$tSp*U)RQzjqE;)%4z;Pv[
        - name: AUTHENTICATION
          value: aaf-auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7998
        # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
        # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 7998
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 7998
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-topology-logs
          mountPath: /share/logs
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-topology-logs
          mountPath: /share/debug-logs
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-topology-config
          mountPath: /share/etc/config
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-topology-certs
          mountPath: /share/etc/certs
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-topology-certs
          mountPath: /opt/app/cmso/src/main/resources/aaf
        resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-topology-config
          configMap:
            name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-topology
            items:
            - key: logback.xml
              path: logback.xml
            - key: cadi.properties
              path: cadi.properties
            - key: topology.properties
              path: topology.properties
        - name:  dev-oof-oof-cmso-topology-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-oof-oof-cmso-topology-certs
          secret:
            secretName: dev-oof-oof-cmso-certs
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: oof/charts/oof-has/charts/music/charts/music-tomcat/templates/deployment.yaml
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-music-tomcat
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: music-tomcat
    chart: music-tomcat-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 3
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: music-tomcat
        release: dev-oof
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: music-tomcat-zookeeper-readiness
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - zookeeper
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      - name: music-tomcat-cassandra-readiness
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - -j
        - "dev-oof-music-cassandra-job-config"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
# War Container
      - name: "music-tomcat-war"
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/music/music:3.0.24"
        command: ["cp","/app/MUSIC.war","/webapps"]
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /webapps
          name: shared-data
      containers:
      # Tomcat Container
        - name: "music-tomcat"
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/library/tomcat:8.5"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8080
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8080
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8080
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /usr/local/tomcat/webapps
            name: shared-data
          - name: properties-music
            mountPath: /opt/app/music/etc/music.properties
            subPath: music.properties
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: shared-data
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: properties-music
          configMap:
            name: dev-oof-music-tomcat-configmap
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: oof/charts/oof-has/charts/oof-has-api/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada
# Modifications Copyright  2018 AT&T,VMware
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at

#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software

# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-oof-has-api
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: oof-has-api
    chart: oof-has-api-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: oof-has-api
        release: dev-oof
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - oof-has-controller
        - --container-name
        - aaf-service
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-api-readiness
      - command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - -j
        - "dev-oof-oof-has-onboard"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-api-onboard-readiness
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - resp="FAILURE";
          until [ $resp = "200" ]; do
          resp=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -k --write-out %{http_code} https://aaf-sms.onap:10443/v1/sms/domain/has/secret);
          echo $resp;
          sleep 2;
          done
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-api-has-sms-readiness
      containers:
        - name: oof-has-api
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-has:1.3.3"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          command: ["/bin/bash","-c"]
          args: ["nginx && /usr/local/bin/uwsgi -s /run/conductor/uwsgi.sock --chmod-socket=777 --wsgi-file /etc/nginx/conductor.wsgi --callable application --set port=80 --die-on-term --exit-on-reload --logto /opt/conductor-uwsgi.log --pidfile /run/conductor/conductor-uwsgi.pid --enable-threads --workers 6 --master --vacuum --single-interpreter --socket-timeout 10 --max-worker-lifetime 300 --max-requests 100 --no-defer-accept --logfile-chown --logfile-chmod 664 --protocol=uwsgi --socket 0.0.0.0:80"]
          ports:
          - containerPort: 10
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8091
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8091
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: nginx.conf
          - mountPath: /usr/local/etc/conductor/conductor.conf
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: conductor.conf
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/log.conf
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: log.conf
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/AAF_RootCA.cer
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: AAF_RootCA.cer
          - mountPath: /etc/nginx/ssl/org.onap.oof.crt
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: org.onap.oof.crt
          - mountPath: /etc/nginx/ssl/org.onap.oof.key
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: org.onap.oof.key
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: onap-oof-has-config
          configMap:
            name: onap-oof-has-configmap
            items:
            - key: nginx.conf
              path: nginx.conf
            - key: conductor.conf
              path: conductor.conf
            - key: log.conf
              path: log.conf
            - key: AAF_RootCA.cer
              path: AAF_RootCA.cer
            - key: org.onap.oof.key
              path: org.onap.oof.key
            - key: org.onap.oof.crt
              path: org.onap.oof.crt
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: oof/charts/oof-has/charts/oof-has-controller/templates/deployment.yaml

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-oof-has-controller
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: oof-has-controller
    chart: oof-has-controller-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: oof-has-controller
        release: dev-oof
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - music-tomcat
        - --container-name
        - aaf-sms
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-controller-readiness
      - command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - -j
        - "dev-oof-oof-has-onboard"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-controller-onboard-readiness
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - resp="FAILURE";
          until [ $resp = "200" ]; do
          resp=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -k --write-out %{http_code} https://aaf-sms.onap:10443/v1/sms/domain/has/secret);
          echo $resp;
          sleep 2;
          done
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-controller-cont-sms-readiness
      containers:
        - name: oof-has-controller
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-has:1.3.3"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          command:
          - python
          args:
          - /usr/local/bin/conductor-controller
          - --config-file=/usr/local/bin/conductor.conf
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - cat
              - /usr/local/bin/healthy.sh
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - cat
              - /usr/local/bin/healthy.sh
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/conductor.conf
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: conductor.conf
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/log.conf
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: log.conf
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/healthy.sh
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: healthy.sh
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/AAF_RootCA.cer
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: AAF_RootCA.cer
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: onap-oof-has-config
          configMap:
            name: onap-oof-has-configmap
            items:
            - key: conductor.conf
              path: conductor.conf
            - key: log.conf
              path: log.conf
            - key: healthy.sh
              path: healthy.sh
            - key: AAF_RootCA.cer
              path: AAF_RootCA.cer
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: oof/charts/oof-has/charts/oof-has-data/templates/deployment.yaml

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-oof-has-data
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: oof-has-data
    chart: oof-has-data-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: oof-has-data
        release: dev-oof
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - music-tomcat
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-data-readiness
      - command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - -j
        - "dev-oof-oof-has-onboard"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-data-onboard-readiness
      - command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - -j
        - "dev-oof-oof-has-healthcheck"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-data-health-readiness
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - resp="FAILURE";
          until [ $resp = "200" ]; do
          resp=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -k --write-out %{http_code} https://aaf-sms.onap:10443/v1/sms/domain/has/secret);
          echo $resp;
          sleep 2;
          done
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-data-data-sms-readiness
      containers:
        - name: oof-has-data
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-has:1.3.3"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          command:
          - python
          args:
          - /usr/local/bin/conductor-data
          - --config-file=/usr/local/bin/conductor.conf
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - cat
              - /usr/local/bin/healthy.sh
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - cat
              - /usr/local/bin/healthy.sh
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/conductor.conf
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: conductor.conf
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/log.conf
            name: onap-oof-has-config 
            subPath: log.conf
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/healthy.sh
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: healthy.sh 
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/aai_cert.cer
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: aai_cert.cer
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/aai_key.key
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: aai_key.key
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/AAF_RootCA.cer
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: AAF_RootCA.cer
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: onap-oof-has-config
          configMap:
            name: onap-oof-has-configmap
            items:
            - key: conductor.conf
              path: conductor.conf
            - key: log.conf
              path: log.conf
            - key: healthy.sh
              path: healthy.sh 
            - key: aai_cert.cer
              path: aai_cert.cer
            - key: aai_key.key
              path: aai_key.key
            - key: AAF_RootCA.cer
              path: AAF_RootCA.cer
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-oof-has-reservation
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: oof-has-reservation
    chart: oof-has-reservation-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: oof-has-reservation
        release: dev-oof
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - music-tomcat
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-reservation-readiness
      - command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - -j
        - "dev-oof-oof-has-onboard"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-reservation-onboard-readiness
      - command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - -j
        - "dev-oof-oof-has-healthcheck"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-reservation-health-readiness
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - resp="FAILURE";
          until [ $resp = "200" ]; do
          resp=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -k --write-out %{http_code} https://aaf-sms.onap:10443/v1/sms/domain/has/secret);
          echo $resp;
          sleep 2;
          done
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-reservation-resrv-sms-readiness
      containers:
        - name: oof-has-reservation
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-has:1.3.3"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          command:
          - python
          args:
          - /usr/local/bin/conductor-reservation
          - --config-file=/usr/local/bin/conductor.conf
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - cat
              - /usr/local/bin/healthy.sh
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - cat
              - /usr/local/bin/healthy.sh
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/conductor.conf
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: conductor.conf
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/log.conf
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: log.conf
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/healthy.sh
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: healthy.sh
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/AAF_RootCA.cer
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: AAF_RootCA.cer
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: onap-oof-has-config
          configMap:
            name: onap-oof-has-configmap
            items:
            - key: conductor.conf
              path: conductor.conf
            - key: log.conf
              path: log.conf
            - key: healthy.sh
              path: healthy.sh
            - key: AAF_RootCA.cer
              path: AAF_RootCA.cer
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-oof-has-solver
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: oof-has-solver
    chart: oof-has-solver-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: oof-has-solver
        release: dev-oof
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - music-tomcat
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-solver-readiness
      - command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - -j
        - "dev-oof-oof-has-onboard"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-solver-onboard-readiness
      - command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - -j
        - "dev-oof-oof-has-healthcheck"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-solver-health-readiness
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - resp="FAILURE";
          until [ $resp = "200" ]; do
          resp=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -k --write-out %{http_code} https://aaf-sms.onap:10443/v1/sms/domain/has/secret);
          echo $resp;
          sleep 2;
          done
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-has-solver-solvr-sms-readiness
      containers:
        - name: oof-has-solver
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-has:1.3.3"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          command:
          - python
          args:
          - /usr/local/bin/conductor-solver
          - --config-file=/usr/local/bin/conductor.conf
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - cat
              - /usr/local/bin/healthy.sh
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - cat
              - /usr/local/bin/healthy.sh
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/conductor.conf
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: conductor.conf
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/log.conf
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: log.conf
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/healthy.sh
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: healthy.sh
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/AAF_RootCA.cer
            name: onap-oof-has-config
            subPath: AAF_RootCA.cer
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: onap-oof-has-config
          configMap:
            name: onap-oof-has-configmap
            items:
            - key: conductor.conf
              path: conductor.conf
            - key: log.conf
              path: log.conf
            - key: healthy.sh
              path: healthy.sh
            - key: AAF_RootCA.cer
              path: AAF_RootCA.cer
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-oof-oof
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: oof
    chart: oof-5.0.0
    release: dev-oof
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: oof
        release: dev-oof
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - pdp
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-readiness
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - resp="FAILURE";
          until [ $resp = "200" ]; do
          resp=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -k --write-out %{http_code} https://aaf-sms.onap:10443/v1/sms/domain/osdf/secret);
          echo $resp;
          sleep 2;
          done
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oof-osdf-sms-readiness
      containers:
        - name: oof
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/optf-osdf:1.3.4"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8699
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8699
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8699
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /opt/app/config/osdf_config.yaml
            name: dev-oof-oof-config
            subPath: osdf_config.yaml
          - mountPath: /opt/app/ssl_cert/aaf_root_ca.cer
            name: dev-oof-oof-config
            subPath: aaf_root_ca.cer
          - mountPath: /opt/app/ssl_cert/org.onap.oof.crt
            name: dev-oof-oof-config
            subPath: org.onap.oof.crt
          - mountPath: /opt/app/ssl_cert/org.onap.oof.key
            name: dev-oof-oof-config
            subPath: org.onap.oof.key
          - mountPath: /opt/osdf/config/common_config.yaml
            name: dev-oof-oof-config
            subPath: common_config.yaml
          resources:
                        {}
                        

      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: dev-oof-oof-config
          configMap:
            name: dev-oof-oof-configmap
            items:
            - key: osdf_config.yaml
              path: osdf_config.yaml
            - key: aaf_root_ca.cer
              path: aaf_root_ca.cer
            - key: common_config.yaml
              path: common_config.yaml
            - key: org.onap.oof.crt
              path: org.onap.oof.crt
            - key: org.onap.oof.key
              path: org.onap.oof.key
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: oof/charts/oof-cmso/charts/mariadb-galera/templates/statefulset.yaml
# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
