apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-portal-portal-db
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: portal-db
    chart: portal-mariadb-5.0.0
    release: dev-portal
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: portal-db
        release: dev-portal
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: portal-db
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/portal-db:2.6.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 3306
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 3306
            initialDelaySeconds: 450
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 3306
            initialDelaySeconds: 450
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MYSQL_HOST
              value: "portal-db"
            - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: dev-portal-portal-db
                  key: db-root-password
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
            name: mariadb-data
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/docker-entrypoint.sh
            subPath: docker-entrypoint.sh
            name: docker-entry
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      volumes:
        - name: mariadb-data
          persistentVolumeClaim:
            claimName: dev-portal-portal-db
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: docker-entry
          configMap:
            name: dev-portal-portal-db-mariadb
            defaultMode: 0755
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: portal/charts/portal-sdk/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-portal-portal-sdk
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: portal-sdk
    chart: portal-sdk-5.0.0
    release: dev-portal
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: portal-sdk
        release: dev-portal
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: portal-sdk-readiness
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - "portal-db"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
      - name: portal-sdk
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/portal-sdk:2.6.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
          - /start-apache-tomcat.sh
          - -b
          - "/usr/local/tomcat"
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - name: properties-onapportalsdk
          mountPath: "/usr/local/tomcat/webapps/ONAPPORTALSDK/WEB-INF/fusion/conf/fusion.properties"
          subPath: fusion.properties
        - name: properties-onapportalsdk
          mountPath: "/usr/local/tomcat/webapps/ONAPPORTALSDK/WEB-INF/conf/system.properties"
          subPath: system.properties
        - name: properties-onapportalsdk
          mountPath: "/usr/local/tomcat/webapps/ONAPPORTALSDK/WEB-INF/classes/portal.properties"
          subPath: portal.properties
        - name: properties-onapportalsdk
          mountPath: "/usr/local/tomcat/webapps/ONAPPORTALSDK/WEB-INF/classes/music.properties"
          subPath: music.properties
        - name: properties-onapportalsdk
          mountPath: "/usr/local/tomcat/webapps/ONAPPORTALSDK/WEB-INF/classes/logback.xml"
          subPath: logback.xml
        - name: portal-tomcat-logs
          mountPath: "/usr/local/tomcat/logs"
        - name: var-log-onap
          mountPath: /var/log/onap
        resources:
                        {}
                        
      - name: filebeat-onap
        image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
          name: filebeat-conf
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - name: portal-data-filebeat
          mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
        - name: var-log-onap
          mountPath: /var/log/onap
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: properties-onapportalsdk
          configMap:
            name: dev-portal-portal-sdk-onapportalsdk
            defaultMode: 0755

    app: portal-widget
    chart: portal-widget-5.0.0
    release: dev-portal
    heritage: Tiller

  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: portal-widget
        release: dev-portal
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: portal-widget-readiness
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - "portal-db"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
      - name: portal-widget
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/portal-wms:2.6.0"

          - /start-wms.sh

        - containerPort: 8082

          tcpSocket:
            port: 8082
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8082
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10

          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - name: properties-onapwidgetms
          mountPath: "/application.properties"
          subPath: application.properties
        - name: properties-onapwidgetms
          mountPath: "/application.yml"
          subPath: application.yml
        resources:
                        {}

        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: properties-onapwidgetms
          configMap:
            name: dev-portal-portal-widget-onapwidgetms
            defaultMode: 0755

      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: dev-portal-portal-db-config
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: portal-db-job
    chart: portal-mariadb-5.0.0
    release: dev-portal
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: portal-db-job
        release: dev-portal
    spec:
      restartPolicy: Never
      initContainers:
      - name: portal-db-init-readiness
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - portal-db
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
      - name: portal-db-job
        image: "oomk8s/mariadb-client-init:3.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: "portal-db"
        - name: DB_USER
          value: root
        - name: DB_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef: {name: dev-portal-portal-db, key: db-root-password}
        - name: SQL_SRC_DIR
          value: portal/deliveries
      - name: portal-db-oom-update-job
        image: "oomk8s/mariadb-client-init:3.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: "portal-db"
        - name: DB_USER
          value: root
        - name: DB_PORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DB_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef: {name: dev-portal-portal-db, key: db-root-password}
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -x
        - -c
        - "mysql -vv --user=$DB_USER --password=$DB_PASS --host=$DB_HOST --port=$DB_PORT < /tmp/oom_updates.sql"
        volumeMounts:
        - name: portal-mariadb-sql
          mountPath: /tmp/oom_updates.sql
          subPath: oom_updates.sql
      volumes:
      - name: portal-mariadb-sql
        configMap:
          name: dev-portal-portal-db-mariadb
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
      restartPolicy: Never
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: dev-portal-portal-app-ingress
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-passthrough: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "true"
  labels:
    app: portal-app
    chart: portal-app-5.0.0
    release: dev-portal
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  rules:
  - host: portalapp.simpledemo.onap.org
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          serviceName: portal-app
          servicePort: 8443

# Source: robot/templates/pv.yaml
kind: PersistentVolume
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: dev-robot-robot
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: robot
    chart: "robot-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-robot"
    heritage: "Tiller"
    name: dev-robot-robot
spec:
  capacity:
    storage: 2Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteMany
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  hostPath:
    path: /dockerdata-nfs/dev-robot/robot/logs
---
# Source: robot/templates/pvc.yaml
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: dev-robot-robot
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: robot
    chart: "robot-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-robot"
    heritage: "Tiller"
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: dev-robot-robot
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteMany
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 2Gi
---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: robot
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: robot
    chart: robot-5.0.0
    release: dev-robot
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  type: NodePort
  ports:
    - port: 88
      nodePort: 30209
      name: httpd
  selector:
    app: robot
    release: dev-robot
---
# Source: robot/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada, AT&T
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-robot-robot
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: robot
    chart: robot-5.0.0
    release: dev-robot
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: robot
        release: dev-robot
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: robot
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/testsuite:1.5.4"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - containerPort: 88
        
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 88
          initialDelaySeconds: 180
          periodSeconds: 10
        
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 88
          initialDelaySeconds: 180
          periodSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dshm
          mountPath: /dev/shm
        - name: localtime
          mountPath: /etc/localtime
          readOnly: true
        - name: robot-eteshare
          mountPath: /share/config
        - name: robot-logs
          mountPath: /share/logs
        resources:
            {}
            
      volumes:

1. Get the application URL by running these commands:
  export NODE_PORT=$(kubectl get --namespace onap -o jsonpath="{.spec.ports[0].nodePort}" services robot)
  export NODE_IP=$(kubectl get nodes --namespace onap -o jsonpath="{.items[0].status.addresses[0].address}")
  echo http://$NODE_IP:$NODE_PORT

    debugEnabled: false
    env:
      name: AUTO
    flavor: unlimited

  namespace: onap

    chart: sdc-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller

# Source: sdc/charts/sdc-be/templates/configmap.yaml
# Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada
# Modifications Copyright  2018 AT&T, ZTE
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-logging-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-be
    chart: sdc-be-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  logback.xml: "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\n<!--\n# Copyright  2018
    Amdocs, Bell Canada, AT&T, ZTE\n# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
    (the \"License\");\n# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.\n#
    You may obtain a copy of the License at\n#\n#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\n#\n#
    Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\n# distributed
    under the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\n# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR
    CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\n# See the License for the specific
    language governing permissions and\n# limitations under the License.\n-->\n<configuration
    scan=\"true\" scanPeriod=\"3 seconds\">\n    <property name=\"logDir\" value=\"/var/log/onap\"
    />\n    <property name=\"componentName\" scope=\"system\" value=\"sdc\"></property>\n
    \   <property name=\"subComponentName\" scope=\"system\" value=\"sdc-be\"></property>\n
    \   <property name=\"logDirectory\" value=\"${logDir}/${componentName}/${subComponentName}\"
    />\n    <property file=\"${config.home}/catalog-be/configuration.yaml\" />\n    <property
    name=\"enable-all-log\" scope=\"context\" value=\"false\" />\n    <!--  log file
    names -->\n    <property name=\"errorLogName\" value=\"error\" />\n    <property
    name=\"metricsLogName\" value=\"metrics\" />\n    <property name=\"auditLogName\"
    value=\"audit\" />\n    <property name=\"debugLogName\" value=\"debug\" />\n    <property
    name=\"transactionLogName\" value=\"transaction\" />\n    <property name=\"allLogName\"
    value=\"all\" />\n    <property name=\"queueSize\" value=\"256\" />\n    <property
    name=\"maxFileSize\" value=\"50MB\" />\n    <property name=\"maxHistory\" value=\"30\"
    />\n    <property name=\"totalSizeCap\" value=\"10GB\" />\n    <property name=\"pattern\"
    value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;, UTC}\\t[%thread]\\t%-5level\\t%logger{36}\\t%replace(%replace(%replace(%mdc){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}){',
    ','\\t'}){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}\\t%replace(%replace(%msg){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}%n\"
    />\n    <!-- All log -->\n    <if condition='property(\"enable-all-log\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"true\")'>\n
    \       <then>\n            <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\"
    name=\"ALL_ROLLING\">\n                <file>${logDirectory}/${allLogName}.log</file>\n
    \               <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n
    \                   <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${allLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\n
    \                   <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\n
    \                       <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\n                    </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\n
    \                   <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\n                    <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\n
    \               </rollingPolicy>\n                <encoder>\n                    <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\n
    \               </encoder>\n            </appender>\n            <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_ALL\">\n                <appender-ref ref=\"ALL_ROLLING\" />\n            </appender>\n
    \       </then>\n    </if>\n    <!-- Error log -->\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\"
    name=\"ERROR_ROLLING\">\n        <file>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.log</file>\n
    \       <!-- Audit messages filter - deny audit messages -->\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\n
    \               <marker>AUDIT_MARKER</marker>\n            </evaluator>\n            <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\n
    \           <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\n        </filter>\n        <!-- Transaction
    messages filter - deny Transaction messages -->\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\n            </evaluator>\n
    \           <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\n            <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\n
    \       </filter>\n        <!-- deny all events with a level below INFO, that is
    TRACE and DEBUG -->\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\n
    \           <level>INFO</level>\n        </filter>\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\n        <encoder>\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\n
    \       </encoder>\n    </appender>\n    <!-- Debug log -->\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\"
    name=\"DEBUG_ROLLING\">\n        <file>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.log</file>\n
    \       <!-- No need to deny audit messages - they are INFO only, will be denied
    \n                        anyway -->\n        <!-- Transaction messages filter -
    deny Transaction messages, there are \n                        some DEBUG level
    messages among them -->\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\n            </evaluator>\n
    \           <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\n            <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\n
    \       </filter>\n        <!-- accept DEBUG and TRACE level -->\n        <filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\n            <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.GEventEvaluator\">\n
    \               <expression>e.level.toInt() &lt;= DEBUG.toInt()</expression>\n            </evaluator>\n
    \           <OnMismatch>DENY</OnMismatch>\n            <OnMatch>NEUTRAL</OnMatch>\n
    \       </filter>\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\n        <encoder>\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\n
    \       </encoder>\n    </appender>\n    <!-- Audit log -->\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\"
    name=\"AUDIT_ROLLING\">\n        <file>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.log</file>\n
    \       <!-- Audit messages filter - accept audit messages -->\n        <filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\n            <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\n
    \               <marker>AUDIT_MARKER</marker>\n            </evaluator>\n            <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>\n
    \           <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>\n        </filter>\n        <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n            <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\n        <encoder>\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\n
    \       </encoder>\n    </appender>\n    <!-- SdncTransaction log -->\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"TRANSACTION_ROLLING\">\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${transactionLogName}.log</file>\n        <!-- Transaction
    messages filter - accept audit messages -->\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\n            </evaluator>\n
    \           <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>\n            <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>\n
    \       </filter>\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${transactionLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\n        <encoder>\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\n
    \       </encoder>\n    </appender>\n    <!-- Asynchronicity Configurations -->\n
    \   <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\" name=\"ASYNC_DEBUG\">\n
    \       <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\n        <appender-ref ref=\"DEBUG_ROLLING\"
    />\n    </appender>\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_TRANSACTION\">\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"TRANSACTION_ROLLING\" />\n    </appender>\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_ERROR\">\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ERROR_ROLLING\" />\n    </appender>\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_AUDIT\">\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"AUDIT_ROLLING\" />\n    </appender>\n    <root level=\"INFO\">\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ASYNC_ERROR\" />\n        <appender-ref ref=\"ASYNC_DEBUG\" />\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ASYNC_AUDIT\" />\n        <appender-ref ref=\"ASYNC_TRANSACTION\" />\n        <if
    condition='property(\"enable-all-log\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"true\")'>\n            <then>\n
    \               <appender-ref ref=\"ALL_ROLLING\" />\n            </then>\n        </if>\n
    \   </root>\n    <logger level=\"INFO\" name=\"org.openecomp.sdc\" />\n</configuration>\n"
---

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-logging-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-dcae-be
    chart: sdc-dcae-be-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  logback.xml: "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\r\n<!--\r\n================================================================================\r\nCopyright
    (C) 2018 AT&T Intellectual Property\r\n================================================================================\r\nLicensed
    under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\r\nyou may not use this
    file except in compliance with the License.\r\nYou may obtain a copy of the License
    at\r\n\r\n     http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\r\n\r\nUnless required
    by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\r\ndistributed under the License
    is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\r\nWITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
    KIND, either express or implied.\r\nSee the License for the specific language governing
    permissions and\r\nlimitations under the License.\r\n================================================================================\r\n-->\r\n\r\n<configuration
    scan=\"true\" scanPeriod=\"3 seconds\">\r\n    <property name=\"logDir\" value=\"/var/log/onap\"
    />\r\n    <property name=\"componentName\" scope=\"system\" value=\"sdc\"></property>\r\n
    \   <property name=\"subComponentName\" scope=\"system\" value=\"dcae-be\"></property>\r\n
    \   <property name=\"logDirectory\" value=\"${logDir}/${componentName}/${subComponentName}\"
    />\r\n    <property file=\"${config.home}/dcae-be/configuration.yaml\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"enable-all-log\" scope=\"context\" value=\"false\" />\r\n    <!--  log file
    names -->\r\n    <property name=\"errorLogName\" value=\"error\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"metricsLogName\" value=\"metrics\" />\r\n    <property name=\"auditLogName\"
    value=\"audit\" />\r\n    <property name=\"debugLogName\" value=\"debug\" />\r\n
    \   <property name=\"transactionLogName\" value=\"transaction\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"allLogName\" value=\"all\" />\r\n    <property name=\"queueSize\" value=\"256\"
    />\r\n    <property name=\"maxFileSize\" value=\"50MB\" />\r\n    <property name=\"maxHistory\"
    value=\"30\" />\r\n    <property name=\"totalSizeCap\" value=\"10GB\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"pattern\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;, UTC}\\t[%thread]\\t%-5level\\t%logger{36}\\t%replace(%replace(%replace(%mdc){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}){',
    ','\\t'}){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}\\t%replace(%replace(%msg){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}%n\"
    />\r\n    <!-- All log -->\r\n    <if condition='property(\"enable-all-log\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"true\")'>\r\n
    \       <then>\r\n            <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\"
    name=\"ALL_ROLLING\">\r\n                <file>${logDirectory}/${allLogName}.log</file>\r\n
    \               <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \                   <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${allLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \                   <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \                       <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n                    </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \                   <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n                    <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \               </rollingPolicy>\r\n                <encoder>\r\n                    <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \               </encoder>\r\n            </appender>\r\n            <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_ALL\">\r\n                <appender-ref ref=\"ALL_ROLLING\" />\r\n
    \           </appender>\r\n        </then>\r\n    </if>\r\n    <!-- Error log -->\r\n
    \   <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"ERROR_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Audit messages
    filter - deny audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>AUDIT_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n
    \           <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <!-- Transaction
    messages filter - deny Transaction messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n
    \           <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <!-- deny all events with a level below INFO, that
    is TRACE and DEBUG -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\r\n
    \           <level>INFO</level>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Debug log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"DEBUG_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- No need
    to deny audit messages - they are INFO only, will be denied\r\n                        anyway
    -->\r\n        <!-- Transaction messages filter - deny Transaction messages, there
    are\r\n                        some DEBUG level messages among them -->\r\n        <filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n            <evaluator
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n                <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n
    \           </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <!-- accept DEBUG and TRACE level -->\r\n        <filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n            <evaluator
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.GEventEvaluator\">\r\n                <expression>e.level.toInt()
    &lt;= DEBUG.toInt()</expression>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <OnMismatch>DENY</OnMismatch>\r\n
    \           <OnMatch>NEUTRAL</OnMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n            <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Audit log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"AUDIT_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Audit messages
    filter - accept audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>AUDIT_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>\r\n
    \           <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n            <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- SdncTransaction log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"TRANSACTION_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${transactionLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Transaction
    messages filter - accept audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n
    \           <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${transactionLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Asynchronicity Configurations
    -->\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\" name=\"ASYNC_DEBUG\">\r\n
    \       <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"DEBUG_ROLLING\"
    />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_TRANSACTION\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"TRANSACTION_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_ERROR\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ERROR_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_AUDIT\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"AUDIT_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <root level=\"INFO\">\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ASYNC_ERROR\" />\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"ASYNC_DEBUG\" />\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ASYNC_AUDIT\" />\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"ASYNC_TRANSACTION\" />\r\n
    \       <if condition='property(\"enable-all-log\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"true\")'>\r\n
    \           <then>\r\n                <appender-ref ref=\"ALL_ROLLING\" />\r\n            </then>\r\n
    \       </if>\r\n    </root>\r\n    <logger level=\"INFO\" name=\"org.openecomp.sdc\"
    />\r\n</configuration>\r\n"
---

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-logging-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-dcae-dt
    chart: sdc-dcae-dt-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  logback.xml: "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\r\n<!--\r\n================================================================================\r\nCopyright
    (C) 2018 AT&T Intellectual Property\r\n================================================================================\r\nLicensed
    under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\r\nyou may not use this
    file except in compliance with the License.\r\nYou may obtain a copy of the License
    at\r\n\r\n   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\r\n\r\nUnless required by
    applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\r\ndistributed under the License
    is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\r\nWITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
    KIND, either express or implied.\r\nSee the License for the specific language governing
    permissions and\r\nlimitations under the License.\r\n================================================================================\r\n-->\r\n\r\n<configuration
    scan=\"true\" scanPeriod=\"3 seconds\">\r\n    <property name=\"logDir\" value=\"/var/log/onap\"
    />\r\n    <property name=\"componentName\" scope=\"system\" value=\"sdc\"></property>\r\n
    \   <property name=\"subComponentName\" scope=\"system\" value=\"dcae-dt\"></property>\r\n
    \   <property name=\"logDirectory\" value=\"${logDir}/${componentName}/${subComponentName}\"
    />\r\n    <property file=\"${config.home}/dcae-dt/configuration.yaml\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"enable-all-log\" scope=\"context\" value=\"false\" />\r\n    <!--  log file
    names -->\r\n    <property name=\"errorLogName\" value=\"error\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"metricsLogName\" value=\"metrics\" />\r\n    <property name=\"auditLogName\"
    value=\"audit\" />\r\n    <property name=\"debugLogName\" value=\"debug\" />\r\n
    \   <property name=\"transactionLogName\" value=\"transaction\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"allLogName\" value=\"all\" />\r\n    <property name=\"queueSize\" value=\"256\"
    />\r\n    <property name=\"maxFileSize\" value=\"50MB\" />\r\n    <property name=\"maxHistory\"
    value=\"30\" />\r\n    <property name=\"totalSizeCap\" value=\"10GB\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"pattern\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;, UTC}\\t[%thread]\\t%-5level\\t%logger{36}\\t%replace(%replace(%replace(%mdc){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}){',
    ','\\t'}){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}\\t%replace(%replace(%msg){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}%n\"
    />\r\n    <!-- All log -->\r\n    <if condition='property(\"enable-all-log\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"true\")'>\r\n
    \       <then>\r\n            <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\"
    name=\"ALL_ROLLING\">\r\n                <file>${logDirectory}/${allLogName}.log</file>\r\n
    \               <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \                   <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${allLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \                   <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \                       <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n                    </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \                   <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n                    <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \               </rollingPolicy>\r\n                <encoder>\r\n                    <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \               </encoder>\r\n            </appender>\r\n            <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_ALL\">\r\n                <appender-ref ref=\"ALL_ROLLING\" />\r\n
    \           </appender>\r\n        </then>\r\n    </if>\r\n    <!-- Error log -->\r\n
    \   <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"ERROR_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Audit messages
    filter - deny audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>AUDIT_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n
    \           <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <!-- Transaction
    messages filter - deny Transaction messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n
    \           <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <!-- deny all events with a level below INFO, that
    is TRACE and DEBUG -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\r\n
    \           <level>INFO</level>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Debug log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"DEBUG_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- No need
    to deny audit messages - they are INFO only, will be denied\r\n                        anyway
    -->\r\n        <!-- Transaction messages filter - deny Transaction messages, there
    are\r\n                        some DEBUG level messages among them -->\r\n        <filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n            <evaluator
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n                <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n
    \           </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <!-- accept DEBUG and TRACE level -->\r\n        <filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n            <evaluator
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.GEventEvaluator\">\r\n                <expression>e.level.toInt()
    &lt;= DEBUG.toInt()</expression>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <OnMismatch>DENY</OnMismatch>\r\n
    \           <OnMatch>NEUTRAL</OnMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n            <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Audit log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"AUDIT_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Audit messages
    filter - accept audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>AUDIT_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>\r\n
    \           <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n            <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- SdncTransaction log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"TRANSACTION_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${transactionLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Transaction
    messages filter - accept audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n
    \           <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${transactionLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Asynchronicity Configurations
    -->\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\" name=\"ASYNC_DEBUG\">\r\n
    \       <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"DEBUG_ROLLING\"
    />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_TRANSACTION\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"TRANSACTION_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_ERROR\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ERROR_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_AUDIT\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"AUDIT_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <root level=\"INFO\">\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ASYNC_ERROR\" />\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"ASYNC_DEBUG\" />\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ASYNC_AUDIT\" />\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"ASYNC_TRANSACTION\" />\r\n
    \       <if condition='property(\"enable-all-log\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"true\")'>\r\n
    \           <then>\r\n                <appender-ref ref=\"ALL_ROLLING\" />\r\n            </then>\r\n
    \       </if>\r\n    </root>\r\n    <logger level=\"INFO\" name=\"org.openecomp.sdc\"
    />\r\n</configuration>\r\n"
---
# Source: sdc/charts/sdc-dcae-fe/templates/configmap.yaml
# Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-logging-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-dcae-fe
    chart: sdc-dcae-fe-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  logback.xml: "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\r\n<!--\r\n================================================================================\r\nCopyright
    (C) 2018 AT&T Intellectual Property\r\n================================================================================\r\nLicensed
    under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\r\nyou may not use this
    file except in compliance with the License.\r\nYou may obtain a copy of the License
    at\r\n\r\n     http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\r\n\r\nUnless required
    by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\r\ndistributed under the License
    is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\r\nWITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
    KIND, either express or implied.\r\nSee the License for the specific language governing
    permissions and\r\nlimitations under the License.\r\n================================================================================\r\n-->\r\n<configuration
    scan=\"true\" scanPeriod=\"3 seconds\">\r\n    <property name=\"logDir\" value=\"/var/log/onap\"
    />\r\n    <property name=\"componentName\" scope=\"system\" value=\"sdc\"></property>\r\n
    \   <property name=\"subComponentName\" scope=\"system\" value=\"dcae-fe\"></property>\r\n
    \   <property name=\"logDirectory\" value=\"${logDir}/${componentName}/${subComponentName}\"
    />\r\n    <property file=\"${config.home}/dcae-fe/configuration.yaml\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"enable-all-log\" scope=\"context\" value=\"false\" />\r\n    <!--  log file
    names -->\r\n    <property name=\"errorLogName\" value=\"error\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"metricsLogName\" value=\"metrics\" />\r\n    <property name=\"auditLogName\"
    value=\"audit\" />\r\n    <property name=\"debugLogName\" value=\"debug\" />\r\n
    \   <property name=\"transactionLogName\" value=\"transaction\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"allLogName\" value=\"all\" />\r\n    <property name=\"queueSize\" value=\"256\"
    />\r\n    <property name=\"maxFileSize\" value=\"50MB\" />\r\n    <property name=\"maxHistory\"
    value=\"30\" />\r\n    <property name=\"totalSizeCap\" value=\"10GB\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"pattern\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;, UTC}\\t[%thread]\\t%-5level\\t%logger{36}\\t%replace(%replace(%replace(%mdc){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}){',
    ','\\t'}){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}\\t%replace(%replace(%msg){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}%n\"
    />\r\n    <!-- All log -->\r\n    <if condition='property(\"enable-all-log\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"true\")'>\r\n
    \       <then>\r\n            <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\"
    name=\"ALL_ROLLING\">\r\n                <file>${logDirectory}/${allLogName}.log</file>\r\n
    \               <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \                   <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${allLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \                   <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \                       <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n                    </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \                   <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n                    <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \               </rollingPolicy>\r\n                <encoder>\r\n                    <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \               </encoder>\r\n            </appender>\r\n            <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_ALL\">\r\n                <appender-ref ref=\"ALL_ROLLING\" />\r\n
    \           </appender>\r\n        </then>\r\n    </if>\r\n    <!-- Error log -->\r\n
    \   <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"ERROR_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Audit messages
    filter - deny audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>AUDIT_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n
    \           <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <!-- Transaction
    messages filter - deny Transaction messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n
    \           <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <!-- deny all events with a level below INFO, that
    is TRACE and DEBUG -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\r\n
    \           <level>INFO</level>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Debug log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"DEBUG_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- No need
    to deny audit messages - they are INFO only, will be denied\r\n                        anyway
    -->\r\n        <!-- Transaction messages filter - deny Transaction messages, there
    are\r\n                        some DEBUG level messages among them -->\r\n        <filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n            <evaluator
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n                <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n
    \           </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <!-- accept DEBUG and TRACE level -->\r\n        <filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n            <evaluator
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.GEventEvaluator\">\r\n                <expression>e.level.toInt()
    &lt;= DEBUG.toInt()</expression>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <OnMismatch>DENY</OnMismatch>\r\n
    \           <OnMatch>NEUTRAL</OnMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n            <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Audit log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"AUDIT_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Audit messages
    filter - accept audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>AUDIT_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>\r\n
    \           <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n            <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- SdncTransaction log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"TRANSACTION_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${transactionLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Transaction
    messages filter - accept audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n
    \           <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${transactionLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Asynchronicity Configurations
    -->\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\" name=\"ASYNC_DEBUG\">\r\n
    \       <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"DEBUG_ROLLING\"
    />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_TRANSACTION\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"TRANSACTION_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_ERROR\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ERROR_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_AUDIT\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"AUDIT_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <root level=\"INFO\">\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ASYNC_ERROR\" />\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"ASYNC_DEBUG\" />\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ASYNC_AUDIT\" />\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"ASYNC_TRANSACTION\" />\r\n
    \       <if condition='property(\"enable-all-log\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"true\")'>\r\n
    \           <then>\r\n                <appender-ref ref=\"ALL_ROLLING\" />\r\n            </then>\r\n
    \       </if>\r\n    </root>\r\n    <logger level=\"INFO\" name=\"org.openecomp.sdc\"
    />\r\n</configuration>\r\n"

kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-logging-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-fe
    chart: sdc-fe-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  logback.xml: "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\r\n<!--\r\n# Copyright 
    2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada, AT&T, ZTE\r\n#\r\n# Licensed under the Apache License,
    Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\r\n# you may not use this file except in compliance
    with the License.\r\n# You may obtain a copy of the License at\r\n#\r\n#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\r\n#\r\n#
    Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\r\n# distributed
    under the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\r\n# WITHOUT WARRANTIES
    OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\r\n# See the License for the
    specific language governing permissions and\r\n# limitations under the License.\r\n-->\r\n\r\n<configuration
    scan=\"true\" scanPeriod=\"3 seconds\">\r\n    <property name=\"logDir\" value=\"/var/log/onap\"
    />\r\n    <property name=\"componentName\" scope=\"system\" value=\"sdc\"></property>\r\n
    \   <property name=\"subComponentName\" scope=\"system\" value=\"sdc-fe\"></property>\r\n
    \   <property name=\"logDirectory\" value=\"${logDir}/${componentName}/${subComponentName}\"
    />\r\n    <property file=\"${config.home}/catalog-fe/configuration.yaml\" />\r\n
    \   <property name=\"enable-all-log\" scope=\"context\" value=\"false\" />\r\n    <!--
    \ log file names -->\r\n    <property name=\"errorLogName\" value=\"error\" />\r\n
    \   <property name=\"metricsLogName\" value=\"metrics\" />\r\n    <property name=\"auditLogName\"
    value=\"audit\" />\r\n    <property name=\"debugLogName\" value=\"debug\" />\r\n
    \   <property name=\"transactionLogName\" value=\"transaction\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"allLogName\" value=\"all\" />\r\n    <property name=\"queueSize\" value=\"256\"
    />\r\n    <property name=\"maxFileSize\" value=\"50MB\" />\r\n    <property name=\"maxHistory\"
    value=\"30\" />\r\n    <property name=\"totalSizeCap\" value=\"10GB\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"pattern\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;, UTC}\\t[%thread]\\t%-5level\\t%logger{36}\\t%replace(%replace(%replace(%mdc){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}){',
    ','\\t'}){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}\\t%replace(%replace(%msg){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}%n\"
    />\r\n    <!-- All log -->\r\n    <if condition='property(\"enable-all-log\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"true\")'>\r\n
    \       <then>\r\n            <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\"
    name=\"ALL_ROLLING\">\r\n                <file>${logDirectory}/${allLogName}.log</file>\r\n
    \               <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \                   <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${allLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \                   <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \                       <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n                    </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \                   <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n                    <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \               </rollingPolicy>\r\n                <encoder>\r\n                    <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \               </encoder>\r\n            </appender>\r\n            <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_ALL\">\r\n                <appender-ref ref=\"ALL_ROLLING\" />\r\n
    \           </appender>\r\n        </then>\r\n    </if>\r\n    <!-- Error log -->\r\n
    \   <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"ERROR_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Audit messages
    filter - deny audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>AUDIT_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n
    \           <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <!-- Transaction
    messages filter - deny Transaction messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n
    \           <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <!-- deny all events with a level below INFO, that
    is TRACE and DEBUG -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\r\n
    \           <level>INFO</level>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Debug log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"DEBUG_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- No need
    to deny audit messages - they are INFO only, will be denied\r\n                        anyway
    -->\r\n        <!-- Transaction messages filter - deny Transaction messages, there
    are\r\n                        some DEBUG level messages among them -->\r\n        <filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n            <evaluator
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n                <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n
    \           </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <!-- accept DEBUG and TRACE level -->\r\n        <filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n            <evaluator
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.GEventEvaluator\">\r\n                <expression>e.level.toInt()
    &lt;= DEBUG.toInt()</expression>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <OnMismatch>DENY</OnMismatch>\r\n
    \           <OnMatch>NEUTRAL</OnMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n            <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Audit log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"AUDIT_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Audit messages
    filter - accept audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>AUDIT_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>\r\n
    \           <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n            <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- SdncTransaction log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"TRANSACTION_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${transactionLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Transaction
    messages filter - accept audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n
    \           <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${transactionLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Asynchronicity Configurations
    -->\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\" name=\"ASYNC_DEBUG\">\r\n
    \       <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"DEBUG_ROLLING\"
    />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_TRANSACTION\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"TRANSACTION_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_ERROR\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ERROR_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_AUDIT\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"AUDIT_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <root level=\"INFO\">\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ASYNC_ERROR\" />\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"ASYNC_DEBUG\" />\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ASYNC_AUDIT\" />\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"ASYNC_TRANSACTION\" />\r\n
    \       <if condition='property(\"enable-all-log\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"true\")'>\r\n
    \           <then>\r\n                <appender-ref ref=\"ALL_ROLLING\" />\r\n            </then>\r\n
    \       </if>\r\n    </root>\r\n    <logger level=\"INFO\" name=\"org.openecomp.sdc\"
    />\r\n</configuration>\r\n"
---
# Source: sdc/charts/sdc-fe/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1

  name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-plugins-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-fe
    chart: sdc-fe-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller

  plugins-configuration.yaml: |-
    pluginsList:
       - pluginId: DCAED
         pluginDiscoveryUrl: "https://sdc-dcae-fe:9444/dcaed/#/home"
         pluginSourceUrl: "https://sdc.dcae.plugin.simpledemo.onap.org:30264/dcaed/#/home"
         pluginStateUrl: "dcaed"
         pluginDisplayOptions:
            context:
                displayName: "Monitoring"
                displayContext: ["SERVICE"]
                displayRoles: ["DESIGNER"]
       - pluginId: DCAE-DS
         pluginDiscoveryUrl: "https://sdc-dcae-dt:9446/dcae/#/dcae/home"
         pluginSourceUrl: "https://sdc.dcae.plugin.simpledemo.onap.org:30266/dcae/#/dcae/home"
         pluginStateUrl: "dcae-ds"
         pluginDisplayOptions:
           tab:
               displayName: "DCAE-DS"
               displayRoles: ["DESIGNER"]
       - pluginId: WORKFLOW
         pluginDiscoveryUrl: "http://sdc-wfd-fe:8080/workflows"
         pluginSourceUrl: "https://sdc.workflow.plugin.simpledemo.onap.org:30431/workflows/"
         pluginStateUrl: "workflowDesigner"
         pluginDisplayOptions:

    connectionTimeout: 1000

# Source: sdc/charts/sdc-onboarding-be/templates/configmap.yaml
# Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada
# Modifications Copyright  2018 AT&T, ZTE
