apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-logging-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-onboarding-be
    chart: sdc-onboarding-be-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  logback.xml: "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\r\n<!--\r\n# Copyright 
    2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada, AT&T, ZTE\r\n#\r\n# Licensed under the Apache License,
    Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\r\n# you may not use this file except in compliance
    with the License.\r\n# You may obtain a copy of the License at\r\n#\r\n#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\r\n#\r\n#
    Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\r\n# distributed
    under the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\r\n# WITHOUT WARRANTIES
    OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\r\n# See the License for the
    specific language governing permissions and\r\n# limitations under the License.\r\n-->\r\n<configuration
    scan=\"true\" scanPeriod=\"3 seconds\">\r\n    <property name=\"logDir\" value=\"/var/log/onap\"
    />\r\n    <property name=\"componentName\" scope=\"system\" value=\"sdc\"></property>\r\n
    \   <property name=\"subComponentName\" scope=\"system\" value=\"sdc-onboarding-be\"></property>\r\n
    \   <property name=\"logDirectory\" value=\"${logDir}/${componentName}/${subComponentName}\"
    />\r\n    <property file=\"${config.home}/catalog-be/configuration.yaml\" />\r\n
    \   <property name=\"enable-all-log\" scope=\"context\" value=\"false\" />\r\n    <!--
    \ log file names -->\r\n    <property name=\"errorLogName\" value=\"error\" />\r\n
    \   <property name=\"metricsLogName\" value=\"metrics\" />\r\n    <property name=\"auditLogName\"
    value=\"audit\" />\r\n    <property name=\"debugLogName\" value=\"debug\" />\r\n
    \   <property name=\"transactionLogName\" value=\"transaction\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"allLogName\" value=\"all\" />\r\n    <property name=\"queueSize\" value=\"256\"
    />\r\n    <property name=\"maxFileSize\" value=\"50MB\" />\r\n    <property name=\"maxHistory\"
    value=\"30\" />\r\n    <property name=\"totalSizeCap\" value=\"10GB\" />\r\n    <property
    name=\"pattern\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;, UTC}\\t[%thread]\\t%-5level\\t%logger{36}\\t%replace(%replace(%replace(%mdc){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}){',
    ','\\t'}){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}\\t%replace(%replace(%msg){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}%n\"
    />\r\n    <!-- All log -->\r\n    <if condition='property(\"enable-all-log\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"true\")'>\r\n
    \       <then>\r\n            <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\"
    name=\"ALL_ROLLING\">\r\n                <file>${logDirectory}/${allLogName}.log</file>\r\n
    \               <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \                   <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${allLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \                   <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \                       <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n                    </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \                   <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n                    <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \               </rollingPolicy>\r\n                <encoder>\r\n                    <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \               </encoder>\r\n            </appender>\r\n            <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_ALL\">\r\n                <appender-ref ref=\"ALL_ROLLING\" />\r\n
    \           </appender>\r\n        </then>\r\n    </if>\r\n    <!-- Error log -->\r\n
    \   <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"ERROR_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Audit messages
    filter - deny audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>AUDIT_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n
    \           <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <!-- Transaction
    messages filter - deny Transaction messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n
    \           <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <!-- deny all events with a level below INFO, that
    is TRACE and DEBUG -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.filter.ThresholdFilter\">\r\n
    \           <level>INFO</level>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Debug log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"DEBUG_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- No need
    to deny audit messages - they are INFO only, will be denied \r\n                        anyway
    -->\r\n        <!-- Transaction messages filter - deny Transaction messages, there
    are \r\n                        some DEBUG level messages among them -->\r\n        <filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n            <evaluator
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n                <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n
    \           </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>NEUTRAL</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>DENY</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <!-- accept DEBUG and TRACE level -->\r\n        <filter
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n            <evaluator
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.GEventEvaluator\">\r\n                <expression>e.level.toInt()
    &lt;= DEBUG.toInt()</expression>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <OnMismatch>DENY</OnMismatch>\r\n
    \           <OnMatch>NEUTRAL</OnMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n            <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Audit log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"AUDIT_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Audit messages
    filter - accept audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>AUDIT_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n            <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>\r\n
    \           <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>\r\n        </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n            <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- SdncTransaction log -->\r\n    <appender
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\" name=\"TRANSACTION_ROLLING\">\r\n
    \       <file>${logDirectory}/${transactionLogName}.log</file>\r\n        <!-- Transaction
    messages filter - accept audit messages -->\r\n        <filter class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter\">\r\n
    \           <evaluator class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.boolex.OnMarkerEvaluator\">\r\n
    \               <marker>TRANSACTION_MARKER</marker>\r\n            </evaluator>\r\n
    \           <onMismatch>DENY</onMismatch>\r\n            <onMatch>ACCEPT</onMatch>\r\n
    \       </filter>\r\n        <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \           <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${transactionLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \           <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \               <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n            </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \           <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n            <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \       </rollingPolicy>\r\n        <encoder>\r\n            <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \       </encoder>\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <!-- Asynchronicity Configurations
    -->\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\" name=\"ASYNC_DEBUG\">\r\n
    \       <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"DEBUG_ROLLING\"
    />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_TRANSACTION\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"TRANSACTION_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_ERROR\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ERROR_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <appender class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\"
    name=\"ASYNC_AUDIT\">\r\n        <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"AUDIT_ROLLING\" />\r\n    </appender>\r\n    <root level=\"INFO\">\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ASYNC_ERROR\" />\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"ASYNC_DEBUG\" />\r\n        <appender-ref
    ref=\"ASYNC_AUDIT\" />\r\n        <appender-ref ref=\"ASYNC_TRANSACTION\" />\r\n
    \       <if condition='property(\"enable-all-log\").equalsIgnoreCase(\"true\")'>\r\n
    \           <then>\r\n                <appender-ref ref=\"ALL_ROLLING\" />\r\n            </then>\r\n
    \       </if>\r\n    </root>\r\n    <logger level=\"INFO\" name=\"org.openecomp.sdc\"
    />\r\n</configuration>\r\n"
---
# Source: sdc/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-filebeat-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc
    chart: sdc-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  filebeat.yml: |
    # Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada, AT&T, ZTE
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
  
    filebeat.prospectors:
    #it is mandatory, in our case it's log
    - input_type: log
      #This is the canolical path as mentioned in logback.xml, *.* means it will monitor all files in the directory.
      paths:
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*.log
      #Files older than this should be ignored.In our case it will be 48 hours i.e. 2 days. It is a helping flag for clean_inactive
      ignore_older: 48h
      # Remove the registry entry for a file that is more than the specified time. In our case it will be 96 hours, i.e. 4 days. It will help to keep registry records with in limit
      clean_inactive: 96h
  
  
    # Name of the registry file. If a relative path is used, it is considered relative to the
    # data path. Else full qualified file name.
    #filebeat.registry_file: ${path.data}/registry
  
  
    output.logstash:
      #List of logstash server ip addresses with port number.
      #But, in our case, this will be the loadbalancer IP address.
      #For the below property to work the loadbalancer or logstash should expose 5044 port to listen the filebeat events or port in the property should be changed appropriately.
      hosts: ["log-ls.onap:5044"]
      #If enable will do load balancing among availabe Logstash, automatically.
      loadbalance: true
  
      #The list of root certificates for server verifications.
      #If certificate_authorities is empty or not set, the trusted
      #certificate authorities of the host system are used.
      #ssl.certificate_authorities: $ssl.certificate_authorities
  
      #The path to the certificate for SSL client authentication. If the certificate is not specified,
      #client authentication is not available.
      #ssl.certificate: $ssl.certificate
  
      #The client certificate key used for client authentication.
      #ssl.key: $ssl.key
  
      #The passphrase used to decrypt an encrypted key stored in the configured key file
      #ssl.key_passphrase: $ssl.key_passphrase
---

# Source: sdc/charts/sdc-es/templates/pv.yaml
kind: PersistentVolume
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-es
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-es
    chart: "sdc-es-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-sdc"
    heritage: "Tiller"
    name: dev-sdc-sdc-es
spec:
  capacity:
    storage: 2Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  hostPath:
    path: /dockerdata-nfs/dev-sdc//sdc/sdc-es/ES
---

# Source: sdc/charts/sdc-es/templates/pvc.yaml
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-es
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-es
    chart: "sdc-es-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-sdc"
    heritage: "Tiller"
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: dev-sdc-sdc-es
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 2Gi
---

apiVersion: v1

metadata:
  name: sdc-be
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-be
    chart: sdc-be-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
  annotations:
    msb.onap.org/service-info: '[
      {
          "serviceName": "sdc",
          "version": "v1",
          "url": "/sdc/v1",
          "protocol": "REST",
          "port": "8080",
          "visualRange":"1"
      },
      {
          "serviceName": "sdc-deprecated",
          "version": "v1",
          "url": "/sdc/v1",
          "protocol": "REST",
          "port": "8080",
          "visualRange":"1",
          "path":"/sdc/v1"
      }
      ]'
spec:
  type: NodePort
  ports:
    - port: 8443
      nodePort: 30204
      name: sdc-be
    - port: 8080
      nodePort: 30205
      name: sdc-be2
  selector:
    app: sdc-be
    release: dev-sdc

# Source: sdc/charts/sdc-be/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2017 Amdocs, AT&T, Bell Canada
# Modifications Copyright  2018 ZTE
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-be
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-be
    chart: sdc-be-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-be
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-be-readiness
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - "sdc-onboarding-be"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
      - name: sdc-be-job-completion
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: "Always"
        command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-cassandra-init
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
        - name: sdc-be
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/sdc-backend:1.5.2"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8443
          - containerPort: 8080
          
          livenessProbe:
            httpGet:
              path: /sdc2/rest/version
              port: 8443
              scheme: HTTPS
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
            timeoutSeconds: 5
          
          readinessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - "/var/lib/ready-probe.sh"
            initialDelaySeconds: 60
            periodSeconds: 10
            timeoutSeconds: 5
          resources:
                        {}
                        
          env:
          - name: ENVNAME
            value: AUTO
          - name: JAVA_OPTIONS
            value: -Xmx1536m -Xms1536m
          - name: cassandra_ssl_enabled
            value: "false"
          - name: HOST_IP
            valueFrom:
              fieldRef:
                fieldPath: status.podIP
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-environments
            mountPath: /root/chef-solo/environments/
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-logback
            mountPath: /tmp/logback.xml
            subPath: logback.xml
          lifecycle:
            postStart:
              exec:
                command: ["/bin/sh", "-c", "export LOG=wait_logback.log; touch $LOG; export SRC=/tmp/logback.xml; export DST=/var/lib/jetty/config/catalog-be/; while [ ! -e $DST ]; do echo 'Waiting for $DST...' >> $LOG; sleep 5; done; sleep 2; /bin/cp -f $SRC $DST; echo 'Done' >> $LOG"]
        # side car containers
        - name: sdc-be-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
      volumes:
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: dev-sdc-sdc-filebeat-configmap
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-data-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-logback
        configMap:
          name : dev-sdc-sdc-be-logging-configmap
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-environments
        configMap:
          name: dev-sdc-sdc-environments-configmap
          defaultMode: 0755
      - name:  dev-sdc-sdc-be-logs
        emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: sdc/charts/sdc-dcae-be/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2018 Amdocs, AT&T, Bell Canada
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-dcae-be
    chart: sdc-dcae-be-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-dcae-be
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-dcae-be-readiness
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - "sdc-be"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
      - name: sdc-dcae-be-job-completion
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: "Always"
        command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-sdc-sdc-be-config-backend
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace

      containers:
        - name: sdc-dcae-be
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/dcae-be:1.3.2"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8082
          - containerPort: 8444
          
          readinessProbe:
            httpGet:
              path: /dcae/conf/composition
              port: 8444
              scheme: HTTPS
            initialDelaySeconds: 240
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          - name: ENVNAME
            value: AUTO
          - name: JAVA_OPTIONS
            value: -XX:MaxPermSize=256m -Xmx1024m -Dconfig.home=config -Dlog.home=/var/lib/jetty/logs/ -Dlogging.config=config/dcae-be/logback-spring.xml
          - name: HOST_IP
            valueFrom:
              fieldRef:
                fieldPath: status.podIP
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-environments
            mountPath: /root/chef-solo/environments/
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-logs
            mountPath: /var/lib/jetty/logs
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-logback
            mountPath: /tmp/logback.xml
            subPath: logback.xml
          lifecycle:
            postStart:
              exec:
                command: ["/bin/sh", "-c", "export LOG=wait_logback.log; touch $LOG; export SRC=/tmp/logback.xml; export DST=/var/lib/jetty/config/dcae-be/; while [ ! -e $DST ]; do echo 'Waiting for $DST...' >> $LOG; sleep 5; done; sleep 2; /bin/cp -f $SRC $DST; echo 'Done' >> $LOG"]
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: sdc-dcae-be-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
      volumes:
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: dev-sdc-sdc-filebeat-configmap
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-data-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-logback
        configMap:
          name : dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-logging-configmap
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-environments
        configMap:
          name: dev-sdc-sdc-environments-configmap
          defaultMode: 0755
      - name:  dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-logs
        emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-dcae-dt
    chart: sdc-dcae-dt-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-dcae-dt
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-dcae-dt-readiness
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - sdc-dcae-be
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
      - name: sdc-dcae-dt-job-completion
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: "Always"
        command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-tools
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
        - name: sdc-dcae-dt
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/dcae-dt:1.3.2"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8186
          - containerPort: 9446
          
          readinessProbe:
            httpGet:
              path: /dcae/healthCheckOld
              port: 9446
              scheme: HTTPS
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          - name: ENVNAME
            value: AUTO
          - name: JAVA_OPTIONS
            value: -XX:MaxPermSize=256m -Xmx1024m -Dconfig.home=config -Dlog.home=/var/lib/jetty/logs/ -Dlogging.config=config/dcae-dt/logback-spring.xml
          - name: HOST_IP
            valueFrom:
              fieldRef:
                fieldPath: status.podIP
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-environments
            mountPath: /root/chef-solo/environments/
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-logs
            mountPath: /var/lib/jetty/logs
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-logback
            mountPath: /tmp/logback.xml
            subPath: logback.xml
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: sdc-dcae-dt-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
      volumes:
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-sdc-sdc-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-logback
          configMap:
            name : dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-logging-configmap
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-environments
          configMap:
            name: dev-sdc-sdc-environments-configmap
            defaultMode: 0755
        - name:  dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-dt-logs
          emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-dcae-fe
    chart: sdc-dcae-fe-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-dcae-fe
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-dcae-fe-readiness
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - sdc-dcae-be
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
      - name: sdc-dcae-fe-job-completion
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: "Always"
        command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-tools
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
        - name: sdc-dcae-fe
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/dcae-fe:1.3.2"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8183
          - containerPort: 9444
          
          readinessProbe:
            httpGet:
              path: /dcaed/healthCheck
              port: 9444
              scheme: HTTPS
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          - name: ENVNAME
            value: AUTO
          - name: JAVA_OPTIONS
            value: -XX:MaxPermSize=256m -Xmx1024m -Dconfig.home=config -Dlog.home=/var/lib/jetty/logs/ -Dlogging.config=config/dcae-fe/logback-spring.xml
          - name: HOST_IP
            valueFrom:
              fieldRef:
                fieldPath: status.podIP
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-environments
            mountPath: /root/chef-solo/environments/
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-logs
            mountPath: /var/lib/jetty/logs
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-logback
            mountPath: /tmp/logback.xml
            subPath: logback.xml
          lifecycle:
            postStart:
              exec:
                command: ["/bin/sh", "-c", "export LOG=wait_logback.log; touch $LOG; export SRC=/tmp/logback.xml; export DST=/var/lib/jetty/config/dcae-fe/; while [ ! -e $DST ]; do echo 'Waiting for $DST...' >> $LOG; sleep 5; done; sleep 2; /bin/cp -f $SRC $DST; echo 'Done' >> $LOG"]
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: sdc-dcae-fe-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
      volumes:
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-sdc-sdc-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-logback
          configMap:
            name : dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-logging-configmap
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-environments
          configMap:
            name: dev-sdc-sdc-environments-configmap
            defaultMode: 0755
        - name:  dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-fe-logs
          emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-tosca-lab
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-dcae-tosca-lab
    chart: sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-dcae-tosca-lab
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-readiness
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - "sdc-dcae-be"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always

      containers:
        - name: sdc-dcae-tosca-lab
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/dcae-tosca-app:1.3.1"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8085
          - containerPort: 8445
          
          readinessProbe:
            httpGet:
              path: /healthcheck
              port: 8085
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          - name: ENVNAME
            value: AUTO
          - name: JAVA_OPTIONS
            value: -XX:MaxPermSize=256m -Xmx1024m
          - name: HOST_IP
            valueFrom:
              fieldRef:
                fieldPath: status.podIP
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-environments
            mountPath: /root/chef-solo/environments/
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          resources:
                        {}
                        
        # side car containers
        - name: sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
      volumes:
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: dev-sdc-sdc-filebeat-configmap
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-data-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-environments
        configMap:
          name: dev-sdc-sdc-environments-configmap
          defaultMode: 0755
      - name:  dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-tosca-lab-logs
        emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-es
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-es
    chart: sdc-es-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-es
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: sdc-es
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/sdc-elasticsearch:1.5.2"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 9200
          - containerPort: 9300
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 9200
            initialDelaySeconds: 60
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            httpGet:
              path: "_cluster/health?wait_for_status=yellow&timeout=120s"
              port: 9200
              scheme: HTTP
            initialDelaySeconds: 60
            periodSeconds: 10
          resources:
                        {}
                        
          env:
          - name: ENVNAME
            value: AUTO
          - name: HOST_IP
            valueFrom:
              fieldRef:
                fieldPath: status.podIP
          - name: ES_HEAP_SIZE
            value: 1024M
          - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
            value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-es-environments
            mountPath: /root/chef-solo/environments/
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-es-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-es-data
            mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data/
      volumes:
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-es-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-es-data
          persistentVolumeClaim:
            claimName: dev-sdc-sdc-es
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-es-environments
          configMap:
            name: dev-sdc-sdc-environments-configmap
            defaultMode: 0755
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-fe
    chart: sdc-fe-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-fe
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-fe-readiness
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - "sdc-kb"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
      - name: sdc-fe-job-completion
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: "Always"
        command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-sdc-sdc-be-config-backend
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
        - name: sdc-fe
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/sdc-frontend:1.5.2"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8181
          - containerPort: 9443
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 9443
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 60
            timeoutSeconds: 15
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 9443
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 60
            timeoutSeconds: 15
          resources:
                        {}
                        
          env:
          - name: ENVNAME
            value: AUTO
          - name: HOST_IP
            valueFrom:
              fieldRef:
                fieldPath: status.podIP
          - name: JAVA_OPTIONS
            value: -Xmx256m -Xms256m
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-environments
            mountPath: /root/chef-solo/environments/
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-configs
            mountPath: /var/lib/jetty/config/catalog-fe/plugins-configuration.yaml
            subPath: plugins-configuration.yaml
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-logback
            mountPath: /tmp/logback.xml
            subPath: logback.xml
          lifecycle:
            postStart:
              exec:
                command: ["/bin/sh", "-c", "export LOG=wait_logback.log; touch $LOG; export SRC=/tmp/logback.xml; export DST=/var/lib/jetty/config/catalog-fe/; while [ ! -e $DST ]; do echo 'Waiting for $DST...' >> $LOG; sleep 5; done; sleep 2; /bin/cp -f $SRC $DST; echo 'Done' >> $LOG"]
        # side car containers
        - name: sdc-fe-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
      volumes:
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-sdc-sdc-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-configs
          configMap:
            name : dev-sdc-sdc-fe-plugins-configmap
            defaultMode: 0777
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-logback
          configMap:
            name : dev-sdc-sdc-fe-logging-configmap
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-fe-environments
          configMap:
            name: dev-sdc-sdc-environments-configmap
            defaultMode: 0755
        - name:  dev-sdc-sdc-fe-logs
          emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-kb
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-kb
    chart: sdc-kb-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-kb
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-kb-job-completion
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: "Always"
        command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-sdc-sdc-es-config-elasticsearch
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
        - name: sdc-kb
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/sdc-kibana:1.5.2"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 5601
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 5601
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          resources:
                        {}
                        
          env:
          - name: ENVNAME
            value: AUTO
          - name: NODE_OPTIONS
            value: --max-old-space-size=200
          - name: HOST_IP
            valueFrom:
              fieldRef:
                fieldPath: status.podIP
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-kb-environments
            mountPath: /root/chef-solo/environments/
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-kb-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-kb-localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-kb-environments
        configMap:
          name: dev-sdc-sdc-environments-configmap
          defaultMode: 0755
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-onboarding-be
    chart: sdc-onboarding-be-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-onboarding-be
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-onboarding-be-job-completion
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: "Always"
        command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-cassandra-init
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
        - name: sdc-onboarding-be
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/sdc-onboard-backend:1.5.2"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8445
          - containerPort: 8081
          
          livenessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - "/var/lib/ready-probe.sh"
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 60
            timeoutSeconds: 15
          
          readinessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - "/var/lib/ready-probe.sh"
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 60
            timeoutSeconds: 15
          resources:
                        {}
                        
          env:
          - name: ENVNAME
            value: AUTO
          - name: JAVA_OPTIONS
            value: -Xmx1g -Xms1g
          - name: SDC_CLUSTER_NAME
            value: "SDC-CS-AUTO"
          - name: cassandra_ssl_enabled
            value: "false"
          - name: HOST_IP
            valueFrom:
              fieldRef:
                fieldPath: status.podIP
          - name: SDC_USER
            valueFrom:
              secretKeyRef: {name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-secrets, key: sdc_user}
          - name: SDC_PASSWORD
            valueFrom:
              secretKeyRef: {name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-secrets, key: sdc_password}
          - name: SDC_CERT_DIR
            value: /var/lib/jetty/cert
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-environments
            mountPath: /root/chef-solo/environments/
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-logback
            mountPath: /tmp/logback.xml
            subPath: logback.xml
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-cert-storage
            mountPath: "/var/lib/jetty/cert"
          lifecycle:
            postStart:
              exec:
                command: ["/bin/sh", "-c", "export LOG=wait_logback.log; touch $LOG; export SRC=/tmp/logback.xml; export DST=/var/lib/jetty/config/onboarding-be/; while [ ! -e $DST ]; do echo 'Waiting for $DST...' >> $LOG; sleep 5; done; sleep 2; /bin/cp -f $SRC $DST; echo 'Done' >> $LOG"]
        # side car containers
        - name: sdc-onboarding-be-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
      volumes:
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-localtime
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-filebeat-conf
        configMap:
          name: dev-sdc-sdc-filebeat-configmap
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-data-filebeat
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-logback
        configMap:
          name : dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-logging-configmap
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-environments
        configMap:
          name: dev-sdc-sdc-environments-configmap
          defaultMode: 0755
      - name:  dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-logs
        emptyDir: {}
      - name:  dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-cert-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-cert
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-wfd-be
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-wfd-be
    chart: sdc-wfd-be-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-wfd-be
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-wfd-be-job-completion
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: "Always"
        command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-sdc-sdc-wfd-be-workflow-init
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      
      containers:
        - name: sdc-wfd-be
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/workflow-backend:1.5.2"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8080
          - containerPort: 8443
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8443
            initialDelaySeconds: 60
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8443
            initialDelaySeconds: 60
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          - name: JAVA_OPTIONS
            value: -Xmx1536m -Xms1536m
          - name: CS_HOSTS
            value: "cassandra"
          - name: CS_PORT
            value: "9042"
          - name: CS_AUTHENTICATE
            value: "true"
          - name: CS_USER
            valueFrom:
              secretKeyRef: {name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-secrets, key: sdc_user}
          - name: CS_PASSWORD
            valueFrom:
              secretKeyRef: {name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-secrets, key: sdc_password}
          - name: CS_SSL_ENABLED
            value: "false"
          - name: CS_TRUST_STORE_PATH
            value: "/etc/cassandra-client-truststore/truststore"
          - name: CS_TRUST_STORE_PASSWORD
            value: "password"
          - name: SDC_PROTOCOL
            value: "HTTPS"
          - name: SDC_ENDPOINT
            value: "sdc-be:8443"
          - name: SDC_USER
            value: "workflow"
          - name: SDC_PASSWORD
            value: "Kp8bJ4SXszM0WXlhak3eHlcse2gAw84vaoGGmJvUy2U"
          - name: SERVER_SSL_ENABLED
            value: "false"
          - name: SERVER_SSL_KEYSTORE_TYPE
            value: "jks"
          - name: SERVER_SSL_KEYSTORE_PATH
            value: "etc/org.onap.sdc.p12"
          - name: SERVER_SSL_KEY_PASSWORD
            value: "!ppJ.JvWn0hGh)oVF]([Kv)^"
          volumeMounts:
    
    
      volumes:
    
    
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-wfd-fe
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-wfd-fe
    chart: sdc-wfd-fe-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-wfd-fe
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-wfd-fe-readiness
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - "sdc-wfd-be"
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
      containers:
        - name: sdc-wfd-fe
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/workflow-frontend:1.5.2"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8080
          - containerPort: 8443
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8080
            initialDelaySeconds: 60
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8080
            initialDelaySeconds: 60
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          - name: ENVNAME
            value: AUTO
          - name: JAVA_OPTIONS
            value: -Xmx256m -Xms256m
          - name: BACKEND
            value: http://sdc-wfd-be:8080
          - name: IS_HTTPS
            value: "true"
            
          - name: KEYSTORE_PASS
            value: "!ppJ.JvWn0hGh)oVF]([Kv)^"
          - name: TRUSTSTORE_PASS
            value: "].][xgtze]hBhz*wy]}m#lf*"
          - name: TRUSTSTORE_PATH
            value: "etc/org.onap.sdc.trust.jks"
          - name: KEYSTORE_PATH
            value: "etc/org.onap.sdc.p12"
            
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-wfd-fe-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          resources:
                        null
                        
        # side car containers
        - name: sdc-wfd-fe-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-wfd-fe-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-wfd-fe-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-sdc-sdc-wfd-fe-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
      volumes:
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-wfd-fe-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-wfd-fe-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-sdc-sdc-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-wfd-fe-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
        - name:  dev-sdc-sdc-wfd-fe-logs
          emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-config-backend
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-be-job
    chart: sdc-be-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  backoffLimit: 20
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-be-job
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      restartPolicy: Never
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-be-init-readiness
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - sdc-be
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
      - name: sdc-be-job
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/sdc-backend-init:1.5.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-environments
          mountPath: /root/chef-solo/environments/
        env:
        - name: ENVNAME
          value: AUTO
        - name: HOST_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
      volumes:
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-be-environments
          configMap:
            name: dev-sdc-sdc-environments-configmap
            defaultMode: 0755
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
      restartPolicy: Never
---

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-config-cassandra
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-cs-job
    chart: sdc-cs-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  backoffLimit: 20
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-cs-job
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      restartPolicy: Never
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-cs-init-readiness
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - cassandra
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
      - name: sdc-cs-job
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/sdc-cassandra-init:1.5.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-environments
          mountPath: /root/chef-solo/environments/
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-chef-cache
          mountPath: /root/chef-solo/cache
        env:
        - name: ENVNAME
          value: AUTO
        - name: RELEASE
          value: latest
        - name: SDC_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef: {name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-secrets, key: sdc_user}
        - name: SDC_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef: {name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-secrets, key: sdc_password}
        - name: CS_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef: {name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-secrets, key: cs_password}
        - name: HOST_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
      volumes:
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-environments
        configMap:
          name: dev-sdc-sdc-environments-configmap
          defaultMode: 0755
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-chef-cache
        emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
      restartPolicy: Never
---

      labels:
        app: sdc-dcae-be-job
        release: dev-sdc

      restartPolicy: Never

      - name: sdc-dcae-be-init-readiness

        - sdc-dcae-be

        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
      - name: sdc-dcae-be-job
        image: nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/dcae-tools:1.3.2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-dcae-be-environments

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-cassandra-init
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: sdc-onboarding-be-job
    chart: sdc-onboarding-be-5.0.0
    release: dev-sdc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  backoffLimit: 20
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sdc-onboarding-be-job
        release: dev-sdc
    spec:
      restartPolicy: Never
      initContainers:
      - name: sdc-onboarding-be-job-completion
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.2"
        imagePullPolicy: "Always"
        command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-sdc-sdc-cs-config-cassandra
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
      - name: sdc-onboarding-be-job
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/sdc-onboard-cassandra-init:1.5.2"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-environments
          mountPath: /root/chef-solo/environments/
        env:
        - name: ENVNAME
          value: AUTO
        - name: HOST_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: SDC_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef: {name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-secrets, key: sdc_user}
        - name: SDC_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef: {name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-secrets, key: sdc_password}
        - name: CS_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef: {name: dev-sdc-sdc-cs-secrets, key: cs_password}
        - name: CS_HOST_IP
          value: "cassandra"
      volumes:
      - name: dev-sdc-sdc-onboarding-be-environments
        configMap:
          name: dev-sdc-sdc-environments-configmap
          defaultMode: 0755
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
      restartPolicy: Never

    app: sniro-emulator
    chart: sniro-emulator-5.0.0
    release: dev-sniro-emulator
    heritage: Tiller

  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sniro-emulator
        release: dev-sniro-emulator

      containers:
      - name: sniro-emulator
        image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/sniroemulator:1.0.0"

        ports:
        - containerPort: 9999

          tcpSocket:
            port: 9999
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10

          tcpSocket:
            port: 9999
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          resources:
                        null

      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

1. Get the application URL by running these commands:
  export NODE_PORT=$(kubectl get --namespace onap -o jsonpath="{.spec.ports[0].nodePort}" services sniro-emulator)
  export NODE_IP=$(kubectl get nodes --namespace onap -o jsonpath="{.items[0].status.addresses[0].address}")
  echo http://$NODE_IP:$NODE_PORT

      requests:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 500Mi
    small:
      limits:
        cpu: 250m
        memory: 250Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 250m
        memory: 250Mi
    unlimited: {}
  service:
    internalPort: 8082
    name: uui-server
    nodePort: 99
    portName: uui-server
    type: NodePort
  subChartsOnly:
    enabled: true

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: uui-server
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: uui-server
    chart: uui-server-5.0.0
    release: dev-uui
    heritage: Tiller
  annotations:
    msb.onap.org/service-info: '[
      {
          "serviceName": "usecaseui-server",
          "version": "v1",
          "url": "/api/usecaseui-server/v1",
          "protocol": "REST",
          "port": "8082",
          "visualRange":"1"
      }
      ]'
spec:
  type: NodePort
  ports:
    - port: 8082
      nodePort: 30399
      name: uui-server
  selector:
    app: uui-server
    release: dev-uui

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: uui
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: uui
    chart: uui-5.0.0
    release: dev-uui
    heritage: Tiller
  annotations:
    msb.onap.org/service-info: '[
      {
          "serviceName": "usecaseui-ui",
          "version": "v1",
          "url": "/usecase-ui",
          "path":"/iui/usecaseui",
          "protocol": "UI",
          "port": "8080",
          "visualRange":"1"
      }
      ]'
spec:
  type: NodePort
  ports:
    - port: 8080
      nodePort: 30398
      name: uui
  selector:
    app: uui
    release: dev-uui
---
# Source: uui/charts/uui-server/templates/deployment.yaml

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-uui-uui-server
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: uui-server
    chart: uui-server-5.0.0
    release: dev-uui
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: uui-server
        release: dev-uui
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: uui-server
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/usecase-ui-server:2.0.1"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8082
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8082
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          resources:
                        {}
                        
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8082
            initialDelaySeconds: 60
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          - name: MSB_ADDR
            value: msb-iag.onap:80
          - name: MR_ADDR
            value: message-router.onap:3904
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: uui/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");

# You may obtain a copy of the License at

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-uui-uui
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: uui
    chart: uui-5.0.0
    release: dev-uui
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: uui
        release: dev-uui
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: uui
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/usecase-ui:2.0.1"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          command:
            - /bin/bash
            - -c
            - /home/uui/tomcat/bin/catalina.sh run
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8080
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8080
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8080
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
          - name: MSB_ADDR
            value: msb-iag.onap:80
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---
# Source: uui/charts/uui-server/templates/ingress.yaml
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: dev-uui-uui-server-ingress
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "false"
  labels:
    app: uui-server
    chart: uui-server-5.0.0
    release: dev-uui
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  rules:
  - host: uuiserver.simpledemo.onap.org
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          serviceName: uui-server
          servicePort: 8082
---

1. Get the application URL by running these commands:
  export NODE_PORT=$(kubectl get --namespace onap -o jsonpath="{.spec.ports[0].nodePort}" services uui)
  export NODE_IP=$(kubectl get nodes --namespace onap -o jsonpath="{.items[0].status.addresses[0].address}")
  echo http://$NODE_IP:$NODE_PORT

    initialDelaySeconds: 120
    periodSeconds: 10
  nodeSelector: {}
  pullPolicy: Always
  readiness:
    initialDelaySeconds: 10
    periodSeconds: 10
  replicaCount: 1
  repository: nexus3.onap.org:10001
  resources:
    large:
      limits:
        cpu: 200m
        memory: 1000Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 500Mi
    small:
      limits:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 500Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 50m
        memory: 250Mi
    unlimited: {}
  service:
    externalPort: 8410
    internalPort: 8410
    name: vfc-zte-vnfm-driver
    portName: vfc-zte-vnfm-driver
    type: ClusterIP

HOOKS:

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-logging-configmap
  namespace: onap
data:
  log.yml: |
    version: 1
    disable_existing_loggers: False
  
    loggers:
        catalog:
            handlers: [cataloglocal_handler, catalog_handler]
            level: "DEBUG"
            propagate: False
        django:
            handlers: [django_handler]
            level: "DEBUG"
            propagate: False
    handlers:
        cataloglocal_handler:
            level: "DEBUG"
            class:
                "logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler"
            filename: "logs/runtime_catalog.log"
            formatter:
                "standard"
            maxBytes: 52428800
            backupCount: 10
        catalog_handler:
            level: "DEBUG"
            class:
                "logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler"
            filename: "/var/log/onap/vfc/catalog/runtime_catalog.log"
            formatter:
                "mdcFormat"
            maxBytes: 52428800
            backupCount: 10
        django_handler:
            level: "DEBUG"
            class:
                "logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler"
            filename: "logs/django.log"
            formatter:
                "standard"
            maxBytes: 52428800
            backupCount: 10
    formatters:
        standard:
            format:
                "%(asctime)s:[%(name)s]:[%(filename)s]-[%(lineno)d] [%(levelname)s]:%(message)s"
        mdcFormat:
            format:
                "%(asctime)s|||||%(name)s||%(thread)s||%(funcName)s||%(levelname)s||%(message)s||||%(mdc)s \t"
            mdcfmt: "{requestID} {invocationID} {serviceName} {serviceIP}"
            datefmt: "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"
            (): onaplogging.mdcformatter.MDCFormatter

    version: 1
    disable_existing_loggers: False
  
    loggers:
        driver:
            handlers: [gvnfmdriverlocal_handler, gvnfmdriver_handler]
            level: "DEBUG"
            propagate: False
        django:
            handlers: [django_handler]
            level: "DEBUG"
            propagate: False
    handlers:
        gvnfmdriverlocal_handler:
            level: "DEBUG"
            class:
                "logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler"
            filename: "logs/runtime_gvnfmdriver.log"
            formatter:
                "standard"
            maxBytes: 52428800
            backupCount: 10
        gvnfmdriver_handler:
            level: "DEBUG"
            class:
                "logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler"
            filename: "/var/log/onap/vfc/gvnfmdriver/runtime_gvnfmdriver.log"
            formatter:
                "mdcFormat"
            maxBytes: 52428800
            backupCount: 10
        django_handler:
            level: "DEBUG"
            class:
                "logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler"
            filename: "logs/django.log"
            formatter:
                "standard"
            maxBytes: 52428800
            backupCount: 10
    formatters:
        standard:
            format:
                "%(asctime)s:[%(name)s]:[%(filename)s]-[%(lineno)d] [%(levelname)s]:%(message)s"
        mdcFormat:
            format:

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-logging-configmap
  namespace: onap
data:
  log4j.properties: |-
    ###############################################################################
    # Copyright 2016, Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #     http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
    ###############################################################################
    log4j.rootLogger=INFO,root
    log4j.appender.root.Append=true
  
    #Log Directory
    logDir=/var/log/onap
    componentName=vfc
    subComponentName=huaweivnfmdriver
    log4j.appender.root.File=${logDir}/${componentName}/${subComponentName}/vnfmadapterservice.log
  
    log4j.appender.root.layout.ConversionPattern=%d %-5p [%t][%X{moduleID}][%C %L] %m%n
    log4j.appender.root.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
    log4j.appender.root.MaxBackupIndex=50
    log4j.appender.root.MaxFileSize=20MB
    log4j.appender.root=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender

kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-logging-configmap
  namespace: onap
data:
  log4j.properties: |-
    ###############################################################################
    # Copyright 2016 Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #     http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
    ###############################################################################
    log4j.rootLogger=INFO,root
    log4j.logger.org.openo.nfvo=DEBUG,stdout
    log4j.appender.root.Append=true
  
    #Log Directory
    logDir=/var/log/onap
    componentName=vfc
    subComponentName=jujudriver
    log4j.appender.root.File=${logDir}/${componentName}/${subComponentName}/jujuvnfmadapterservice.log
  
    log4j.appender.root.layout.ConversionPattern=%d %-5p [%t][%X{moduleID}][%C %L] %m%n
    log4j.appender.root.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
    log4j.appender.root.MaxBackupIndex=50
    log4j.appender.root.MaxFileSize=20MB
    log4j.appender.root=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender
  
    log4j.appender.stdout=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
    log4j.appender.stdout.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
    log4j.appender.stdout.layout.ConversionPattern=%d %-5p [%t][%X{moduleID}][%C %L] %m%n

  name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-logging-configmap
  namespace: onap

  log.yml: |
    version: 1
    disable_existing_loggers: False
  
    loggers:
        ztevnfmdriver:
            handlers: [ztevnfmdriverlocal_handler, ztevnfmdriver_handler]
            level: "DEBUG"
            propagate: False
        django:
            handlers: [django_handler]
            level: "DEBUG"
            propagate: False
    handlers:
        ztevnfmdriverlocal_handler:
            level: "DEBUG"
            class:
                "logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler"
            filename: "logs/runtime_ztevnfmdriver.log"
            formatter:
                "standard"
            maxBytes: 52428800
            backupCount: 10
        ztevnfmdriver_handler:
            level: "DEBUG"
            class:
                "logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler"
            filename: "/var/log/onap/vfc/ztevnfmdriver/runtime_ztevnfmdriver.log"
            formatter:
                "mdcFormat"
            maxBytes: 52428800
            backupCount: 10
        django_handler:
            level: "DEBUG"
            class:
                "logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler"
            filename: "logs/django.log"
            formatter:
                "standard"
            maxBytes: 52428800
            backupCount: 10
    formatters:
        standard:
            format:
                "%(asctime)s:[%(name)s]:[%(filename)s]-[%(lineno)d] [%(levelname)s]:%(message)s"
        mdcFormat:
            format:
                "%(asctime)s|||||%(name)s||%(thread)s||%(funcName)s||%(levelname)s||%(message)s||||%(mdc)s \t"
            mdcfmt: "{requestID} {invocationID} {serviceName} {serviceIP}"
            datefmt: "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"
            (): onaplogging.mdcformatter.MDCFormatter
---
# Source: vfc/templates/configmap.yaml
# Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-filebeat-configmap
  namespace: onap
data:
  filebeat.yml: |
    filebeat.prospectors:
    #it is mandatory, in our case it's log
    - input_type: log
      #This is the canolical path as mentioned in logback.xml, *.* means it will monitor all files in the directory.
      paths:
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*.log
      #Files older than this should be ignored.In our case it will be 48 hours i.e. 2 days. It is a helping flag for clean_inactive
      ignore_older: 48h
      # Remove the registry entry for a file that is more than the specified time. In our case it will be 96 hours, i.e. 4 days. It will help to keep registry records with in limit
      clean_inactive: 96h
  
  
    # Name of the registry file. If a relative path is used, it is considered relative to the
    # data path. Else full qualified file name.
    #filebeat.registry_file: ${path.data}/registry
  
  
    output.logstash:
      #List of logstash server ip addresses with port number.
      #But, in our case, this will be the loadbalancer IP address.
      #For the below property to work the loadbalancer or logstash should expose 5044 port to listen the filebeat events or port in the property should be changed appropriately.
      hosts: ["log-ls:5044"]
      #If enable will do load balancing among availabe Logstash, automatically.
      loadbalance: true
  
      #The list of root certificates for server verifications.
      #If certificate_authorities is empty or not set, the trusted
      #certificate authorities of the host system are used.
      #ssl.certificate_authorities: $ssl.certificate_authorities
  
      #The path to the certificate for SSL client authentication. If the certificate is not specified,
      #client authentication is not available.
      #ssl.certificate: $ssl.certificate
  
      #The client certificate key used for client authentication.
      #ssl.key: $ssl.key
  
      #The passphrase used to decrypt an encrypted key stored in the configured key file
      #ssl.key_passphrase: $ssl.key_passphrase
---
# Source: vfc/charts/mariadb-galera/templates/pv.yaml
kind: PersistentVolume
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb-data0
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb
    chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-vfc"
    heritage: "Tiller"
    name: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb
spec:
  capacity:
    storage: 2Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  storageClassName: "dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb-data"
  hostPath:
    path: /dockerdata-nfs/dev-vfc/vfc/data0
---

# Source: vfc/charts/vfc-catalog/templates/pvc.yaml
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-catalog
    chart: "vfc-catalog-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-vfc"
    heritage: "Tiller"
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 2Gi
---
