apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: vfc-workflow-engine
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-workflow-engine
    chart: vfc-workflow-engine-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
  annotations:
    msb.onap.org/service-info: '[
      {
          "serviceName": "workflow-engine",
          "version": "v1",
          "url": "/activiti-rest",
          "protocol": "REST",
          "port": "8080",
          "visualRange":"1"
      }
      ]'
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  ports:
    - port: 8080
      targetPort: 8080
      name: vfc-workflow-engine
  selector:
    app: vfc-workflow-engine
    release: dev-vfc
---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: vfc-workflow
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-workflow
    chart: vfc-workflow-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
  annotations:
    msb.onap.org/service-info: '[
      {
          "serviceName": "workflow",
          "version": "v1",
          "url": "/api/workflow/v1",
          "protocol": "REST",
          "port": "10550",
          "visualRange":"1"
      }
      ]'
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  ports:
    - port: 10550
      targetPort: 10550
      name: vfc-workflow
  selector:
    app: vfc-workflow
    release: dev-vfc

apiVersion: v1

  name: vfc-zte-sdnc-driver

    app: vfc-zte-sdnc-driver
    chart: vfc-zte-sdnc-driver-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller

    msb.onap.org/service-info: '[
      {
          "serviceName": "ztesdncdriver",
          "version": "v1",

          "protocol": "REST",
          "port": "8411",
          "visualRange":"1"
      }
      ]'

      targetPort: 8411

      {
          "serviceName": "ztevnfmdriver",

# Source: vfc/charts/vfc-catalog/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-catalog
    chart: vfc-catalog-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-catalog
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - vfc-mariadb
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: vfc-catalog-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-catalog
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/catalog:1.3.4"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8806
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8806
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8806
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
            - name: MYSQL_ADDR
              value: "vfc-db:3306"
            - name: MYSQL_AUTH
              value: "root:secretpassword"
            - name: REDIS_ADDR
              value: "vfc-redis:6379"
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-catalog
            mountPath: /service/vfc/nfvo/catalog/static
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-logconfig
            mountPath: /opt/vfc/catalog/config/log.yml
            subPath: log.yml
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: vfc-catalog-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data

      volumes:
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-catalog
          persistentVolumeClaim:
            claimName: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name:  dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-logconfig
          configMap:
            name : dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-logging-configmap

        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-vfc-vfc-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-catalog-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-ems-driver
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-ems-driver
    chart: vfc-ems-driver-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-ems-driver
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
#Example init container for dependency checking
#      - command:
#        - /root/ready.py
#        args:
#        - --container-name
#        - mariadb
#        env:
#        - name: NAMESPACE
#          valueFrom:
#            fieldRef:
#              apiVersion: v1
#              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
#        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
#        imagePullPolicy: Always
#        name: vfc-ems-driver-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-ems-driver
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/emsdriver:1.3.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8206
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8206
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8206
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
            - name: VES_ADDR
              value: "dcae-ves-collector:8080"
            - name: VES_AUTHINFO
              value: ":"
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-generic-vnfm-driver
    chart: vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-generic-vnfm-driver
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: vfc-generic-vnfm-driver
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/gvnfmdriver:1.3.5"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8484
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8484
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8484
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-logconfig
            mountPath: /opt/vfc/gvnfmdriver/config/log.yml
            subPath: log.yml
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data

      volumes:
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name:  dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-logconfig
          configMap:
            name : dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-logging-configmap

        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-vfc-vfc-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-generic-vnfm-driver-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver
    chart: vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
#Example init container for dependency checking
#      - command:
#        - /root/ready.py
#        args:
#        - --container-name
#        - mariadb
#        env:
#        - name: NAMESPACE
#          valueFrom:
#            fieldRef:
#              apiVersion: v1
#              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
#        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
#        imagePullPolicy: Always
#        name: vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/nfvo/svnfm/huawei:1.3.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8482
          - containerPort: 8483
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8482
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8482
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-logconfig
            mountPath: /opt/vfc/hwvnfmdriver/config/log4j.properties
            subPath: log4j.properties
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data

      volumes:
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name:  dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-logconfig
          configMap:
            name : dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-logging-configmap

        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-vfc-vfc-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-huawei-vnfm-driver-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-juju-vnfm-driver
    chart: vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-juju-vnfm-driver
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
#Example init container for dependency checking
#      - command:
#        - /root/ready.py
#        args:
#        - --container-name
#        - mariadb
#        env:
#        - name: NAMESPACE
#          valueFrom:
#            fieldRef:
#              apiVersion: v1
#              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
#        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
#        imagePullPolicy: Always
#        name: vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-juju-vnfm-driver
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/jujudriver:1.3.1"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8483
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8483
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8483
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-logconfig
            mountPath: /opt/vfc/jujudriver/config/log4j.properties
            subPath: log4j.properties
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data

      volumes:
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name:  dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-logconfig
          configMap:
            name : dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-logging-configmap

        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-vfc-vfc-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-juju-vnfm-driver-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-multivim-proxy
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-multivim-proxy
    chart: vfc-multivim-proxy-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-multivim-proxy
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
#Example init container for dependency checking
#      - command:
#        - /root/ready.py
#        args:
#        - --container-name
#        - mariadb
#        env:
#        - name: NAMESPACE
#          valueFrom:
#            fieldRef:
#              apiVersion: v1
#              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
#        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
#        imagePullPolicy: Always
#        name: vfc-multivim-proxy-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-multivim-proxy
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/multivimproxy:1.3.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8481
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8481
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8481
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-nokia-v2vnfm-driver
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-nokia-v2vnfm-driver
    chart: vfc-nokia-v2vnfm-driver-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-nokia-v2vnfm-driver
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
#Example init container for dependency checking
#      - command:
#        - /root/ready.py
#        args:
#        - --container-name
#        - mariadb
#        env:
#        - name: NAMESPACE
#          valueFrom:
#            fieldRef:
#              apiVersion: v1
#              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
#        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
#        imagePullPolicy: Always
#        name: vfc-nokia-v2vnfm-driver-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-nokia-v2vnfm-driver
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/nfvo/svnfm/nokiav2:1.3.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8089
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8089
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8089
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: EXTERNAL_PORT
              value: "8089"
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

# Source: vfc/charts/vfc-nslcm/templates/deployment.yaml
# Copyright  2017 Amdocs, Bell Canada

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-nslcm
    chart: vfc-nslcm-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-nslcm
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - vfc-mariadb
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: vfc-nslcm-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-nslcm
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/nslcm:1.3.4"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8403
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8403
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8403
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
            - name: MYSQL_ADDR
              value: "vfc-db:3306"
            - name: MYSQL_AUTH
              value: "root:secretpassword"
            - name: REDIS_ADDR
              value: "vfc-redis:6379"
            - name: REG_TO_MSB_WHEN_START
              value: "true"
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm-logconfig
            mountPath: /opt/vfc/nslcm/config/log.yml
            subPath: log.yml
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: vfc-nslcm-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data

      volumes:
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name:  dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm-logconfig
          configMap:
            name : dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm-logging-configmap

        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-vfc-vfc-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-nslcm-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-redis
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-redis
    chart: vfc-redis-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-redis
        release: dev-vfc
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: vfc-redis
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/db:1.3.1"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 3306
          - containerPort: 6379
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 3306
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 3306
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-resmgr
    chart: vfc-resmgr-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-resmgr
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
#Example init container for dependency checking
#      - command:
#        - /root/ready.py
#        args:
#        - --container-name
#        - mariadb
#        env:
#        - name: NAMESPACE
#          valueFrom:
#            fieldRef:
#              apiVersion: v1
#              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
#        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
#        imagePullPolicy: Always
#        name: vfc-resmgr-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-resmgr
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/resmanagement:1.3.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8480
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8480
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8480
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr-logconfig
            mountPath: /opt/vfc/resmgr/config/log4j.properties
            subPath: log4j.properties
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: vfc-resmgr-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data

      volumes:
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name:  dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr-logconfig
          configMap:
            name : dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr-logging-configmap

        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-vfc-vfc-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-resmgr-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnflcm
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-vnflcm
    chart: vfc-vnflcm-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-vnflcm
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - vfc-mariadb
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: vfc-vnflcm-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-vnflcm
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/vnflcm:1.3.4"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8801
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8801
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8801
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
            - name: MYSQL_ADDR
              value: "vfc-db:3306"
            - name: MYSQL_AUTH
              value: "root:secretpassword"
            - name: REDIS_ADDR
              value: "vfc-redis:6379"
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnflcm-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnflcm-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnflcm-logconfig
            mountPath: /opt/vfc/gvnfm-vnflcm/config/log.yml
            subPath: log.yml
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: vfc-vnflcm-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnflcm-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnflcm-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnflcm-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data

      volumes:
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnflcm-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name:  dev-vfc-vfc-vnflcm-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnflcm-logconfig
          configMap:
            name : dev-vfc-vfc-vnflcm-logging-configmap

        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnflcm-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-vfc-vfc-filebeat-configmap

          emptyDir: {}

      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-vnfmgr
    chart: vfc-vnfmgr-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller

  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-vnfmgr
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - vfc-mariadb
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: vfc-vnfmgr-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-vnfmgr
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/vnfmgr:1.3.4"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8803
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8803
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10

            tcpSocket:
              port: 8803
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10

              value: "msb-iag:80"

              value: "vfc-redis:6379"
            - name: MYSQL_AUTH
              value: "root:secretpassword"

          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfmgr-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfmgr-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfmgr-logconfig
            mountPath: /opt/vfc/gvnfm-vnfmgr/config/log.yml
            subPath: log.yml
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: vfc-vnfmgr-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfmgr-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfmgr-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfmgr-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data

      volumes:
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfmgr-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name:  dev-vfc-vfc-vnfmgr-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfmgr-logconfig

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-vnfres
    chart: vfc-vnfres-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-vnfres
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/ready.py
        args:
        - --container-name
        - vfc-mariadb
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: vfc-vnfres-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-vnfres
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/vnfres:1.3.4"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8802
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8802
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8802
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
            - name: MYSQL_ADDR
              value: "vfc-db:3306"
            - name: REDIS_ADDR
              value: "vfc-redis:6379"
            - name: MYSQL_AUTH
              value: "root:secretpassword"
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres-logconfig
            mountPath: /opt/vfc/gvnfm-vnfres/config/log.yml
            subPath: log.yml
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: vfc-vnfres-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data

      volumes:
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name:  dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres-logconfig
          configMap:
            name : dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres-logging-configmap

        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-vfc-vfc-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-vnfres-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-workflow-engine
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-workflow-engine
    chart: vfc-workflow-engine-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-workflow-engine
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
#Example init container for dependency checking
#      - command:
#        - /root/ready.py
#        args:
#        - --container-name
#        - mariadb
#        env:
#        - name: NAMESPACE
#          valueFrom:
#            fieldRef:
#              apiVersion: v1
#              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
#        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
#        imagePullPolicy: Always
#        name: vfc-workflow-engine-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-workflow-engine
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/wfengine-activiti:1.3.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8080
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8080
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8080
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: SERVICE_IP
              valueFrom:
                fieldRef:
                  fieldPath: status.podIP
            - name: SERVICE_PORT
              value: "10550"
            - name: OPENPALETTE_MSB_IP
              value: "msb-iag"
            - name: OPENPALETTE_MSB_PORT
              value: "80"
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-workflow
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-workflow
    chart: vfc-workflow-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-workflow
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
#Example init container for dependency checking
#      - command:
#        - /root/ready.py
#        args:
#        - --container-name
#        - mariadb
#        env:
#        - name: NAMESPACE
#          valueFrom:
#            fieldRef:
#              apiVersion: v1
#              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
#        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
#        imagePullPolicy: Always
#        name: vfc-workflow-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-workflow
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/wfengine-mgrservice:1.3.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 10550
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 10550
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 10550
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: SERVICE_IP
              valueFrom:
                fieldRef:
                  fieldPath: status.podIP
            - name: SERVICE_PORT
              value: "10550"
            - name: OPENPALETTE_MSB_IP
              value: "msb-iag"
            - name: OPENPALETTE_MSB_PORT
              value: "80"
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-sdnc-driver
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-zte-sdnc-driver
    chart: vfc-zte-sdnc-driver-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-zte-sdnc-driver
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
#Example init container for dependency checking
#      - command:
#        - /root/ready.py
#        args:
#        - --container-name
#        - mariadb
#        env:
#        - name: NAMESPACE
#          valueFrom:
#            fieldRef:
#              apiVersion: v1
#              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
#        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
#        imagePullPolicy: Always
#        name: vfc-zte-sdnc-driver-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-zte-sdnc-driver
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/ztesdncdriver:1.3.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8411
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8411
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8411
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
          resources:
                        {}
                        
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vfc-zte-vnfm-driver
    chart: vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-5.0.0
    release: dev-vfc
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vfc-zte-vnfm-driver
        release: dev-vfc
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      initContainers:
#Example init container for dependency checking
#      - command:
#        - /root/ready.py
#        args:
#        - --container-name
#        - mariadb
#        env:
#        - name: NAMESPACE
#          valueFrom:
#            fieldRef:
#              apiVersion: v1
#              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
#        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.0"
#        imagePullPolicy: Always
#        name: vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vfc-zte-vnfm-driver
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vfc/ztevnfmdriver:1.3.1"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8410
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8410
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8410
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: MSB_ADDR
              value: "msb-iag:80"
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-localtime
            mountPath: /etc/localtime
            readOnly: true
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-logconfig
            mountPath: /opt/vfc/ztevnfmdriver/config/log.yml
            subPath: log.yml
          resources:
                        {}
                        

        # side car containers
        - name: vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-filebeat-onap
          image: "docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:5.5.0"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          volumeMounts:
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-filebeat-conf
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
            subPath: filebeat.yml
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-logs
            mountPath: /var/log/onap
          - name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-data-filebeat
            mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data

      volumes:
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
        - name:  dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-logs
          emptyDir: {}
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-logconfig
          configMap:
            name : dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-logging-configmap

        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-filebeat-conf
          configMap:
            name: dev-vfc-vfc-filebeat-configmap
        - name: dev-vfc-vfc-zte-vnfm-driver-data-filebeat
          emptyDir: {}
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: "onap-docker-registry-key"
---

apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb
    chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-vfc"
    heritage: "Tiller"
spec:
  serviceName: vfc-db
  replicas: 3
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb
        chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
        release: "dev-vfc"
        heritage: "Tiller"
      annotations:
        pod.alpha.kubernetes.io/initialized: "true"
    spec:
      volumes:
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: onap-docker-registry-key
      containers:
        - name: vfc-mariadb
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/adfinissygroup/k8s-mariadb-galera-centos:v002"
          imagePullPolicy: "Always"
          env:
            - name: POD_NAMESPACE
              valueFrom:
                fieldRef:
                  apiVersion: v1
                  fieldPath: metadata.namespace
            - name: MYSQL_USER
              value: "my-user"
            - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb
                  key: user-password
            - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
              value: "my-database"
            - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb
                  key: db-root-password
          ports:
          - containerPort: 3306
            name: vfc-db
          - containerPort: 4444
            name: sst
          - containerPort: 4567
            name: replication
          - containerPort: 4568
            name: ist
          readinessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - /usr/share/container-scripts/mysql/readiness-probe.sh
            initialDelaySeconds: 15
            periodSeconds: 10
            timeoutSeconds: 5
          livenessProbe:
            exec:
              command: ["mysqladmin", "ping"]
            initialDelaySeconds: 30
            periodSeconds: 10
            timeoutSeconds: 5
          resources:
                        {}
                        
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
          - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
            name: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb-data
      initContainers:
        - name: mariadb-galera-prepare
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/busybox"
          imagePullPolicy: "Always"
          command: ["sh", "-c", "chown -R 27:27 /var/lib/mysql"]
          volumeMounts:
            - name: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb-data
              mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb-data
      labels:
        name: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb
        chart: "mariadb-galera-5.0.0"
        release: "dev-vfc"
        heritage: "Tiller"
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - "ReadWriteOnce"
      storageClassName: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb-data
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: "2Gi"
      selector:
        matchLabels:
          name: dev-vfc-vfc-mariadb
Release "dev-vfc" has been upgraded. Happy Helming!

# Source: vid/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-vid-vid-filebeat-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vid
    chart: vid-5.0.0
    release: dev-vid
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  filebeat.yml: |
    # Copyright  2018 Amdocs, Bell Canada
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
  
    filebeat.prospectors:
    #it is mandatory, in our case it's log
    - input_type: log
      #This is the canolical path as mentioned in logback.xml, *.* means it will monitor all files in the directory.
      paths:
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*/*.log
        - /var/log/onap/*/*.log
      #Files older than this should be ignored.In our case it will be 48 hours i.e. 2 days. It is a helping flag for clean_inactive
      ignore_older: 48h
      # Remove the registry entry for a file that is more than the specified time. In our case it will be 96 hours, i.e. 4 days. It will help to keep registry records with in limit
      clean_inactive: 96h
  
  
    # Name of the registry file. If a relative path is used, it is considered relative to the
    # data path. Else full qualified file name.
    #filebeat.registry_file: ${path.data}/registry
  
  
    output.logstash:
      #List of logstash server ip addresses with port number.
      #But, in our case, this will be the loadbalancer IP address.
      #For the below property to work the loadbalancer or logstash should expose 5044 port to listen the filebeat events or port in the property should be changed appropriately.
      hosts: ["log-ls.onap:5044"]
      #If enable will do load balancing among availabe Logstash, automatically.
      loadbalance: true
  
      #The list of root certificates for server verifications.
      #If certificate_authorities is empty or not set, the trusted
      #certificate authorities of the host system are used.
      #ssl.certificate_authorities: $ssl.certificate_authorities
  
      #The path to the certificate for SSL client authentication. If the certificate is not specified,
      #client authentication is not available.
      #ssl.certificate: $ssl.certificate
  
      #The client certificate key used for client authentication.
      #ssl.key: $ssl.key
  
      #The passphrase used to decrypt an encrypted key stored in the configured key file
      #ssl.key_passphrase: $ssl.key_passphrase
---

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-vid-vid-log-configmap
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vid
    chart: vid-5.0.0
    release: dev-vid
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  logback.xml: "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\r\n<!--\r\n  ================================================================================\r\n
    \ eCOMP Portal SDK\r\n  ================================================================================\r\n
    \ Copyright (C) 2017 AT&amp;T Intellectual Property\r\n  ================================================================================\r\n
    \ Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\r\n  you may
    not use this file except in compliance with the License.\r\n  You may obtain a copy
    of the License at\r\n  \r\n       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\r\n
    \ \r\n  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\r\n
    \ distributed under the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\r\n  WITHOUT
    WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\r\n  See the License
    for the specific language governing permissions and\r\n  limitations under the License.\r\n
    \ ================================================================================\r\n
    \ -->\r\n<configuration scan=\"true\" scanPeriod=\"3 seconds\" debug=\"true\">\r\n
    \  <!--  specify the base path of the log directory -->\r\n   <property name=\"logDir\"
    value=\"/var/log/onap\" />\r\n   <!--  specify the component name -->\r\n   <property
    name=\"componentName\" value=\"vid\" />\r\n   <!-- The directory where logs are
    written -->\r\n   <property name=\"logDirectory\" value=\"${logDir}/${componentName}\"
    />\r\n   <property name=\"pattern\" value=\"%d{&quot;yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX&quot;,
    UTC}\\t[%thread]\\t%-5level\\t%logger{36}\\t%replace(%replace(%replace(%mdc){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}){',
    ','\\t'}){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}\\t%replace(%replace(%msg){'\\n', '\\\\\\\\n'}){'\\t','\\\\\\\\t'}%n\"
    />\r\n   <!--  log file names -->\r\n   <property name=\"generalLogName\" value=\"application\"
    />\r\n   <property name=\"errorLogName\" value=\"error\" />\r\n   <property name=\"metricsLogName\"
    value=\"metrics\" />\r\n   <property name=\"auditLogName\" value=\"audit\" />\r\n
    \  <property name=\"debugLogName\" value=\"debug\" />\r\n   <!--  other constants
    -->\r\n   <property name=\"queueSize\" value=\"256\" />\r\n   <property name=\"maxFileSize\"
    value=\"50MB\" />\r\n   <property name=\"maxHistory\" value=\"30\" />\r\n   <property
    name=\"totalSizeCap\" value=\"10GB\" />\r\n   <!-- Example evaluator filter applied
    against console appender -->\r\n   <appender name=\"STDOUT\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender\">\r\n
    \     <encoder>\r\n         <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n      </encoder>\r\n
    \  </appender>\r\n   <!-- ============================================================================
    -->\r\n   <!-- EELF Appenders -->\r\n   <!-- ============================================================================
    -->\r\n   <!-- The EELFAppender is used to record events to the general application
    \r\n    log -->\r\n   <appender name=\"EELF\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\r\n
    \     <file>${logDirectory}/${generalLogName}.log</file>\r\n      <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n         <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${generalLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \        <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \           <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n         </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \        <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n         <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \     </rollingPolicy>\r\n      <encoder>\r\n         <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \     </encoder>\r\n      <filter class=\"org.openecomp.portalapp.util.CustomLoggingFilter\"
    />\r\n   </appender>\r\n   <appender name=\"asyncEELF\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\r\n
    \     <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n      <includeCallerData>true</includeCallerData>\r\n
    \     <appender-ref ref=\"EELF\" />\r\n   </appender>\r\n   <!-- EELF Security Appender.
    This appender is used to record security events \r\n    to the security log file.
    Security events are separate from other loggers \r\n    in EELF so that security
    log records can be captured and managed in a secure \r\n    way separate from the
    other logs. This appender is set to never discard any \r\n    events. -->\r\n   <!--
    \    \r\n  <appender name=\"EELFSecurity\"\r\n    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\r\n
    \   <file>${logDirectory}/${securityLogName}.log</file>\r\n    <rollingPolicy\r\n
    \     class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.FixedWindowRollingPolicy\">\r\n      <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${securityLogName}.%i.log.zip\r\n
    \     </fileNamePattern>\r\n      <minIndex>1</minIndex>\r\n      <maxIndex>9</maxIndex>\r\n
    \   </rollingPolicy>\r\n    <triggeringPolicy\r\n      class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\r\n
    \     <maxFileSize>5MB</maxFileSize>\r\n    </triggeringPolicy>\r\n    <encoder>\r\n
    \     <pattern>${defaultPattern}</pattern>\r\n    </encoder>\r\n  </appender>\r\n
    \ \r\n  <appender name=\"asyncEELFSecurity\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\r\n
    \   <queueSize>256</queueSize>\r\n    <discardingThreshold>0</discardingThreshold>\r\n
    \   <appender-ref ref=\"EELFSecurity\" />\r\n  </appender>\r\n   -->\r\n   <!--
    EELF Performance Appender. This appender is used to record performance \r\n    records.
    -->\r\n   <!--\r\n  <appender name=\"EELFPerformance\"\r\n    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\r\n
    \   <file>${logDirectory}/${performanceLogName}.log</file>\r\n    <rollingPolicy\r\n
    \     class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.FixedWindowRollingPolicy\">\r\n      <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${performanceLogName}.%i.log.zip\r\n
    \     </fileNamePattern>\r\n      <minIndex>1</minIndex>\r\n      <maxIndex>9</maxIndex>\r\n
    \   </rollingPolicy>\r\n    <triggeringPolicy\r\n      class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\r\n
    \     <maxFileSize>5MB</maxFileSize>\r\n    </triggeringPolicy>\r\n    <encoder>\r\n
    \     <outputPatternAsHeader>true</outputPatternAsHeader>\r\n      <pattern>${defaultPattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \   </encoder>\r\n  </appender>\r\n  <appender name=\"asyncEELFPerformance\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\r\n
    \   <queueSize>256</queueSize>\r\n    <appender-ref ref=\"EELFPerformance\" />\r\n
    \ </appender>\r\n  -->\r\n   <!-- EELF Server Appender. This appender is used to
    record Server related \r\n    logging events. The Server logger and appender are
    specializations of the \r\n    EELF application root logger and appender. This can
    be used to segregate Server \r\n    events from other components, or it can be eliminated
    to record these events \r\n    as part of the application root log. -->\r\n   <!--\r\n
    \ <appender name=\"EELFServer\"\r\n    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\r\n
    \   <file>${logDirectory}/${serverLogName}.log</file>\r\n    <rollingPolicy\r\n
    \     class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.FixedWindowRollingPolicy\">\r\n      <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${serverLogName}.%i.log.zip\r\n
    \     </fileNamePattern>\r\n      <minIndex>1</minIndex>\r\n      <maxIndex>9</maxIndex>\r\n
    \   </rollingPolicy>\r\n    <triggeringPolicy\r\n      class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\r\n
    \     <maxFileSize>5MB</maxFileSize>\r\n    </triggeringPolicy>\r\n    <encoder>\r\n
    \       <pattern>${defaultPattern}</pattern>\r\n    </encoder>\r\n  </appender>\r\n
    \ <appender name=\"asyncEELFServer\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\r\n
    \   <queueSize>256</queueSize>\r\n    <appender-ref ref=\"EELFServer\" />\r\n  </appender>\r\n
    \  -->\r\n   <!-- EELF Policy Appender. This appender is used to record Policy engine
    \r\n    related logging events. The Policy logger and appender are specializations
    \r\n    of the EELF application root logger and appender. This can be used to segregate
    \r\n    Policy engine events from other components, or it can be eliminated to record
    \r\n    these events as part of the application root log. -->\r\n   <!--\r\n  <appender
    name=\"EELFPolicy\"\r\n    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\r\n
    \   <file>${logDirectory}/${policyLogName}.log</file>\r\n    <rollingPolicy\r\n
    \     class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.FixedWindowRollingPolicy\">\r\n      <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${policyLogName}.%i.log.zip\r\n
    \     </fileNamePattern>\r\n      <minIndex>1</minIndex>\r\n      <maxIndex>9</maxIndex>\r\n
    \   </rollingPolicy>\r\n    <triggeringPolicy\r\n      class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy\">\r\n
    \     <maxFileSize>5MB</maxFileSize>\r\n    </triggeringPolicy>\r\n    <encoder>\r\n
    \       <pattern>${defaultPattern}</pattern>\r\n    </encoder>\r\n  </appender>\r\n
    \ <appender name=\"asyncEELFPolicy\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\r\n
    \   <queueSize>256</queueSize>\r\n    <appender-ref ref=\"EELFPolicy\" />\r\n  </appender>\r\n
    \ -->\r\n   <!-- EELF Audit Appender. This appender is used to record audit engine
    \r\n    related logging events. The audit logger and appender are specializations
    \r\n    of the EELF application root logger and appender. This can be used to segregate
    \r\n    Policy engine events from other components, or it can be eliminated to record
    \r\n    these events as part of the application root log. -->\r\n   <appender name=\"EELFAudit\"
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\r\n      <file>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.log</file>\r\n
    \     <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \        <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${auditLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \        <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \           <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n         </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \        <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n         <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \     </rollingPolicy>\r\n      <encoder>\r\n         <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \     </encoder>\r\n   </appender>\r\n   <appender name=\"asyncEELFAudit\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\r\n
    \     <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n      <appender-ref ref=\"EELFAudit\"
    />\r\n   </appender>\r\n   <appender name=\"EELFMetrics\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\r\n
    \     <file>${logDirectory}/${metricsLogName}.log</file>\r\n      <rollingPolicy
    class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n         <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${metricsLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \        <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \           <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n         </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \        <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n         <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \     </rollingPolicy>\r\n      <encoder>\r\n         <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \     </encoder>\r\n   </appender>\r\n   <appender name=\"asyncEELFMetrics\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\r\n
    \     <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n      <appender-ref ref=\"EELFMetrics\"
    />\r\n   </appender>\r\n   <appender name=\"EELFError\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\r\n
    \     <file>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.log</file>\r\n      <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \        <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${errorLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \        <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \           <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n         </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \        <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n         <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \     </rollingPolicy>\r\n      <encoder>\r\n         <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \     </encoder>\r\n   </appender>\r\n   <appender name=\"asyncEELFError\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\r\n
    \     <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n      <appender-ref ref=\"EELFError\"
    />\r\n   </appender>\r\n   <appender name=\"EELFDebug\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender\">\r\n
    \     <file>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.log</file>\r\n      <rollingPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy\">\r\n
    \        <fileNamePattern>${logDirectory}/${debugLogName}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log</fileNamePattern>\r\n
    \        <timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy class=\"ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.SizeAndTimeBasedFNATP\">\r\n
    \           <maxFileSize>${maxFileSize}</maxFileSize>\r\n         </timeBasedFileNamingAndTriggeringPolicy>\r\n
    \        <maxHistory>${maxHistory}</maxHistory>\r\n         <totalSizeCap>${totalSizeCap}</totalSizeCap>\r\n
    \     </rollingPolicy>\r\n      <encoder>\r\n         <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>\r\n
    \     </encoder>\r\n   </appender>\r\n   <appender name=\"asyncEELFDebug\" class=\"ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender\">\r\n
    \     <queueSize>${queueSize}</queueSize>\r\n      <appender-ref ref=\"EELFDebug\"
    />\r\n   </appender>\r\n   <!-- ============================================================================
    -->\r\n   <!--  EELF loggers -->\r\n   <!-- ============================================================================
    -->\r\n   <logger name=\"com.att.eelf\" level=\"debug\" additivity=\"false\">\r\n
    \     <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELF\" />\r\n   </logger>\r\n   <!--\r\n  <logger
    name=\"com.att.eelf.security\" level=\"info\" additivity=\"false\">\r\n    <appender-ref
    ref=\"asyncEELFSecurity\" />\r\n  </logger>\r\n  <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.perf\"
    level=\"info\" additivity=\"false\">\r\n    <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFPerformance\"
    />\r\n  </logger>\r\n  <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.server\" level=\"info\" additivity=\"false\">\r\n
    \   <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFServer\" />\r\n  </logger>\r\n  <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.policy\"
    level=\"info\" additivity=\"false\">\r\n    <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFPolicy\"
    />\r\n  </logger>\r\n  -->\r\n   <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.audit\" level=\"info\"
    additivity=\"false\">\r\n      <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFAudit\" />\r\n   </logger>\r\n
    \  <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.metrics\" level=\"info\" additivity=\"false\">\r\n
    \     <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFMetrics\" />\r\n   </logger>\r\n   <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.error\"
    level=\"info\" additivity=\"false\">\r\n      <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFError\"
    />\r\n   </logger>\r\n   <logger name=\"com.att.eelf.debug\" level=\"debug\" additivity=\"false\">\r\n
    \     <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELFDebug\" />\r\n   </logger>\r\n   <root level=\"INFO\">\r\n
    \     <appender-ref ref=\"asyncEELF\" />\r\n   </root>\r\n</configuration>\r\n"
---
# Source: vid/templates/configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dev-vid-vid
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vid
    chart: vid-5.0.0
    release: dev-vid
    heritage: Tiller
data:
  db_cmd.sh: |
    #!/bin/sh
    # Copyright  2018 AT&T
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
  
    echo "Going to run mysql -u${MYSQL_USER} -p${MYSQL_PASSWORD} -h${MYSQL_HOST} -P${MYSQL_PORT} ..."
    mysql -u${MYSQL_USER} -p${MYSQL_PASSWORD} -h${MYSQL_HOST} -P${MYSQL_PORT} < /db-config/vid-pre-init.sql
    if [ $? -ne 0 ];then
            echo "ERROR: Failed to run ${cmd} vid-pre-init.sql"
            exit 1
    else
            echo "INFO: Database initialized successfully"
    fi
  vid-pre-init.sql: |-
    /*
    # Copyright  2018 AT&T
    #
    # Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
    # you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
    # You may obtain a copy of the License at
    #
    #       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
    #
    # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
    # distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
    # WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
    # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
    # limitations under the License.
    */
  
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vid_openecomp_epsdk`.`schema_info` (
    `SCHEMA_ID` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
    `SCHEMA_DESC` VARCHAR(75) NOT NULL,
    `DATASOURCE_TYPE` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
    `CONNECTION_URL` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    `USER_NAME` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
    `PASSWORD` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
    `DRIVER_CLASS` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    `MIN_POOL_SIZE` INT(11) NOT NULL,
    `MAX_POOL_SIZE` INT(11) NOT NULL,
    `IDLE_CONNECTION_TEST_PERIOD` INT(11) NOT NULL)
    ENGINE = InnoDB
    DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;
---

  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vid
    chart: vid-5.0.0
    release: dev-vid
    heritage: Tiller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vid
        release: dev-vid
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /root/job_complete.py
        args:
        - --job-name
        - dev-vid-vid-galera-config
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.1"

        name: vid-readiness
      containers:
        - name: vid
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/onap/vid:5.0.3"
          imagePullPolicy: Always
          ports:
          - containerPort: 8443
          # disable liveness probe when breakpoints set in debugger
          # so K8s doesn't restart unresponsive container
          livenessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8443
            initialDelaySeconds: 120
            periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            tcpSocket:
              port: 8443
            initialDelaySeconds: 10
            periodSeconds: 10
          env:
            - name: ASDC_CLIENT_REST_HOST
              value: sdc-be.onap
            - name: ASDC_CLIENT_REST_AUTH
              value: "Basic dmlkOktwOGJKNFNYc3pNMFdYbGhhazNlSGxjc2UyZ0F3ODR2YW9HR21KdlV5MlU="

apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: dev-vid-vid-mariadb-galera
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: dev-vid-vid-mariadb-galera
    chart: "vid_mariadb_galera-5.0.0"
    release: "dev-vid"
    heritage: "Tiller"
spec:
#  serviceName: dev-vid-vid-mariadb-galera
  serviceName: vid-galera
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dev-vid-vid-mariadb-galera
        release: dev-vid
      annotations:
        pod.alpha.kubernetes.io/initialized: "true"
    spec:
      volumes:
        - name: config
          configMap:
            name: dev-vid-vid-mariadb-galera-externalconfig
        - name: localtime
          hostPath:
            path: /etc/localtime
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: onap-docker-registry-key
      containers:
        - name: dev-vid-vid-mariadb-galera
          image: "nexus3.onap.org:10001/adfinissygroup/k8s-mariadb-galera-centos:v004"
          imagePullPolicy: "Always"
          env:
            - name: POD_NAMESPACE
              valueFrom:
                fieldRef:
                  apiVersion: v1
                  fieldPath: metadata.namespace
            - name: MYSQL_USER
              value: "vidadmin"
            - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: dev-vid-vid-mariadb-galera
                  key: user-password
            - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
              value: "vid_openecomp_epsdk"
            - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                  name: dev-vid-vid-mariadb-galera
                  key: db-root-password
          ports:
          - containerPort: 3306
            name: vid-galera
          - containerPort: 4444
            name: sst
          - containerPort: 4567
            name: replication
          - containerPort: 4568
            name: ist
          readinessProbe:
            exec:
              command:
              - /usr/share/container-scripts/mysql/readiness-probe.sh
            initialDelaySeconds: 15
            periodSeconds: 10
          resources:
                        {}
                        
          volumeMounts:
          - mountPath: /etc/config
            name: config
          - mountPath: /etc/localtime
            name: localtime
            readOnly: true
---

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: dev-vid-vid-galera-config
  namespace: onap
  labels:
    app: vid-job
    release: dev-vid
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vid-job
        release: dev-vid
    spec:
      initContainers:
#This container checks that all galera instances are up before initializing it.
      - name: vid-readiness
        image: "oomk8s/readiness-check:2.0.1"
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
        - /root/ready.py
        - --container-name
        - dev-vid-vid-mariadb-galera-0
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
      containers:
      - name: vid-job
        image: library/mariadb:10
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /dbcmd-config/db_cmd.sh
          name: dev-vid-vid-config
          subPath: db_cmd.sh
        - mountPath: /db-config/vid-pre-init.sql
          name: dev-vid-vid-config
          subPath: vid-pre-init.sql
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        args:
        - -x
        - /dbcmd-config/db_cmd.sh
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: "Kp8bJ4SXszM0WXlhak3eHlcse2gAw84vaoGGmJvUy2U"
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          value: "vid-galera"
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: "vidadmin"
        - name: MYSQL_PORT
          value: "3306"
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
        - name: dev-vid-vid-config
          configMap:
            name: dev-vid-vid
            items:
              - key: db_cmd.sh
                path: db_cmd.sh
              - key: vid-pre-init.sql
                path: vid-pre-init.sql
---

    volumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  pullPolicy: Always
  readinessRepository: oomk8s
  repositoryCred:
    password: docker
    user: docker

# Source: vnfsdk/charts/postgres/templates/secrets.yaml

    heritage: Tiller
